title: Drivers are doing too much
review:
1. I‚Äôve been waiting for an hour so far for my lunch. An hour after the delivery time which already was an hour! 2 hrs! The driver made at least FIVE other deliveries and she‚Äôs not done yet. I‚Äôm not paying extra per order to have my meal come straight to me. She was at the restaurant quickly to pick my food up but then delivered to so many others!
2. This is not the drivers fault. If they agree to accept every delivery then it is what it is. It‚Äôs hit or miss if your food will be 20 mins or 2 hours. For as much as you pay per order so everyone profits, it‚Äôs not worth waiting so long for the order. And guaranteed it‚Äôll be nice and cold. üò† or something will be missing. Refunding my money doesn‚Äôt make my food good or help with a missing item. I‚Äôve had to reorder from places to make sure I actually get what is correct. Anyone else have picky kids?? You can‚Äôt even eat and enjoy food when your child‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt come or has crap on it that you didn‚Äôt order!!
3. The area to leave directions to the house is way too small. My neighbors are getting angry that cars are always at their house and I‚Äôm getting annoyed trying to reduce the directions down to. 250 characters. So if it‚Äôs not clear, the drivers get confused and my neighbors and I are annoyed. Whose fault?? FIX IT.

title: Will block you for anything
review: They blocked my account in sept I have followed the email steps and still have not yet received any response. They will block you for any little thing especially when some things are out of your control. For example I will have two deliveries my first delivery pick up would be my last drop off. The time stamp would be to drop my second delivery off first at 3:38 but my first delivery time stamp would be 3:36 how is that even possible ? I had NUMEROUS deliveries like this one. They will constantly send me alerts about delivering orders late, but how when this is what the apps/system suggests me to do. I‚Äôm only following what‚Äôs giving to me. Also you would get a delivery request but the restaurant would just be getting it when you arrive and you‚Äôll have to wait for the order to be done. I put in the app ‚Äúorder not started until I arrived ‚Äú you would think they will adjust your time stamp to deliver. You can‚Äôt put a time on how fast food is prepared. A lot of things needs to be updated so future drivers like myself won‚Äôt have such a headache when trying to make a living. I started this in July and I‚Äôm already blocked in September and as of currently still no response or update regarding my account. You guys should get customer service employee‚Äôs to help with blocked accounts instead of having drivers waiting and responding to emails that never receive a reply!

title: Used to love GrubHub until I was hacked
review:
I‚Äôve used GrubHub for years and thought it was great! Unfortunately, my account got hacked and someone used my account to order $40 worth of food and then changed the email on the account so they could change the password. As soon as I noticed the charges and reported it to Customer Care, I got an email saying they moved my inquiry to ‚Äúpriority‚Äù due to the serious nature of the concern and that they would be in contact with me shortly. The email also suggested I reset my password if possible, but I can‚Äôt since the hacker changed my account info. Days go by and nothing. I sent an email on the same thread asking for an update and a refund and still nothing. It‚Äôs been about 2 weeks and I still have not received a response. I was able to remove my payment from my account, luckily, but now I still can‚Äôt use my account because of the account log in change.

EDIT:
The same day I posted this review, GrubHub got back to me and sent me a refund and helped solve my issue so I adjusted my rating. I do think that serious matters like this should be handled quicker, but do appreciate them handling the situation in a fair manner.

title: So far, so Good!
review: Today is Monday, September 26, 2022, and this is the second time that I have had an issue with GrubHub delivery. I‚Äôve been tracking this driver and he or she has been driving around in my neighborhood and didn‚Äôt even bother to  get to my address so therefore I felt that my food would‚Äôve  been cold upon arrival and now it was abruptly cancelled, so now I am re-ordering once  again.üò° I am a senior citizen and I am disabled, the name of the complex is Mayflower Gardens Senior Apartments. I wished that the driver would keep in mind that some of us older customers are not as quick to get to the door and we are not dumb or stupid. I know know how to read apps, and I know my directions,when they come, and some of them in the past will abruptly leave your order at the door on the ground and not even bother to knock. I am requesting a re-order once again because I have tracked the last driver and he or she was in my neighborhood and I‚Äôm not sure if they were lost or not but it would be nice if they were use the GPS system more effectively so that they can find my address. Please know that  is why I am really hesitant to order with you in the near future if this continues to happen. Needless to say I am not happy at this time.I noticed that a female driver will be delivering my order shortly and I hope that it‚Äôll arrive in time.

title: Ugh
review: This company is one of the worst I‚Äôve ever dealt with.  Late all the time. Often the math doesn‚Äôt add up.  They gave me a $5 promo for being late but it only gave me $1 and change off.  Sketchy.   The order will come to one thing but they charge the bank another.  I canceled last yr but ended up with a free year long plus membership then I got hurt so can‚Äôt drive so I use it a lot now.  It‚Äôs rare I have a seamless order.  Just now I‚Äôm waiting for my food for an hr get a call from a man I couldn‚Äôt understand and he just hangs up on me when I said sorry I didn‚Äôt catch that.  Very thick accent in a very loud call center.   Then I see my order was canceled I had promos on the order from the last time they messed up and now those aren‚Äôt valid.  I reordered from another restaurant and the driver didn‚Äôt bring the drinks,  give us forks or sauce.  Also knocked when I said to no contact.  I had one driver last year flip off my camera for absolutely no reason. I tip 25%.   I definitely won‚Äôt be using it after my free year ends this February.  I was formally a paid Grubhub + customer.  I order out probably 15 to 20 times a month due to my physical pain.  It‚Äôs easier than cooking and cleaning dishes.   But I‚Äôll  find other ways like pizza delivery or DoorDash. Which isn‚Äôt much better but still better.

title: Was not able to place an order
review: I don‚Äôt use Grubhub much but when I do use it, it‚Äôs always a problem placing an order. I spent over an hour trying to place an order and my order kept being cancelled for no reason. I tried different restaurants, different payment cards, tried the app and internet browser but no luck. The generic and un useful message I would get would be ‚ÄúReason for cancellation: Unfortunately, we're unable to fulfill this order‚Äù and that‚Äôs all. Another brief message I would get is to call customer service if the problem continues but could not find a customer service number anywhere. I finally found the customer service number by reading the reviews, I called and the customer service person working from home had a rooster that can be heard in the background. The rep did not offer any troubleshooting and or solution to get my order, only said he would escalated to a supervisor and it can take up to 24hrs for them to get back to me or resolve it. ??? The only solution I given to me was that I can go in person to the restaurant or call them directly. I wanted the convenience of not going out and having my food delivered but it turned into a mission. I used a different app and I was able to place an order without any problems.

title: Would give a zero if I could!
review: Terrible service, terrible customer service. Order from restaurant website it defaulted to grub hub for delivery. I ordered and received a time range for delivery of 6:35-6:45 pm. Order did not arrive until 8:03pm. Food was worse than cold. The app showed driver 45 min away enroute to order. Then showed driver in another parking lot down the road hovering forever. I messaged driver he said he was ‚Äúwaiting‚Äù. I called restaurant my order was ready. No one was there waiting to pick up. Asked if I could get my food remade as it was ready for quite some time but I would have to reorder and repurchase. Tried to cancel through grub hub. Could never get through. The queue had over 300 people in it. Called driver he was picking up order but had to wait for another persons and couldn‚Äôt leave until theirs was done. Took him 30 min to get 5 miles down the road the app showed him lost and hovering in random parts of our neighborhood. Food received was cold and soggy. Contacted customer service chat they adjusted the wrong item to refund for $3+. I asked for a full refund. Sent me to a different chat with 100+ in queue just to delete me out of chat completely. Will never use Grub hub again. Door Dash is much more efficient and has better help and customer service.

title: Grub Hub is not 24/7
review: I ordered Wendy‚Äôs one night at around 10:00 - 10:15, and they had to delay my order for about 30 minutes, which i get, stuff happens ya know it can‚Äôt always be perfect. And then I get another delay, and then another, next thing I know my order is not going to arrive until an hour and a half past when it was originally going to arrive. I noticed that when I went to the Home Screen where all the restaurants are, they had all closed. When I searched places such as insomnia cookie, which stays open very late, it said they were still open but it wasn‚Äôt appearing on the Home Screen. This meant there were no delivery drivers to actually deliver my order now and Grubhub does not know how to handle this when it happens. I contacted support and was told my order could not be cancelled but could instead receive a 10% discount . . . Woo. I attempted to contact support multiple times after but for some reason it would not reconnect me to anyone else, I did get reconnected to one person, however they said nothing the entire time, and after sitting in the call for about 5 minutes with no response, I left. This is definitely up there with some of the worst experiences I‚Äôve had with delivery services, I was honestly kinda impressed.

title: Worst Food Delivery App
review: Time and time again GrubHub disappoints me. I order food, leave clear written instructions about where I live and never select ‚ÄúContact free delivery‚Äù because I know the app is going to navigate the driver somewhere else. Why?! I have no idea!! There are a select few drivers who go above and beyond. If they can‚Äôt find my residence, they call me, ask questions and eventually deliver my food. I always tip the drivers because I appreciate them delivering my food. However, there are some drivers who don‚Äôt even attempt to deliver my food, don‚Äôt go above and beyond to make sure I get what I ordered and are either rude or don‚Äôt answer my calls/texts after they‚Äôve dropped off my food at the door but it‚Äôs nowhere to be found. It is a waste of time, money and food ordering through GrubHub. Yes, my money gets refunded when I contact customer support. What I‚Äôd like to know is why don‚Äôt they update their apps navigation to prevent the drivers from not being able to find the home? Why don‚Äôt the drivers go out of their way to contact the customer? Why don‚Äôt the drivers respond to texts or calls? It‚Äôs beyond aggravating going through this time and time again. I‚Äôm deleting this and going to use Uber Eats or Door Dash instead.

title: Money back true but‚Ä¶
review:
I agree with the reviewer who said that customer service only response is to refund your $ but not to make it right.
 In this post Covid job apocalypseIt would be better if a company with his big name in food delivery as GrubHub, would value their drivers and delivery people a little higher and give them credit for doing the job that they are doing. I wouldn‚Äôt do the job myself but I‚Äôm glad there are people who do since I am a handicap shut in.
But I‚Äôve struggled with Walmart over almost 3 months to get them to honor the price quoted by one of their vendors. Apparently there are no companies anymore who value and honor their employees. The bigger they are the less they care.  
I wish there were someone out there who would create a delivery service where the money went all to the restaurant and  drivers and all the service did was broker their services.
Alas we do not live in that world. For whatever it‚Äôs worth GrubHub seems to serve things up just as well as any other delivery service I had to use.

title: Horrible customer service
review: I received a text saying my order was delivered by the front door. I went outside. It wasn‚Äôt there. I texted the driver asking him where he left it. He says under the mailbox which didn‚Äôt make much sense given where the mailroom is in my building. I then described my building and asked him if that‚Äôs where he left it. He texts back no. I asked him what address he left it at. He texts back that he doesn‚Äôt have that information, and there‚Äôs nothing else he can do to help me. I went to the app and tried to use the chat to talk to customer service. I was in a queue for a while. Then someone finally joined the chat. They didn‚Äôt type anything or respond to anything. After 10 minutes of no response in the chat, I found the customer service number and called them. After a bit of time on hold, I finally talked to someone and explained what happened. She said she would reorder it for me but didn‚Äôt offer any discount or coupon or anything. She didn‚Äôt even really apologize. I finally received my order over an hour late. No discount, no coupon, no apology, nothing!

title: Unwilling Drivers to Find my House
review: I had 2 experiences where the driver couldn‚Äôt find my house. Poor directions from Grubhub. I live on a busy street, right across from a high school, with a unique tower above the garage and the drivers still couldn‚Äôt find it! I even had one delivery person leave my order at the wrong house and do nothing. Sometimes I don‚Äôt have a car and so ordering my food to be delivered is the only way I can get it. I have never had this problem with Doordash or Instacart. I only started with Grubhub because of a promotion from my work.  I decided to cancel my $10 a month membership, after one of the drivers, who drove past my house twice, even with me telling him the directions very politely at the same time, threaten to drive off with my order and not deliver it. He then refused to drive into my driveway and had me run out to his truck to grab it. Once I did, I said ‚ÄúThank you!‚Äù And he said said uh-huh and drove off. I get it, he took longer to find my house, but I did tip 20%. I should not have been treated like that. I do work customer service and I do know how hard it can be, but in this case, how I was treated, was unacceptable.

title: Your negligence ruined my 30th birthday dinner
review:
I ordered from Tucanos for my 30th birthday dinner. It was set to arrive at around 5:40, perfect for dinner time. About 5:30 the driver called to tell me Tucanos doesn‚Äôt sell the thing I ordered. When I asked her to ask them for a substitution, they said THEY AREN‚ÄôT SELLING ANY TAKEOUT ORDERS THIS MONTH. By the time I could order something else from DoorDash and have it arrive, I was eating dinner at 7 while my kids were getting ready for bed, they having had grilled cheeses. You have ONE job, Grubhub App. Confirm the order so the driver can pick it up. Clearly Tucanos didn‚Äôt confirm they could fill the order before you wasted my time and the driver‚Äôs time on the order. I hope you paid her. Your process requires revision. You know what‚Äôs worse than having to go get your own food because a restaurant won‚Äôt do delivery? HAVING NO FOOD BECAUSE YOUR APP DROPPED THE BALL! I hope you fail by losing your customer base to Doordash‚Äôs superior app and process design. 

UPDATE: Developer has responded to my complaint by asking me to use their ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù option on their site. There is not actually a way to contact them at the link provided.

title: Food is always late
review: I‚Äôm done with GrubHub after this order. Every delivery is late. The restaurant‚Äôs provide the correct items, but we always end up staring at our drivers on the map going to the restaurant then driving to the other end of the city, before updating to say the order will be late and they‚Äôve magically just picked up our food and are on the way. After complaining to GrubHub twice recently about cold food, both times they said they would issue a $5 make-good and neither time has that email been received. I always tip over 20% for the drivers, but then end up with cold food. I wish there was the ability to tip after delivery rather than before. I also wish there was a way to ensure deliveries came straight from the restaurant to our door rather than being the third stop on the way 45 mins after the food leaves the restaurant. I understand we‚Äôre paying for convenience of not leaving our house, but the markups on all the food is ridiculous. You‚Äôre basically paying three times the cost for poor quality.

title: Grubhub Meal Delivery Service
review:
I‚Äôve never used meal delivery services that require a membership to be more affordable. But not having to leave my house to shop for groceries and then spend time and effort making meals has been surprisingly rewarding!

Grubhub has changed the way I feel about ‚Äúbeing too lazy‚Äù to do it myself, because the convenience is a justified reward for worn out full time parents, the elderly and disabled people. 

Ordering is SO easy, from a growing number of participating top fast food, healthy and top-notch restaurants. It IS a little pricier but the minimal extra cost is WELL WORTH IT! Average time from submitting an order to delivery at your door is about 20-35 minutes, or 40-50 during holiday seasons. And everything is hot, fresh and ready to serve. 

I‚Äôve been happy with this app‚Äôs service, overall   However I do have occasional issues, especially within the last 3 months or so:  
1.  Orders that display a status of ‚Äúbeing prepared‚Äù or ‚Äúon the way‚Äù but are suddenly cancelled without explanation or notification. 
2.  Orders that indicate delivery completed, but never received. These are always cases where they delivered to the wrong address. 
3. And lastly, orders that are missing items, especially the drinks. 

I still recommend this app and I still use it often but I want people to be aware that the service is not without occasional delays, problems or issues. 

Ren√©e W. 

Ren√©e W.

title: Horrible Customer Service
review: I have had to deal with their customer service several times. They have all been horrible experiences. There is no empathy to anyones situation and their solutions are laughable. Tonight we placed an order and 10 minutes later I got a notification that it was cancelled and then a phone call letting me know my order was cancelled due to a restaurant error and I would get a refund within 5 days. We made other plans for dinner and we‚Äôre sitting down to eat 40 minutes later when my phone rang and it was the restaurant that we originally ordered from asking if we were coming to pick up the order. I guess Grubhub cancelled it on their own without telling the restaurant. I apologized as if I knew, I would have gone over and picked it up myself. I went and read the email Grubhub sent and they stated it was a delivery error, but customer service blamed it on the restaurant. This is horrible for both the consumer and the restaurant that lost the money for food they prepared. We‚Äôve had so many issues, but I won‚Äôt be wasting money on this anymore.

title: Horrible!
review: Horrible system just like Seamless. Do not follow there guarantee policy to cancel order if the order has not been confirmed yet. I‚Äôve had problems with drivers eating my food, delivering to the wrong location, not reading my directions, restaurants not following my specifications so because of that Grubhub and Seamless have dubbed my account suspicious of getting large amount of concessions so this would be a reason to not be able to follow there guarantee of canceling an order if you use the wrong credit card. They blame me not the drivers they hire or the restaurant that made the mistake or the fact that on multiple occasions I have lost my lunch hour due to there incompetence of not following directions or putting ingredients in my food that I am unable to eat or the restaurant is about 3 hours late delivering my food so they have a guarantee and I collect on that guarantee so if you do then your suspicious. I believe this company is run by a bunch of idiots. Here‚Äôs all these guarantees we offer but please do use the chat and collect on them!

title: Worst Delivery Service in KC
review: I have had multiple times where a restaurant and/dasher calls because the order does not exist in their system or someone has given the wrong CC information. Grubhub jacks up the prices then processes your card meanwhile someone calls the restaurant and uses a company CC. I had a restaurant call me one time and said they wouldn‚Äôt let my food go because my CC was declined‚Ä¶they then told me how it Grubhub calls them and pays with a different card. I gave the restaurant another CC and my food was delivered. Meanwhile, Grubhub said my card was already processed and couldn‚Äôt cancel the charge or do anything‚Ä¶until I told them what that the restaurant already told me that Grubhub personal gave them their CC that was declined then all of a sudden I had an instant refund. The same thing just happened again but worse. This company is nothing but robbing you. And what about the ‚Äúfree memberships‚Äù with other apps? Are they really free if I‚Äôm charged hella dollars for a service fee every order AND jacked up prices. No it‚Äôs not free, just a scam!

title: First and last time I will use this service
review: Placed my order and I could see tracking of driver picking up food. Then all of a sudden the driver is switched to a different person who then drives to the same location to pick up my food. After a confirmation of my food being picked up and the driver coming all the way to my hotel parking lot, calls me to question if I picked up my food already. I have been waiting over an hour (order was delayed due to the driver switch) just to then be accused that I picked up my own food?! So after waiting all that time, and then driving to my location to finally inform me my order was ‚Äúlost.‚Äù  I then get in touch with customer support who informs me it will take up to 5 days to be refunded and that my order could not be created as the place wouldn‚Äôt be able to make it  in time so then I had to figure out a different delivery as I was not going to risk my food being ‚Äúlost‚Äù again through this terrible service. Never using Grubhub again. Worst first experience.

title: Horrible customer service
review: I‚Äôve never had a good experience with this service and it‚Äôs always been the drivers fault but today takes the cake. Today we ordered and the order was delayed once which was expected due to how popular the restaurant is but then the order was picked up and then the driver took almost an hour to deliver the food at one point I kept track of his location and it remained stationary in the same spot for over 10 minutes when attempting to contact the driver there was no answer on his behalf. After going to grub hub to report this all they could say was sorry for the service and for the cold food here‚Äôs 5 dollar credit that expires in 30 days when asking if anything else could be done they said they can‚Äôt do anything regarding their drivers. There‚Äôs a lack of accountability with their drivers why wouldn‚Äôt they be able to cover for them it‚Äôs their employees not the restaurant‚Äôs fault. I have now deleted the app and account and now they have lost a user.

title: Driver stole our food, customer service couldn‚Äôt reorder
review: We ordered lunch at 10:30 with an 11:15 expected delivery. Around 11:35 we start wondering where our food is. No correspondence from our driver. I look on the app and it says our food has been delivered. We check all door locations- no food. Start chatting with customer service and they won‚Äôt give the drivers number or any form of communication. They say the driver is no longer responding and that they cannot reprocess our order. By this time it is noon and to reorder, there is a 50-60 minute wait. We ordered $90 worth of food which they said they would refund within 3-5 days and offered a $10 coupon. So by 12:30, we have no food, we have an hour wait for anything else and we have a $10 reward to a company that clearly does not vet their drivers. I‚Äôm sorry but $10 is not enough to make up for the severe inconvenience and lack of ability to make it right in a timely manner. Will definitely be using different apps from here on out.

title: Worst Food Delivery App
review: I absolutely hate this food app. I will never use again. I actually get free delivery with prime but I won‚Äôt be ordering through them again. Everytime I order from them my order is either canceled or a couple times it‚Äôs extremely late. One time I waited over 2 hours for a burrito from a place 10 min away. I kept talking to customer service and they would not tell me if it was something with the restaurant or was it just that the driver was not going to pick it up from the place. Eventually after talking to about 3 customer service reps I canceled the order and went to get it myself. They also didn‚Äôt want to give me a full refund for waiting over 2 hours when estimated delivery was 30 min. A few other times my order was delivered in the dirt outside my apartment complex. Just left there. GrubHub did nothing for me. Even after sending pics and messages. They need serious work on customer service and driver issues before I will ever use them again.

title: Edited delivery address ended up paying for multiple orders
review:
App Problem #1 was that the app showed wrong delivery address type (home/business). The app makes it possible to edit the delivery address info. So I did. Bu the address type showing wrong type did not get fixed. I tried again and then gave up. 

App Problem #2 was that every address edit was interpreted as a new order. So got charged for 2 more orders. 

Restaurant Problem #1 was that they did not answer my call.

Restaurant Problem #2 was that even though I texted them them that I have been trying to change my address they still sent me extra meals of the same exact order. 

Restaurant Problem #3 was that they ignored the fact that they received 3 exactly the same orders from the same person to the same delivery location within 2 minutes or so.

Grubhub Support Problem #1 is that they are bot customer satisfaction oriented. They don‚Äôt have this predefined business instinct or making it right for the customer. They made me explicitly ask for a refund and then repeat my request. And then they wanted to refund only 1 extra order. I had to really insist for them to finally cancel those orders and issue the refund.  Haven‚Äôt received the refund yet. Writing right after my interaction with the support.

title: The worst customer service!
review: The app is what it is a food ordering service.  What do you expect to receive from a company that adversities ‚Äúcustomer service‚Äù?  Well for me expect that I would order the desired product and that the order would be delivered as expected in a fair time.  I order the wait was almost an hour but okay I agreed to the price and the time.  Pay the fees and tip 20% of the ticket to the driver.   I called the restaurant after the time had passed 3 minutes from latest delivery expectation.  The restaurant informed me the food had been waiting on a driver for almost 16 minutes.  I started a text with grub hub and all I got was a cancelled order, five dollar off my next sixty dollar order and a I really apologize for this.  This is not the first time it has happened!  Just a word and maybe it is just my bad luck with these guys but I will not waste another 1hour of my life to cancel the order and get an apology.  I hate this app, and the customer service which is not!

title: Wrong order received
review: Where is the accountability from Grubhub when mistakes are made?  You delivered the wrong order to my home this morning.  I call you and tell you what happened and you tell me you‚Äôve refunded the order and that‚Äôs all you can do.  We call the restaurant and our order is just sitting there. I ask why you can‚Äôt deliver my order?  Customer service says once the order has been marked as delivered there is nothing they can do. Absolute trash of a service you provide Grubhub.   Make the order right, send the driver to go back and pick up my correct order??  I didn‚Äôt call you for funsies, your job was to deliver to my food and a mistake was made.  Why is Grubhub not able to make good on their end??  Last time we use your service Grubhub.  Corporate pigs at their finest.  Talked to customer service and waited for over an hour after our wrong order was delivered to finally get someone on the phone who also wouldn‚Äôt accept any accountability.

title: Worse than Doordash
review: So just had a conversation with customer support, I was waiting for my order and it said it would arrive at x time, so I waited and noticed that the driver was at one point just driving in circles near but about 5 blocks from my location, so I thought ok here we go again gps is going to screw things up, I message the driver no response, I call the driver still no response. Now I‚Äôm worried so I contact grub hub customer service and ask them to check up on the driver because I‚Äôm think maybe they got into an accident or something they are in the middle of the street and haven‚Äôt moved their gps location in about 10 mins. Well it turns out the gps was just freaking out and the driver was picking up an order for someone else and was waiting for almost 30 mins to pick it up when they could have delivered my food and then gone back.  I‚Äôm sorry but what kind of backwards algorithm are you folks in grub hub using to determine deliveries.

title: They know what they‚Äôre doing to hide bad reviews
review: Not only is Apple somehow changing 1-star reviews to 5-star for this app, but in the app you can‚Äôt even review a restaurant or driver once you have a problem. Driver never delivered your food? Can‚Äôt leave a review to warn others. Restaurant forgot half your meal? Once you file for a refund you can‚Äôt leave a review. Forcing only positive feedback to make themselves and bad restaurants look good. I just ordered food and you can tell the restaurant intentionally ‚Äúforgot‚Äù all of the free items like sauce and utensils, as well as more than half my food. They only refunded me $11 so I ended up paying $32 for $7 worth of food. I don‚Äôt know who is worse, Grubhub or DoorDash. I‚Äôve also had MULTIPLE drivers just disappear for 45 minutes. Literally happened to me THREE times where I‚Äôve cancelled orders because of a driver who probably went home. Just pick up your own food folks. Or use local delivery services. Forget about these garbage corporations.

title: Meh
review:
Tried it out for the first time using a gift card. Ordered from a place we typically love. It was very easy. Driver was awesome we tipped well.  However, GrubHub managed a huge markup on everything in addition to multiple fees etc.  After everything, it almost doubled the price of our normal order. We would be crazy to use GrubHub unless it‚Äôs an emergency.  

Also, the app suggested to us to add-on drinks at 7-11 on the way. I tried to add drinks onto the order but it seemed to be missing beer from the app. Just suggested pop and energy drinks. No thank you.  

I‚Äôll just be picking up myself in the future.  Maybe I will try that next time‚Ä¶ assuming there aren‚Äôt tons of fees/markup.  I didn‚Äôt know it was an option but I just Googled it and found this is offered.  Honestly, would rather call the restaurant and order direct to support their business.

title: Worst Delivery Service EVER!!
review: I order mcdonalds‚Ä¶. Got a combo, and an extra cheeseburger on the side. Came out to $20 i believe. Im checking the map because my food is taking wayyy too long. The driver isnt even NEAR the restaurant. It says ‚Äúon the way to you‚Äù yet he‚Äôs driving the opposite direction.   The receipt says my food was finished at 3:22pm,yet i received it at 3:56pm.  My food was COLD. Unedible, And my cheeseburger was made incorrectly. Ticket said NO PICKLES EXTRA ONIONS, Yet i received no onions extra pickles‚Ä¶ (which is the restaurants fault not grubhub)  so anyways i contact ‚Äòsupport‚Äô and told them my entire order was wrong. Even received dr pepper instead of coke. Literally my WHOLE ORDER was poor quality. They gove me a $4.77 refund for EVERYTHING. Literally stealing money from customers at this point just so your weak employees can cruise around town, then deliver incorrect, COLD food. Will not be using this app ever again, and will definitely be advising others to not use this poor excuse of delivery services.

title: Grubhub is Awesome!
review: I pick up my own orders when I can, but when I am starving and don‚Äôt feel like going; Grubhub is awesome! The restaurant‚Äôs I order from are delicious and the drivers are excellent. I get my orders in a timely manner and the food is hot and the drinks are cold - winter and summer! So treat yourself! I first used Grubhub last holiday season! No traffic headaches and timely service! Holiday testing is a good measure for service. These folks have never let me down!  Steak Out has actually hung up on me when I called during the week. Not just once or twice - consistently. The weekend crew is great. However, Grubhub has never disappointed me no matter what day it is! Steak Out just loses my business on hang up days! And Grubhub comes through!!!

title: Just terrible overall
review: I‚Äôve been using Grub hub for about an year now and the amount of time my foods been stolen is ridiculous and when you do talk to customer support they think everybody is a child sounds like they are talking down to you then all they do you return your money when food is stolen but not like it won‚Äôt happen again but yep let me keep throwing my money at an delivery app that takes hours sometimes to deliver due to the fact how lazy there drivers are then you do meet some drivers that are nice and good at what they are doing but I only met 3 in the past year of me using it such a bad experience and customer support does not help this clause at all could at least give me a discount for the next food order after my food been stolen but nope and then get hanged up on twice by not only my driver but also the customer service love to see it and how I do much regret spending even one cent on this garbage app and service

title: Good app, but the drivers are unpredictable
review:
There‚Äôs nothing wrong with the app itself. I find it very easy to use, and it has many features that improve quality of life such as express reordering and multiple methods of payment.

Customer service I‚Äôve found to be divisive among people who use this app. I personally have had nothing but good experiences. The representatives were kind, helpful, and able to resolve my issues quickly. Hopefully you have the same care.

But those issues all stemmed from one thing: the drivers. I understand how busy they can be and how undertipped they are. But sometimes they can‚Äôt seem to follow simple instructions. I‚Äôve had drivers not show up until 30 minutes after I was notified they would arrive, had orders have missing items, and some orders weren‚Äôt even delivered to the right address. 

All I have to say is sometimes it‚Äôs better to go get the food yourself. Understand that you‚Äôre placing your trust in one person to get your food and bring it to you. Sometimes they‚Äôll fail to even do that. There are lots of amazing GrubHub drivers out there, trust me, but you‚Äôre likely to have a few bad ones.

title: Useless
review: I received a grubhub gift card and tried using it, my order was over the amount of the gift card so i added my debit card and paid the remaining balance with no problem. my order went through and immediately got cancelled, apparently it ‚Äúdidn‚Äôt get processed‚Äù. customer service told me they‚Äôd refund me within 48 hours and here we are, 48 hours later with no refund. to make matters more frustrating, now anytime i try to order something it tells me to enter my credit card, venmo, or apple pay. i‚Äôve connected my venmo and my apple pay and neither of them will work as payment. i‚Äôve tried my credit card and debit card and it keeps telling me to enter the correct card number despite me doing so atleast 8 different times. i‚Äôm getting fed up to the point of just deleting the app and telling everyone i know to NEVER use grubhub ever. Uber eats is way better and their fees are cheaper anyways.

title: Delivery Issues
review:
As a person that works in the kitchen at a restaurant- I know first hand that when items are missing- it‚Äôs not a driver issue - it‚Äôs a restaurant issue. Some restaurants / fast food places will close up the bags so the driver don‚Äôt get access and that‚Äôs for food safety. If you are missing items from an order call the place you ordered from. They are responsible for getting the order correct NOT delivery drivers!!  
I‚Äôm so grateful that we see some of the best drivers who take their job seriously.  If they can double check orders they will but ultimately it‚Äôs the responsibility of the place you ordered from!!
Thank you GrubHub for providing a great service!!

title: Horrible customer support
review:
The reason I called customer care was because the driver left my food out on the sidewalk in front of my apartment building and didn‚Äôt bother to call or text through the app, just sent a picture of the food on the dirty concrete, and dogs use that area to relieve themselves often. I called customer care and the tier one person (Salim) was rude and made me repeat the grievance over and over rather than just giving me to a supervisor as I had asked. 

My husband had to reiterate the story of the crummy delivery drop off to both Salim and his supervisor before we finally got a refund for the inedible food, but no additional credits for our trouble. GrubHub‚Äôs customer care system typically allows customers to review their experiences with operators; however, the supervisor disconnected the call before my husband could do so. Thus we‚Äôre going more public with how terrible this experience was.

title: Order Not Delivered
review:
I placed an expensive order on Grubhub. The driver never delivered the order to my apartment and order was not at other units or at any of the front doors of the building. The driver never called or texts. And after the order claimed delivery, there was no option for me to contact the driver.

The app does not enable users to write reviews for poor driving service. Therefore it seems if a driver steals food or leaves food in an unsecured area, the driver gets away with what was done.

I did contact customer service and the order was replaced. However, there was no additional compensation for the additional wait time. After pressing hard with customer service, I was finally give a 20% discount on a future order, which expires in 1 month - why the expiration???

Regardless, I am frustrated that the driver is allowed to get away with this and that I have no way of being able to contact the driver to ask where the food is.

Customer service ought to be more generous upfront when things like this happen to ensure customers remain loyal to their service.

It was an awful experience. And my impression of Grubhub has significantly reduced. 

I hope this review is shared up the chain of command. Things like this need a solution and ought to be better handled so that their reputation is preserved.

title: Room for improvement.
review:
The map updates very slowly when you are viewing the progress of the driver. I was on the phone with one and trying to direct him, and the map was well behind his actual location.

Grubhub also fails to create driver profiles that are simple to view and rate like Uber does. With Uber, you can click on the driver profile and view comments, ratings, specific qualities, and other information. Once the order is completed, Uber has you rate right away to encourage a response.

On Grubhub there is no such thing. With Grubhub you have to go out of your way to do a rating for a driver, so the only people who will likely be doing that are ones who have a negative rating to give. I found this out trying to rate my driver for going above and beyond, which would have been easy to do with Uber but not with Grubhub. You cannot clarify any details with your order after the fact or anything else like you can with Uber.

The search option is clearly incomplete based on the results received depending on how you choose to sort them.

Other than that, the food is there, and it works the same as any other app.

title: Worst service ever.
review: So I order from a place 5 minutes away. The driver is positioned 10 minutes away from me. 5 minutes from the restaurant. I called to confirm the food was ready for pick up 20 min after ordering. The driver proceeds to just drive around for whatever reason for 40 min. Literally went back and forth to the street the restaurant was on 3 times and never once grabbed my food. Now finally after an hour or so I receive my food and it‚Äôs cold. So I ask for not even a full refund but atleast half my money back cause I‚Äôm not eating a cold sandwich that should of just came off a press. Then you have the nerve to say you can only give me 5$ credit back!? Then the agent ‚Äúhelping‚Äù me proceeds to say he is gonna transfer me to another department and ends the communication and hangs up on me. I hope your company gets shut down. Terrible service.

title: The worst
review:
Placed an order and waited 2 and a half hours, called the restaurant and was told the food was picked up a while ago, I couldn‚Äôt reach the driver nor the restaurant could.
When I chatted with customer service twice,
No one could reach the driver or call the restaurant, the restaurant blamed GrubHub and GrubHub blamed the restaurant. At this point my food was already cold 2.5 hours later- I asked for a refund and an email to write a complaint, BUT the chat was ended by the representative. Uber would have NEVER done this. The restaurant reported that the driver PICKED UP the order, but the driver CANCELLED IT- which means he got to enjoy my dinner instead‚Ä¶ and GrubHub still said it was getting delivered. As it is now. So safe to say, someone stole my food, a GrubHub employee, so I will never be trusting this company again. 
No help,  no support, no nothing.
Horrible service. Save yourself the trouble.

title: Constantly canceling orders
review: GrubHub has canceled 3 of my last 5 orders. Today, I ordered from shake shack and got a text from shake shack that my order was ready. I looked in the GrubHub app and it didn‚Äôt have a driver assigned to my order. I reached out to customer service and the agent, Ralph, after I said that I got the text from shake shack still told me that my order was in the works and they hadn‚Äôt assigned a driver as a result. I said it wasn‚Äôt still in the works because I received the text from shake shack that it was ready. As a response he just ignored what I said and repeated that the order was in the works and would arrive in about 40 minutes. (Meaning it would be ice cold). THEN they canceled my order meaning my order is sitting in shake shack being wasted and I don‚Äôt have time for lunch. Ever since GrubHub bought Seamless the service has been atrocious. I miss old seamless.

title: GrubHub does not validate your orders are processed.
review:
GrubHub places orders, but it does not check the response from the restaurant to see if the order has been received and will be processed successfully. They only time they confirm is when the driver arrives at the restaurant and reports a problem with the restaurant?!

On two separate occasions, I tried placing order to a local cafe that Google Maps shows is open.

On both occasions, GrubHub falsely reported that my order was complete, and it was on its way.  On both occasions, 10 minutes before my food was supposed to arrive I received an alert that my order was canceled and I would receive a refund.

I got no further communication the first time this happened. However, I got a phone call the second time. I asked GrubHub why did they wait until my food was supposed to arrive to tell me there was a problem. The rep then shared that GRUBHUB DOESN‚ÄôT KNOW THERE IS A PROBLEM WITH THE ORDER/RESTAURANT UNTIL THE DRIVER ARRIVES TO PICKUP THE ORDER!!!!

It is beyond ridiculous to expect customers to find it acceptable that GrubHub doesn‚Äôt do a verification via API that the order is being processed. Do the Product Managers pay attention to the customer experience?!

title: Delivery drivers are horrible
review: Placed an order for delivery an hr ahead of time from a fast food restaurant. Driver shows as being at the restaurant then drives to a different location. I message them and then they cancel the delivery 5 min after I had scheduled the delivery. I contact customer service they say it will be another hr, and give me a 10$ perk. I cancel the order and place a new one. The new driver delivers the old order that had been sitting for 2 hrs and keeps the fresh order. I contacted the restaurant to find out if there were two orders so I know there was no reason for the food to be cold. The order I received had the initial time of the first order I placed. I contact support again for a full refund cause everything is freezing cold. Instead they give me $5 off my next purchase. Deleting my account and the app.

title: Better than Doordash
review: So I‚Äôve always used different delivery services and Grubhub always hits the right spot. I‚Äôm so disappointed to see a lot of bad reviews on Grubhub, because there‚Äôs a lot of better support on Grubhub vs Doordash and Grubhub is an ethical service. My guess is on the App Store, Doordash dominates Grubhub unfairly. If you actually compare the prices from Doordash and Grubhub disregarding the prices, Doordash charges a lot more. And lastly Grubhub takes long, but somehow the food is always still magically warm? Compared to most delivery services? As a customer I hope that Grubhub get the recognition it deserves and doesn‚Äôt change.

title: The drivers on this app take the foods hostage
review: My delivery driver contacted me and told me if you want your food come outside of building complex then he suddenly left when he was in front of the gate and said he thought his gas is low and can‚Äôt make it to fourth floor and when I told him I gonna report it he said I gonna tell grub hun you don‚Äôt want your food?!!! Extremely experience ‚Ä¶ then I contacted customer service the customer service said you want refund or your food?‚Ä¶ I never seen such an experience with Uber Eats or Favor‚Ä¶.these all happened while I have already left same instruction that all other delivery app easily delivered the food‚Ä¶ and the customer service ended the chat too soon before I can say my request completely‚Ä¶ these all happened while my order was expensive and I left a good tip!!

title: No Control
review: GrubHub has no control over your order. They are just there to take a fee. Customer service is very polite, but useless. Once you place an order, you have to hope for the best. Maybe it will be there on time, maybe it will be an hour late. Maybe your courier will pick up your order when it is ready or take a nap, grab some lunch, take a few trips via some ride app or just sit at home watching tv and cancel 45 minutes after your food was ready. You can‚Äôt blame the restaurant, can‚Äôt switch drivers even if they aren‚Äôt moving for 30 minutes, and you can‚Äôt edit a tip. Even if you could edit the tip, the person who made you wait an extra hour canceled so you would be punishing an innocent courier.

title: Terrible
review: I‚Äôve tried multiple times with this company. So many times they string you along with an order and tell you someone is on their way when in truth there‚Äôs no one coming and the order isn‚Äôt on its way. And nearly all of not all orders that do make it have issues. This is the worst, in my experience, of any of the delivery apps. And barring the Bezos investment, I fully expect this company to fail. The product and service is terrible. The customer service is terrible. And I don‚Äôt need to sell it any harder than that. As soon as anyone uses it, they will realize how bad it is and be sad about the fact they‚Äôve downloaded it at all. Jeff, wish you would have brought us something, but this company is terrible. Its customer service is terrible, and it‚Äôs a drag on your brand.

title: Worst Customer Service! I‚Äôve canceled my subscription
review: After several mishaps and simply just getting my money back each time after not receiving food or waiting hours for it I‚Äôm done!  The final straw was getting the wrong food from a different restaurant that contained food I‚Äôm allergic to and having Bryon tell me I‚Äôll get my money back within 3-5 business days.  Nothing for my time.  Restaurant was closed once everything was said and done and I ended up not having enough money to eat that night.  Canceled my subscription and will NEVER use this crappy app again!  I know two grub hub drivers and they tell me how crappy this service is to work for and will also not drive for them anymore.  If you have one, please cancel your subscription and leave this app in the dust.

title: DONT WAST UR MONEY NOR TIME ON THIS APP!!!
review: Had to make a second account to order food because my account that I only had access to was disabled because they felt like it just for them to do it a second time. When I reach out for assistance I get a sorry there is nothing we can for you besides give you the run around and make you wait for a response from a special department that has no name that will never be received as I am still waiting for the response from my first account which was stated to be sent within 48 hours from the time Grubhub decided to disable my account, that was about a month ago. This app is not worth time time. Stuck with UberEats they might be a lil more expensive but they are more professional. Especially their customer service. Do better GrubHub

title: Lack of Online Coupon Acceptance
review:
Subway does this because it has franchises as individual owners, and screws the bottom line, but Arbys could easily get a boost in business if they put QR codes on their coupons. 

Sure, they lose out on a dollar or something for every one, but corporations can easily afford to do this. People don‚Äôt have cars, and when the weather gets rough for people who bike from place to place, things can get out of hand. Plus, it gives the coupons people usually throw away a solid use, while also giving people a means to get their money‚Äôs worth.

If college students get a ton of these in their mail every week, then why not make them worth the gas, paper, and landfill waste? Arbys can do better here, and it‚Äôd be great to see that happen.

title: App works. But service is terrible.
review: I tried grub hub plus. First ordered I ordered the items where prepared incorrectly. Not a huge deal. Just missing condiments on all 3 of your meals. The second order the food was all wrong. Missing items. Incorrect burgers wrong condiments. The only thing they got right was the beverage and sides. The third order when the food arrived it was from a completely different restaurant that we ordered from. We gave the food back to the driver because it wasn‚Äôt our food. When we contact grub hub they said the have to do research on our Order and can take up to 10 days. They are holding my money with food that wasn‚Äôt even delivered. So now I might be out of some money and a hungry family. Do yourself a favor and don‚Äôt order from grub hub.

title: timeframe and cancelations
review:
honestly-  NOT the best when it comes to order updates and (if ordered 2 places to be delivered same time - dinner and desert for example- the order get assigned to diff people or the same driver goes back and forth needlessly :(  not good for the drivers! 
as well as HALF my orders have been canceled with no reason fraking listed. like how door dash if out of the one item from wendys they just cancel full thing... but at least they listed the reason while they were stil in business ... 
otherwise when grub hub does work-  food always still hot when finally does arrive and the drivers are very awesome for doing what they do.  hence why system should check in on a few details of operation.

title: App is so frustrating
review:
Any app that forces you to go through their crazy menu drilldown for support instead of just having a support@ email is super shady.

After my order was completely messed up, I went through GrubHub‚Äôs predetermined flow in their app and I got a 1 cent refund. #1 that is a total bull refund amount. Hoping your customers won‚Äôt notice? #2 it took me way too long to even find out where I could talk to a real human. Hoping that a hard-to-find option of real support means GrubHub is hoping that people will just give up when they need help instead of fixing their crappy policies. #3 the human I actually chatted with was incredibly helpful and solved my issue in less than a minute. They asked for me to rate them and I gladly wanted to rate them well. The option came up as ‚ÄúGood üëç‚Äù or ‚ÄúBad üëé‚Äù but this app is so bad I couldn‚Äôt even click the button to rate them!

The only reason I‚Äôm even leaving this review is that there are ZERO options to report a bug directly to grubhub. Such a waste of time. 

My orders are constantly messed up and there is no recourse. I‚Äôm just going to call restaurants directly from now on.

title: Terrible customer service, doesnt even work.
review: Waited over almost an hour for my food, saw it was delayed and got a feeling something was wrong as my food apparently hadnt even begun to be prepared. Went to cancel my order, and instead of simply letting me cancel my order they made me text with a customer service representative who I am quite certain wasn't even a real person. Found out my order had been "rejected" and I probably wouldnt have even known this unless I cancelled it. The only other time ive tried to use this app was months ago in July of last year, and the same thing happened. Don't touch this with a ten foot pole, and im sure im going to get a robotic response to this review begging me to change my rating like everyone else who gave a bad review.

title: Horrid customer service
review: Zero stars. I just finally deleted my account after multiple terrible experiences with botched deliveries and uncaring customer service agents. This last time was similar to the previous - I literally waited for an hour and a half, got a message that my delivery was complete (nope, no food here!!) and the only response was ‚Äúwould you like a redelivery in an estimated 50 minutes?‚Äù No, I absolutely would not like to wait almost another hour for your incompetent delivery service. Also, the word ‚Äúredelivery‚Äù implies there first was an original delivery, which was not the case. The chat agent never offered a sincere apology or any kind of redeeming gesture. Then I got an email for a $10 credit for THE NEXT time I make an order. Lol, $10! Nope. Done with GrubHub.

title: Rude Calling Staff & Bad Canceling System
review: I take orders that are called into our business, and no one has ever told me I'm bad at what I do. However, the person taking the order just today had a mild accent, so I had to ask if she could repeat a particular item. Why aren't you familiar with the menu, the lady replies in a harsh manner. I once expressed regret to her for not hearing what she had to say. Instead of politely repeating the phrase back, this woman continues to blast the phrase at me. Additionally, even if it doesn't concern me, every time someone cancels an order on Grubhub, the business does not opt to at the very least phone the restaurant to inform them that the order has been canceled. As a result, the restaurant wastes food as well as time and money. I anticipate more from a firm that size.

title: Customer Service is Non-Existent
review: The app works fine, which is why I gave it 3 stars, however there is a severe lack of customer service. If your order is wrong, it just refunds the cost of the item that is wrong. You have to hunt for the chat option and they can‚Äôt do anything but recite what the GH+ membership includes. What if I wanted the correct food still? What about the service fees? I just spent $20 on food that I can‚Äôt eat and had to give to a coworker because it was incorrectly made and I have dietary restrictions. But I got $8 back so apparently that‚Äôs fair. This is where there is a monumental difference between GH and DoorDash. I will be going back to DD.

title: BAD
review: I ordered from a cookie place and it said it was going to be here in like 30-45 mins so I was like ok. It has passed an hour and some minutes since I ordered and I called the cookie place I ordered from and they said they couldn‚Äôt do anything so I called the customer service number and it TOOK SO LONG for the lady to give me my money back. The next day we went outside and the cookies were on the ground. Mind you, I kept going outside to check to see if they were there. When the cookies got there the delivery guy could have at least knocked on the door but instead they decided to come at like 3:00 in the morning and sit them by the door. I was up all night so I could have gone down there to get them. They have terrible customer service‚Ä¶

title: Terrible, terrible customer service
review: Where to begin‚Ä¶ this company is truly terrible when it comes to customer service. I‚Äôve given them and their terrible customer service modal way too many tries. The latest fiasco, they blocked me from ordering using my credit card but were perfectly fine taking my money from the same credit card for Grubhub+. All this after blocking my account bc I tried ordering food for my parents who were out of town. After contacting customer service 5 days in a row trying to regain my account, I got no answers, just empty promises that another team was ‚Äúworking‚Äù on it. I‚Äôm frankly done with Grubhub. I would rather pay more on other delivery apps than deal with this garbage system ever again.

title: Grubhub payment problem
review:
There is this issue with my account where I‚Äôll pay for grubhub + and when I try to place an order, my account says I have no grubhub plus membership- essentially just stealing my money. When I contact customer service regarding the issue they say they have no record of me being a grubhub + member but can refund me the charge. How does that make sense? There is clearly a charge for the amount of the membership and yet they say they don‚Äôt know anything about it. 
Not only that but whenever I try to place an order (without) the membership, it gets immediately cancelled. I‚Äôve also contacted them about the issue but they say it must be a glitch. They give me no solution. 
I‚Äôve switched to DoorDash since then.

title: Please add a major necessity
review: Awhile ago I ordered food and I was honestly so hungry that I didn‚Äôt even pay attention to the tip amount. I felt terrible tipping only $1 and went to change it once I noticed but was unable to. I would have given a cash tip but I didn‚Äôt have cash on hand so unfortunately the driver got only $1. Please, this shouldn‚Äôt be a thing and I feel like you guys are kind of punishing the drivers for my own incompetence in a way. Will change to 5 stars once it‚Äôs added. It doesn‚Äôt hurt you in any way and benefits your drivers more than anyone. Happy drivers, happy customers lead to a happy company overall.

title: Convenience/ customer service
review:
I travel with my job often, and have enjoyed grubhub for convenience.
I was paying $10+ a month for the service.
However I cancelled today. The reason being that I couldn‚Äôt order from a restaurant i ordered from last night because my credit card was put on hold for 48 hours. Why? Plenty of $ there?Customer service says for my protection??? But i can use the app in 48 hours. Well that doesn‚Äôt do me any good  now. The other weird thing is i could order if i was picking up, or wanted my food asap‚Ä¶?
I called customer support and they were more than happy to cancel my membership instead of helping me solve the problem.

title: No customer service
review:
If you are a restaurant.. don‚Äôt 
If you are a consumer.. there are others Seamless isn‚Äôt the one. 

5 stars to get attention. This deserves one star. Customer service is insanely horrible. 

This last experience resulted in this review. I‚Äôve been disconnected from customer service and have had questions that were refused to be answered. 

This time was hilarious. 

My driver gave us a pizza from another restaurant, the wrong size and cold. No problem, but going to customer service was crazier. I asked for a refund, the asked if I could get the $$ right away to use I also asked if they had expedited delivery on Seamless. This person told me they couldn‚Äôt refund, I‚Äôd have to wait 3-5 days.. fine, what‚Äôs the total? I was told to check my email.. 

I asked what about my other question.. this person answered,‚Äùnothing.‚Äù 

Nothing? Lol hilarious.. 

Seamless is horrible

title: Long delivery times, cold food.
review:
I used DoorDash for a couple years and just canceled because I was bored of the same restaurants, their drivers suddenly started delivering my food to the wrong house, and I had to reorder and hope they got it right.
I switched to Grubhub and at first I loved it. The problem is if you order something far it comes faster than if you want something from a spot close by. I ordered from a McDonalds thats 5 min away and its been over an hour. The driver picked my food up but has been doing other deliveries. Now my food will be cold and at this point Id rather have loaded my newborn up in the car to just drive down there so I can have a warm meal.

title: Drivers lose their tips
review:
Yesterday I had ordered Dairy Queen and additional toast, but when it got here it wasnt toasted and was just soggy warm bread. The driver was amazing and even made it inside to put the food by my door rather than just outside, so I gave them an additional tip. Afterwards I made a claim with the toast and they refunded me everything. Tip included, with no warning. I told them that had they told me the driver tip would have refunded, I would have opted out of the refund.

They gave no warning and when I asked if there was no way around that, I get told ‚ÄúThey make salary anyway‚Äù. Tips can be everything to a driver and it was such a negative interaction that I wont be using the service again. Treat your drivers better, Grubhub (and any 3rd party delivery service).

title: A mess
review: Grub hub used to be my go to. However why do you allow drivers to pickup multiple orders in various places. That defeats the purpose of arrival times. Lately I‚Äôve been getting drivers getting my order picking up my food and then are all over town in the opposite direction of my location. Arrival times get changed about 3 times. Then my foods cold and gross. I understand I can go to the restaurant and pick it up myself, but grub hub if your offering a service and I‚Äôm paying for it then do what you say your business does. Also customer service is like talking to a wall. They just wave a $5 coupon to make you basically deal with whatever problem you have. They don‚Äôt even try to help. Grub hub has gone downhill big time.

title: Cant change payment methods
review: I use Grubhub through my university‚Äôs meal plan, and it‚Äôs been working fine up until yesterday. Now, I cannot change the payment method between using meal swipes to using regular dining money. Each time I click it, the options to change pop up for less than 1 second before going away and remaining at the selection I had before, which I don‚Äôt want. It‚Äôs making it very hard to get food as many dining locations order through grubhub only. I think this may be because of the bug update from 6 days ago, but it‚Äôs made my experience worse.

title: terrible customer service
review: ordered from a restaurant that is ten minutes away from my house and it took over an hour to get to my destination. while this place is popular in my area, there is no reason as to why our driver took over thirty minutes to get to the restaurant and take over forty minutes to drive to my place. we attempted to reach out to the driver only to be met with an answering machine (why even have the option if it doesn‚Äôt work). finally got our food and it was COLD. tried talking to customer service and they only offered 5$ credit for a 50$ meal per a dumb policy that does not put the customer‚Äôs needs as a priority. absolutely ridiculous. will never be using this service again.

title: Scam and hacks
review:
Be very careful when you use this platform, check your bank account for unauthorized transactions from this company. I‚Äôm aware as the last month I‚Äôve had 3 different unauthorized uses of my debit card from this company, 2 in Chicago and 1 in California, this is not a safe place to order food,
if you‚Äôre going to use your debit/credit card one way or another this company do not protect your financial information and let others use your cards, it can be someone working for them or their poor security system that allows hackers to get your card information.
this is not a safe place to order food online anymore as your card most likely will be used for someone else.
CHECK YOUR BANK ACCOUNT

title: Nothing like paying TWICE for nothing.
review:
I used the app to arrange for a Thanksgiving dinner to be delivered to my mom and her neighbor, and used PayPal for the $77 total.  Two days before thanksgiving, I get a call that a) the order has been canceled, b) I will have to wait for at least a week to get my money back, and c) I can reorder if needed.  

So, I tried again, and the order was immediately cancelled a second time BUT they took the $77 out of my PayPal again.  That‚Äôs $154 tied up for over a week!  Not to mention having to explain to my mom that her happily anticipated Thanksgiving dinner won‚Äôt be coming.  

I‚Äôm absolutely fuming, and if I could give them a negative rating on the app, I would.  As soon as I get EVERYTHING, every penny, back, I‚Äôm deleting this app.

title: A food delivery App
review: If you‚Äôre not familiar with the process of requesting food on a hand held device‚Ä¶.How are you using a phone???? Return to the drive thru from hence thou cometh. Yeah, its getting a bit inflated these days. And yet, I am still using this age old device to continue working for my corporate overlords with little time to actually clean, prep, and assemble mid day meals. Tip appropriately, as you realize you could‚Äôve driven the extra 30+ minutes in traffic to and from the place of food creation. Happy Grub Hubbin‚Äô!

title: Officially fed up (but not fed)
review: I cannot tell you how many times my order never gets delivered but marked delivered. Drivers don‚Äôt even attempt to contact you even though I have clear directions to do so in my order. They just keep the food, mark it delivered and drive off. Unlike other delivery apps, they‚Äôre not required to take a picture of proof of delivery. I will say at least customer support reorders it for me or gives a refund but I‚Äôm ordering food when I‚Äôm in a rush with limited time and I don‚Äôt have time to wait another hour for the re-order. Plus you tip the driver beforehand so these drivers get away with my money and my food. Trust me the way this company operates their business is not worth your time.

title: I love Grubhub!
review: The app is great and makes it easy to order food online from the best restaurants in town.  It‚Äôs also a great place to find new restaurants and try different things.  I order delivery and pickup all the time and my order has been correct every time but once and Grubhub gave a refund with no hassle.  Sign up for Grubhub plus!  It is worth every penny! It pays for itself after three deliveries plus you get a lot of awesome discounts and freebies from the restaurants and Grubhub!

title: Don‚Äôt expect to get your orders
review: Multiple times in the same week I have had my orders delayed for over 2 hours or never received at all after saying they had been delivered. Only after berating the first customer service person and being transferred to a supervisor then threatening to just have your credit card issue a chargeback will you be offered a refund. Initially they want to give you coupons for future orders. Like who wants to continue to use a service that‚Äôs unreliable. I would not recommend Grubhub to anyone. They can‚Äôt even contact their drivers when an issue arises. I have never experienced a more incompetent business and will never use their service again.

title: A joke of a service
review: This is somehow the worst delivery and customer service. I‚Äôve had food stolen, delivered to the wrong place, missing food items, customer services not providing solutions, and delivery drivers admitting they don‚Äôt read delivery instructions. The final straw was ordering food and then it being delivered almost an hour later where the food was cold and soggy. The solution, after I had spent almost $30, was a $5 credit to my account. I assume people order hot food so they don‚Äôt have to cook and here you are then having to heat up your food anyway. After I use up the joke of a $5 credit (that will cover the delivery fee and MAYBE tax if lucky) I will no longer use this service. It‚Äôs a joke.

title: I have had to cancel two orders this week because of simple and avoidable mistakes
review:
First time:

I ordered lunch and the driver arrived, did not call me, ‚Äúdelivered‚Äù the food in my apartment lobby and when i went down to get it, nothing was there. 

- there needs to be a better system of communication with the driver and the customer. Drivers want to get as many deliveries as they can and so they wont even wait a minute, and sometimes it works but sometimes they loose the food. 

Second time: 

I ordered breakfast this morning, and when i checked the map, my driver was very far from both my home and the restaurant. When i called him he said that the restaurant was closed and he had just kept working. I did not get a notification from him, and the app said that the restaurant was open. 

- The app cannot offer food from restaurants that are not open. And if they are closed, again, there needs to be a better system of communication between the driver and customer so i can know that it was closed, instead of just waiting 20 minutes.

title: Dishonest Drivers
review: Over 5 times I ordered from Grubhub, the drivers pick up the food and cancel the order when they get close enough to you, they actually get to keep your food. The other times they delivery driver calls me to drive to them to pick up my food, whats the point of the delivery if I have to drove to pick it up. Worse food delivery service and I will never ever use their service again. Customer Service is no help either.

title: Terrible service
review:
I put in the delivery instructions for which entrance to where I work at, the drivers refused to follow the instructions. They dropped it off at tool rental or the pro desk, sometimes nasty to my co workers, before leaving.

The final straw for this app I had was that I put my house as the address and the food was delivered to my work instead. When I contacted the help desk all I was offered as compensation was 60 day free membership for the fact that I had to drive to pick up my food. When I went into the app the next day there was no member ship and I couldn‚Äôt even get in contact with their help. Both Grubhub and doordash have messed up too many times to accept paying these exorbitant fees.

title: Not so great lately
review: The added cost is getting to be ridiculous. Even with a subscription, I find myself paying an extra $5-10 not including a tip for the driver which I feel like is the only extra I should really pay. I‚Äôll often order from a location that is a couple miles, maybe 3min from my house & often times it will take 1-2 hours for the items to arrive. Usually old, cold, or just missing items. I find myself returning of course for the convenience, fully expecting a long wait & not so fresh food. I try to order accordingly & only order when I really don‚Äôt want to leave.

title: Problems with some menu items and high price markup
review: A software bug prevents us from ordering our favorite dishes through Grubhub. At a place near us, entrees come with a selection of 2 required sides, but when one is selected for each, the app says too many items were selected. But since both sides are required selections, if we don‚Äôt pick a side for each entry, the button for adding to bag is grayed out and we can‚Äôt order the item. This happens for all entrees at Roasters in Sandy Springs and none can be ordered through the app. We‚Äôve been hoping it would be fixed, but it hasn‚Äôt yet and it‚Äôs very frustrating.

title: Lowest End Delivery App
review: i use postmares, uber eats, grubhub and doordash. i pay for premium for all of these services. grubhub is by far the lowest end of them all. out of 10 deliveries, 8 of the delivery drivers do not speak english. one of my drivers did not contact me and just marked as delivered and after contacting support, they jst refunded my order and expected me to be content with that. grubhub has the lowest standards for their drivers, worst app ui and i would happily pay slightly more to use other delivery apps. edit: why are you asking me to contact support again? ive already contacted support and tried multiple times after my order to try to get in contact but you guys did nothing, so‚Ä¶ ???

title: Terrible customer service and app does not work
review:
I ordered food and when I went to check the status near the time of my provided delivery window, it had said it had been delivered 30 minutes before. I checked all around the house and at all the neighbors and nothing. I was unable to go back and see my driver or rate them or anything and customer service was not able to give me any information on what happened. I didn‚Äôt receive any updates despite having text updates on. Customer service only offered to reorder my food which also arrived late. 

I will never use grubhub and will also tell anyone who listens to use a different app.

title: Ordering through GrubHub is expensive but it's guaranteed  if you're not satisfied
review: GrubHub gives you a guarantee that if you're not happy with the food or the food is late or cold you get your money back you refunded it doesn't really change the fact that when you're hungry you want to have something to write but at least you get a refund so if you're gonna order food I guess it's the best place to use Grubhub at your service

title: Almost restored confidence?
review:
The last several times I‚Äôve ordered using Grubhub were epic Fails.  
This order was super fast, and everything was there!!  I‚Äôve written you guys off so many times and for some reason keep coming back and putting myself through it, because at first you guys were so good!  The girl that did my order yesterday was perfect.  Time will tell for sure, but thank the girl that did my order yesterday‚Ä¶she ROCKED.

title: Terrible!
review: I updated my contact information weeks ago but when the delivery person needed to call me, he had my old telephone number. He gave me a hard time for not updating my contact number. I checked and my profile was accurate, including my new number. I called the restaurant who advised that my old number came up with my order. After 20 minutes, on chat, the Grubhub/Seamless rep told me to update my profile (which I explained that I did so weeks ago). She then, accusatorially, blamed me because I‚Äôve had ‚Äú11 addresses‚Äù on file. When I checked that, I saw that I have my home, work and 2nd job addresses in my profile. None have the old profile info.

title: Incompetence & Horrid Customer Service
review: I had three separate orders to three different places canceled over an hour after I placed the orders, after the drivers drove all the way over to pick it up. This was in the same night because I kept trying different places. Restaurants confirm orders, and then when the drivers get there they don‚Äôt have the items that they confirm they have & just cancel the order on you.  The customer service representatives offer to do nothing to help you and don‚Äôt care. The drivers don‚Äôt communicate when you reach out to them. No one calls to ask about substitutions. The whole thing is a waste of time and money.

title: Irresponsible employer of vicious drivers
review: Recently, I placed an order for my elderly mother. The driver dropped the food at the house next door, the proceeded to curse me out when I asked where she left the food. Apparently she was too stupid to notice no one lived at the house next door. This wouldn‚Äôt have been a problem except that I live in another state and my mother was unable to walk to the neighbor‚Äôs house on her own. Grubhub needs to better assess the basic intelligence of their drivers in the suburbs. I‚Äôve never had a problem in the city. But the suburban drivers are viscous. Had to have the order refunded b/c Grubhub could not guarantee the same moron wouldn‚Äôt be the driver of the order was redelivered.

title: Let me use Promo codes
review: These delivery apps were incredibly convenient creations, however, it‚Äôs absolutely ridiculous that they won‚Äôt let you use promo codes unless you‚Äôre a brand new customer. Also, why are items on the menu more expensive than the price directly from the store. If the price is 30% higher, then why is there a delivery fee? If someone would just invent a way for me to get items at menu price and only pay a delivery fee, you could put these shiesty businesses out of business and collect all the business and money for yourself. Think about it people!

title: Disappointing Service
review: I placed an order at a restaurant more than an hour before they closed, and then received a message that my order was being prepared. 15 minutes before my order was supposed to be delivered they cancelled my order, saying it was because the restaurant was closing. But, I sent my order well in advance of them closing, and it should have been easy to fulfill my order on time.
