Then they call and say only that I was refunded, but there‚Äôs no recourse for the fact that despite putting in my order early and waiting 45 minutes, they didn‚Äôt get there on time to place my order before the restaurant‚Äôs closing.

title: Drivers frequently game the system
review:
I frequently have issues with drivers being late or abandoning the order.  Too often you can see that they are making pickups and drop offs for other delivery services before satisfying Grubhub orders.  

They change the delivery time to meet their needs without consideration for the impact upon the food and the customer.  They never apologize.

I get that people are trying to earn a living, but delivering cold food that I‚Äôm having to pay a premium for is very frustrating.  Take pride in your work or don‚Äôt do it.  A $5 discount for missing the delivery window by an hour just doesn‚Äôt bring satisfaction.

title: They‚Äôre never going to pick up your food
review: I work at a cafe and yesterday someone called us to see if we were open because their delivery time kept getting pushed back and I had to tell them the driver just hasn‚Äôt shown up yet. Five hours later the food was still there and my shift was over. It‚Äôs actually becoming a joke in my cafe that they‚Äôre never going to pick up the food.

title: Consistent order mistakes
review:
9/10 times you place an order on this app it‚Äôll be wrong. That‚Äôs not including missing utensils/straws (that almost always happens), I‚Äôm talking strictly about the food. It‚Äôs good that the refunds are quick, but it gets tiring to always have to deal with a problem whenever your order arrives. I‚Äôve only ever had my order show up correctly a few times, and at this point I‚Äôm thinking of trying a different service.

EDIT: The link customer service responded to this post with doesn‚Äôt work, that should about sum up the disfunction I‚Äôm talking about

title: DO NOT USE
review: I have used this service to order breakfast or lunch at work. I‚Äôm not sure who they hire as their drivers but twice these driver have given my food to the wrong person. EVEN THOUGH I HAVE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THEM TO CALL AND SPEAK TO ME. I work in healthcare so I don‚Äôt always have time to grab lunch or breakfast for work and depended on them to get me my order. They gave me a free Grubhub upgrade pass that does not reduce the cost like they advertise. So save your money. And now they are offering me $10 to make up for the fact that I waited an hour for my food and the driver just gave my food to the first person they saw. I am so disappointed in Grubhub. You can do better when hiring.

title: Grub hub Experience
review: I have had nothing but problems with uber and door dash. Drivers are always in a rush and don‚Äôt grab all the good. The companies try to blame the location and I call location and food is still there never picked up. After being ripped off again. I tried grub and gin you knocked it outside of the park. Food was on time. Piping hot nothing spilled, broken or missing. Thank you so much. Looks like it‚Äôs grub hub for me

title: Awful experience, not going to use grub hub again
review: My fianc√© and I ordered food tonight and decided to go with grub hub. I would‚Äôve gotten the food myself but I have been sick all week with the flu. We thought that it would be more convenient to have it delivered. It took thirty minutes longer to arrive than it said it would. When we finally got our food, the packaging was smashed and the food was ice cold. I call grub hubs call center and the most they could do is give me a 5 dollar coupon to use for the next time I use grub hub. I spent 50 bucks on this meal. The best they could do is give me a five dollar coupon. I do not plan on using grub hub again

title: Scam!!!!!
review: I ordered nachos from a restaurant late at night as I didn‚Äôt eat dinner, and the driver said it was dropped off. There was no order on my porch or any of the neighbors. I called grub hub and they refused to contact the driver and the only thing they could offer me was a refund even though it was too late to order anywhere else. They also included a coupon for my next order- which turns out was a lousy 2$. I have no idea why they can‚Äôt call their employee minutes have supposed drop off and find out where they dropped it off. So infuriating!!! At least DoorDash includes pictures of their drop offs so there is no confusion or scamming.

title: Too many fees
review: System works great, food is always good and the communication of my order status is top notch, but there are just way too many fees.  You have to pay a delivery fee, a service fee, a tip, and the price of the food is higher on Grubhub than you would pay at the restaurant. Add the monthly fee to that and it‚Äôs just crazy how much you‚Äôre paying if you keep track! We only use Grubhub when we can‚Äôt go pick up ourselves for some reason.

title: Terrible customer service
review:
I never had a bad experience until this week. I ordered some food thinking it was close by so I could pick up- it wasnt. 
Therefore I cancelled the food. They wouldnt refund my money so I chatted w customer service, Hugo, and somehow the chat ended before I could make a choice. 
They sent me a $15 coupon that I could only use IF I purchased something $15+ without taxes and fees. That means I would be paying more money! 
I talked to another lady to sort it out, Brittany L, and before I could answer she ended the chat on me too. Absolutely terrible customer service. She gave me 10 secs to reply back before ending. If only I could post the ss.

title: Outdoor Floors are not for food!
review: I‚Äôve had a number of issues with GrubHub delivery most recently. The driver will drop the food at the doorstep and walk away. I later, sometimes, will get a text indicating that the food has been delivered. Unfortunately, this notification comes to me as late as 20 minutes which means that my food is cold and then two cases raccoons have gotten to it. Not appreciating the lack of care these drivers show even though in my delivery instructions, I specifically indicate not to put it on the floor.

title: Horrible lazy drivers! Lazy App design!
review:
I‚Äôm going to stop using Grubhub and go back up Uber eats! Grubhub drivers never follow delivery instructions and yet I have no way to void / remove tips for poor service unless I contact Grubhub and spend 30min in que!

Other apps I can add or remove tips after the delivery myself but Grubhub automatically gives the tip and makes it hard to remove it making their drivers lazy and feeling entitled to something that is earned through hard work and good service!

Also for crying out loud add a option for basement apartment in your address fields! Using delivery instructions for it when your drivers don‚Äôt read them or can‚Äôt read them is ridiculous!

And finally vet your drivers! Half the time my orders are delivered by people who look nothing like the photo (picture 20yo white lady / delivered by 50yo Hispanic male) 

Makes me think Grubhub is enabling identify theft or providing means for those ineligible for work in this country to circumvent their illegal status!

title: Thank you Grubhub üôèüèª
review: I‚Äôm a full time student and single mom and I lost both my parents a long time ago. My moms cooking was my life. Grubhub comes in handy when i miss warm homemade food and I don‚Äôt have the wherewithal to make food for just myself. Now I know why my mom never wanted to cook for just her only if I was eating dinner too! It‚Äôs hard. Im probably being dumb and spending too much money but hey this service is keeping me alive. üôÇ

title: My first review was deleted
review:
So now my review is one star. I have a premium subscription to Grub Hub, and I regret signing up. It was free through my bank, but I will no longer use the service because my orders get canceled and delayed. I get a credit for the cancellation, but it doesn‚Äôt compensate for the inconvenience. 

Maybe my first review was too vague, so let me clarify: you would be better off using a better delivery service or getting it yourself if you are non-disabled. Don‚Äôt waste your time trying to depend on Grub Hub. 

My previous review was two stars, but I knocked it down an extra star for being inconvenienced again by rewriting my review.

title: Horrible customer service
review: I pay 20$ a month for free delivery. I tried to order tonight and it says they cannot deliver to me. I tried 3 different restaurants. I called customer service and they told me they couldn‚Äôt tell me why I can‚Äôt order food. They said I would get an email in 3-4 days, which is obviously no help tonight. My credit card was charged for each of the deliveries they can‚Äôt deliver, they said I have to also wait 5-7 days for that to be refunded. I guess this service is okay if you have money to spend on food that will never come and that you have to wait a week to have refunded. Not for me!

title: A price gauging monopoly. very low ethical standards
review:
What grubhub has done has destroyed the restaurant business, they‚Äôve choked restaurants for a high percentage of their profits - they‚Äôre left with no choice but to work through grubhub to survive  

They dont pay their delivery workers enough and instead put the social pressure on the customer to pay the wage of their workers. A disgusting corporate tactic becoming more and more the norm. 

Companies like this work because in the beginning everything is so convenient and inexpensive, then, once they have everyone hooked on their system, they raise the service fees, they add another hidden fee, they rip the rug right out from under you and now were paying 15$ in fees BEFORE even tipping the only person actually doing the work, the driver, who makes next to nothing. 

I use it now, but the moment there is a more ethical and customer friendly company grubhub will never see another dollar from me. I look forward to it

title: Efficient & Professional but pricey
review: Best drivers. Efficient, professional, & food comes closed in packaging so it seems safe but the price to order with all the fees adds up quick. I only order from 3rd party delivery sites when I‚Äôm being really lazy or sick or use a place that doesn‚Äôt have their own delivery ppl. It‚Äôs an expensive last resort, yet reliable. Way better than door-dash drivers who typically just don't care and will argue

title: Poor delivery service
review: My first (yesterday) experience did not go well at all. Took 2 hours for delivery. It appeared the driver was overloaded with deliveries. When driver arrived, she refused to bring my order inside. I‚Äôm in a wheelchair. My oxygen tube will not reach the front door. Driver was informed of this before she picked up the order. Very disappointing service. I‚Äôm going to try again today and go from there. Hopefully with a different driver. GrubHub has a wonderful website and I‚Äôm looking forward to continued use.

title: Dual Payment: Corporate Gift Card
review: I tried to use my corporate gift card along with using my own Apple Pay card for the additional charges (over the amount of the gift card). However, I received an error that multiple payment types wasn‚Äôt allowed. I was trying to spend an additional 1.5 the amount of the gift card. Is this intentional or a possible bug? Otherwise, the App‚Äôs UI is very aesthetic pleasing!

title: Not what it used to be
review: Deliveries frequently show up long after the estimated delivery time. This usually means an hour or longer after the order was placed. Delivery drivers lie about pick up time, which is ridiculous because their location is displayed on the app. Drivers frequently refuse to get out of their cars to drop off food, expecting customers to come to them. Why do we even tip for such poor service? Why can‚Äôt we tip after the food has been delivered? The delivery fees just keep getting higher too.

title: Frequently Down
review: Grubhub is a glitchy app that often is very frustrating to use. It has wasted lots of time while trying to order a meal when I first started using it. I have since very rarely opened the app, often times it still had the same issues. However I have not encountered the same errors while ordering today, I don't know if their server infrastructure is improving or if I'm just lucky. I would like to use the service more, but I'm not sure if I would consider it reliable. The drivers on the other hand are generally great and deliver the food warm usually.

title: FORGET HALF MY MEAL EVERYTIME!!!
review: I only use Grubhub because my work gives me credit. I have ordered it and been missing half of my meal 7 out of 10 times. I just ordered a combo from Wendy‚Äôs and I am missing my sandwich‚Ä¶ my sandwich which is the main part of the order. Is there no policy to check whether or not the food is in the bag before it gets delivered?! There was no seal on the bag to show it wasn‚Äôt opened by the driver. Are the drivers take part or my order? I don‚Äôt have this issue near as much on Dash Dash. I‚Äôm tried of waiting for my lunch just to not eat‚Ä¶ and then having to complain for my refund‚Ä¶

title: Reliable
review: In the past, I‚Äôve had restaurant issues delivering the wrong order or missing part of the order, or even no-order and GrubHub has always been very RELIABLE in correcting or solving or just making it right with me. Good customer service goes a long way- a quality that‚Äôs hard to find now a days. Keep up the good work GrubHub.

title: On point
review: The restaurant and places listed along with the me yea give me more options than the other food del apps do so shout out to grub hub I get the deals you would get if you go through the drive thru. For example door dash won‚Äôt have every deal or item you might have when going in person so I love that I know what I want and it‚Äôs always there.

title: Beware of cancellations without any explanation!
review: Ordered food 1 day ahead to be delivered at a particular time and had it cancelled 1 hr before delivery time without any explanation. That is irritating and a waste of my time. Reordered from the same restaurant and had no issue with same-day ordering. Grubhub needs to get its act together. At least give a proper explanation like ‚Äúsomeone messed up and didn‚Äôt put your order in‚Äù or something cause it‚Äôs obviously not that I couldn‚Äôt order from the restaurant since I did! Aggravating and time-wasting.

title: Better than Uber Eats
review: You may find the same restaurant at Uber eats but somehow there cheaper on here. Delivery is also faster . Once order is Placed a driver is sent immediately to the restaurant. Very convenient. Variety of restaurants to choose from. App is easy to navigate . No problems with making payments. Definitely recommend using it .

title: Do not buy a ticket thru Eventbrite
review: There is no customer service. The number they list is a mailbox that says, we don‚Äôt monitor this mailbox. Call it. If I didn‚Äôt have a problem it would be hilarious. They only take your money and no way to fix a problem. $$$ gone. They happily answer and email if you want to use them for something tho. I wish I read the reviews before I used them for something. Don‚Äôt believe anything about a customer service number or email. They send you to a FAQ which doesn‚Äôt solve anything. Apple should delete then from there store.

title: Worst delivery service
review: Orders are constantly late. Sends drivers to wrong address. Whenever I order I get one ETA then when that time passes I receive an updated eta for 30+ minutes into the future. I app will say driver has your order but the location can‚Äôt be tracked and it still shows as being at the restaurant. Once I upgraded to free delivery the actual prices went up and delivery times are consistently 50 minutes. After numerous mishaps and random order cancelations after an hour of waiting for an order I will never use this service again.

title: My Very First Grubhub Order
review: I was very pleased with my first Grubhub order. I am now a fan and will be ordering often. The fees were more than reasonable and the delivery went smoothly. Grubhub has a chat feature to address any issues that customers might have. The agent, Mark, went out of his way to add on an √° la carte item that I had forgotten to order. Great service!

title: Disappointed with the team
review:
I had a terrible experience with the app after using a gift card, the restaurant left out an entree requiring me to place another order for that standalone item. The refund from the first order for the missing item was only $25, however to place the order alone cost me over $40. Had to do it to feed my guests. 

Customer service informed me they would refund the difference, that never happened, put in another ticket and the next customer service rep blew me off. 

Delete the Grubhub app and work directly with restaurants.

title: Delivery was üëé
review:
It took so long for my food to get delivered, it was cold when it finally came. I chose to order because of the fast delivery. The pizza place was great - they were waiting on Grubhub as well. Good thing pizza reheats well.

**update: got an email from Grub Hub asking me to contact customer support about my recent experience. The link they gave me did not work, shocker. Hopped onto the chat with Dynure, the only response I got was that they had a system malfunction and that is why the link didn‚Äôt work. No other help offered. Thanks but no thanks Grub Hub. I will stick to ordering from Door Dash.

title: Please update
review: Please allow for option to edit a review for up at least 24hrs. For example, based on a previous experience with the restaurant itself, I decided to give it a good review. However not only did restaurant give incorrect drink, but the food was waaay too salty once I actually did get a change to eat. Like dangerously salty and I split the sandwich in half with someone else. Neither of us were able to enjoy and cost of meal was ridiculous $$

title: Wait 2hrs for breakfast? Sing me up! Yay!
review: This is not good service. Last 5 orders I had were horrible, take too long, food comes wrong or cold. This time I ordered breakfast and after an hour with no driver yet - upon contacting chat they updated my ETA to a total of 2hrs since I first placed the order? How is this convenient? If I could I would go grab the food myself but there‚Äôs a reason I order it. Their only solution always is to give money back and $5 credit. How about working to make the food get to me correct and on time? Keep your $5 credit, I‚Äôm never using this again.

title: Grubhub hates their customers
review: I don‚Äôt use grubhub that often; maybe once every two months when i forget to bring lunch to work. But when i do use grubhub, I‚Äôm milked for every penny I have. I ordered two 5-piece chicken tendies and it‚Äôs original price was $24. Grubhub then slams me with a delivery fee, a service fee, tax, and tip. The price doubled to $44‚Ä¶ for 10 chicken tenders‚Ä¶ and to remove the delivery fee you need a subscription for $8 a month. Who uses grubchub that much to disqualify the service fee from saving an extra dollar? Grubchub is over priced and full of disappointment, I‚Äôll gladly not use the app.

title: Terrible customer support
review: If I could give a 0 star I would. I live in california and got scammed for 5 seperate orders in Arkansas to 5 different locations. I contacted them the day of its now 3 weeks later after 10+ conversations I still haven‚Äôt been emailed back. They respond ‚Äú we will advance this to a specialist and they‚Äôll reach out in 24-48 hours. It‚Äôs about to be 24 days later and no message my orders totaling over 300 dollars still has not been refunded even after this long. I‚Äôm annoyed and they give the same message about the advancing to a specialist. Terrible support

title: Horrible
review: We have been faithful to Grubhub for years. Lately they have been really lacking as far as accuracy and consistency. Got a completely wrong order delivered and they said I had too many refunds on the account. They had screwed up the last few orders but I had proof that this order was completely wrong and they said they wouldn‚Äôt refund the order based on excessive refunds. I canceled my membership immediately and will be using all the competitor apps instead. Implied that we are liars when they can‚Äôt get a simple order correct. Goodbye

title: Address mixups
review: Possibly hacked. Tried updating my Home address on the order, but then said it delivered to my Work address, so I contacted the driver and she went off a nonexistent address with 10 higher digits to my street address numbering and delivered it to someone else. To correct customer service graciously sent another delivery, but the address was then transposed, so I contacted them 7 times to update it and even contacted the driver, but no one got my address right so I just waited out on the middle of my street for the food and flagged the driver down. I don‚Äôt get it, might be hacked

title: Longtime user, sick of abysmal customer service
review: Longtime Grubhub user. The current customer service is beyond awful. Food is never delivered on time (and the estimated wait/delivery windows are regularly changed without notice to make it look like deliveries aren‚Äôt late when they always are). Reached my limit this evening with a driver who didn‚Äôt even try to deliver my food‚Äîparked nearby, marked the order as ‚Äúdelivered‚Äù and left. After waiting 1 hr+. Couldn‚Äôt even get through to a person at Grubhub customer support. One star for GH, zero stars for that driver. App uninstalled, won‚Äôt be back.

title: GrubHub is the worst of the worst
review: Grubhub is terrible! They are so bad that I cancelled my FREE Grubhub+ membership. That‚Äôs right it was FREE and I still CANCELLED. They ripped me off almost every order. They even left my food at a house down the street once and animals got into it. I was constantly missing items and the restaurants would blame it on the Grubhub app. Worst part is, I believe them. Customer Service never ever follows up, they promise you refunds that never arrive, and wait for you to constantly nag them for weeks before someone will even do anything. They are terrible. AVOID Grubhub if you can!

title: If I could give no stars I would
review: I ordered three items to be delivered between 12:40-12:50 and when it‚Äôs just 10 minutes before it was supposed to be delivered it was delayed and then the driver changed because the restaurant was taking to long, then it was further delayed another hour and half. Then for the new driver to not even drop the order off in the right area or keep it for themselves, all I know this is completely unprofessional and has not been the first time this has happened I do not recommend to anybody

title: No good
review: The very first time I ordered from grub hub I had an order with 70 dollars worth of food and a good tip. It was delivering to a well known business right off the  of the main road. I missed a call from the driver and called right back (twice) and got no answer. They never delivered the food because they claimed they couldn‚Äôt find me. Customer service fought to give my money back. Didn‚Äôt order again for a while and I‚Äôve ordered 3 times recently and each time the orders were over an hour late past the time it said it was supposed to be delivered.

title: No one knows what there doing
review: This has to be the worst food delivery app, every time I order  grub hub will say order is on its way and ten minutes later I am getting a full refund . Grub hub messages are not in accord  with the restaurant there only guessing . The driver will call and say the order has not been processed while grub hub will say the driver can‚Äôt get ahold of you. Grub hub is awful I always give them a second chance and that second chance never comes through i always get my hopes up. I‚Äôm done with them they never come through .

title: So many issues
review:
Grubhub used to be awesome. I can say I‚Äôve spent thousands of dollars ordering from Grubhub in the last 2 years. It was my go to when I didn‚Äôt feel like cooking. 

Never again. I am removing the app and getting rid of the subscription. 

I constantly have items missing. 1 in 5 orders will have all of the items there. It is a fight to get a refund on the missing items. When you only order occasionally, they are fine giving refunds. But when you order 1-2x a week, they don‚Äôt like to give refunds for missing items because they think you are just trying to get a refund all the time when that‚Äôs not the case. 

Then there is the ice cold food. I‚Äôm not spending $100 dollars for cold food. Not only is that a major health concern, it‚Äôs not what I paid for, and they refuse to do anything other than give you a 5 dollar coupon for cold food. Not cool.

title: Home Delivery
review: I have used Grubhub  before 2020 and a lot since.  Any issues I had, they were fixed right away.  We seem to waste less food when we Grubhub.  Always great when your day gets away from you and you partner and nothing for dinner.  Also great on a weekend for breakfast.  Recommend it highly.  MY

title: Don‚Äôt use this app
review: So basically they drivers can steal your whole meal or even half the meal you try to get a refund they going to say they can‚Äôt cuz your account is under some suspicious activity‚Äôs idk why y‚Äôall think y‚Äôall company is so perfect it‚Äôs not y‚Äôall have people that steal food or wont bring you your food and or food made completely wrong so basically if you order something it‚Äôs a high chance I might not get it or my order wrong so take my money and give me whatever and interrogate me like I did something wrong yall services are very bad

title: The Best
review:
I used to us a different delivery service and I always had problems, mostly because the drivers didn‚Äôt read or follow directions. 
But since switching to GH I no longer have any problems. 
The standard seem higher and that makes a huge difference. 
They care about us :))

title: Driver never brought my food. Won‚Äôt answer phone. Text.
review:
I‚Äôve used the service twice.
First time food was cold and no Covid tamper deal.
Second time, the guy never left my pizza. I waited two hours. Driver wouldn‚Äôt answer phone or text. He probably just drove by and ate my pizza. He was sitting for 20 minutes after he picked up my pizza on the map. Probably ate it and then drove by to pretend to drop it off. 
Wasted time with customer service both times. Second time I demanded more than a refund and got a coupon. Ridiculous. They better hold that guy accountable.

title: Driver never showed, customer service dishonest about contacting driver.
review:
First time ever using this app.
I order over $31 worth of food. 
The driver (named Sartu) put a notification in that my food was delivered to me when in fact it wasn‚Äôt.
I contact customer service, I give them the drivers name, I told them that I tried to call and text the driver several times, and the driver never responded.
They their response is ‚Äúsorry‚Äù because they can‚Äôt get in touch with the driver either do they say.
So what you‚Äôre telling me is this company allows people to take peoples money, and tell them nothing about the delivery, whether it was lost or stolen, or just not delivered at all.
I‚Äôm  truck driver you can bet  I‚Äôll be sure to tell every truck driver in this facility not to do business with you..

You basically took my money so you can tell me that you‚Äôll refund it to me 3 to 5 days later.

title: Convenient at a price
review: I try not to use grub hub because of the cost. I‚Äôm glad it‚Äôs an option for delivery when necessary. I hate the idea of ordering for pick up. The restaurant gets nailed for a fee. Grub Hub gets paid for doing nothing. It‚Äôs very hard to turn a profit without getting nailed for a big fee. If you are ordering for pick up you should call or use the restaurants web site. When you order on Yelp it goes through Grub Hub too.

title: Absolute lack of quality control
review:
Inexcusably large upcharges and food is consistently 20-30 minutes late. Food always sits under heat lamps for that time and you‚Äôre left with paying 3 times the price of food for stale garbage. Just go get your own food, it‚Äôs not worth it.

Please note that while this app has a ‚Äú5 star‚Äù rating, you‚Äôll notice that if you actually read the 5 star reviews they are all negative. This leads me to believe that there is a finger on the scale here and that these reviews are being manipulated and/or bought. Really poor form.

title: Worst delivery experience
review: I ordered a meal from my local popeyes the driver called me saying a new one picked the order up I said okay than it says it was dropped off but they dropped it off at the wrong place and door, they told me they would give me back my money in 5-10 business days and a discount I don‚Äôt want any of that I wanted my food I Aready had a problem with DoorDash and Uber eats apps now this I just want to have some food but I didn‚Äôt get toü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I trusted them because from work everyone would order from Grubhub just to get is b.s‚Ä¶ never again

title: Horrible needs to be deactivated
review: After waiting 2hours for my meal I contacted customer care told them I‚Äôm a business owner as well and this is unacceptable im hungry and they offered me $5 on my next meal I said no I want the food I ordered I‚Äôm hungry they pushed my food back another hour so I‚Äôm starving at this point if your reading this don‚Äôt waste your time just install Uber eats wayyyy faster and excellent customer service and instant refunds if needed üíØ I‚Äôm going to wait this 3rd hour for my food enjoy your day and don‚Äôt make the mistake I made by giving them my moneyü§ùüèΩ

title: Best Experience
review: I want to start by saying I don‚Äôt have to speak to customer service often but I‚Äôm always pleased with my experience from Grubhub support. They are prompt and helpful and they always do something to make the customers feel most important. Thank you for your hard work!!

title: DrRRT
review: The food is always hot and fresh and on time when I order. The driver is nice and professional. I recently ordered food using Uber Eats and my food was cold each time and one time the food came almost one hour after the restaurant said it was ready but waiting for the Uber driver to pick it up. I will continue to use Grubhub!!!!

title: They will cancel your grubhub+ membership
review: Tried to order food 3 times from the same restaurant because drivers kept getting lost and cancelling the order. Apparently when you contact customer service and try to explain the situation, they will just cancel your grubhub+ membership and not tell you. Then when you find out and call them on it, they tell you to ‚Äúcheck for fraudulent activity‚Äù and that there‚Äôs nothing they can do to refund you or reinstate your membership. Joke of a company, and I thought ubereats was bad.

title: Glorified Scam
review: Maybe if grubhub wants their orders to be on time they should actually put more of their $$$ into paying their drivers. So overpriced, but the drivers get pennies. Prices on app much higher than real restaurant costs (before all the fees are added too). ETA on the app is a joke and it doesn‚Äôt update accurately and the app does not consider it an issue when an order is hours late. Restaurant will make your order and it can be waiting there for 2 hrs before someone picks it up. Do you get any refund for this? No, but you get $7 of store credit!

title: A 50/50 shot
review: Honestly I have nothing against Grubhub. When we lived in NYC it was the undisputed best app to order food from and it was overall what you‚Äôd expect. Reasonable and reliable. However since our move to LA they really seem to have lost this. The orders are often wrong, take a very long time, and the customer support is not very supportive or helpful with this. I strongly believe that Grubhub just isn‚Äôt a good option for LA residents, and that ordering restaurant direct or DoorDash are far superior options.

title: Overall cost is WAY too much for a single person!
review: Between the inflated prices, the $20 minimum order fee and the subscription, it's an unreasonable situation for a person looking to order one meal a few times a month. I was about to order two meals the other day just to get my order approved, but the cost was over $30 all-in, which is SO much more than I wanted to spend. Just by ordering that much food from the local sandwich shop, I could save $10.

title: Worst app
review: I rather using  Uber eat , all this dose is not have canes and more places the worst part is that they choose to tell me it‚Äôs close at 10 that‚Äôs a big lie the whole grabhub choose to close it then self I don‚Äôt see what the point of doing payments to a membership if y‚Äôall Fina be losing places in you‚Äôre own pick of time there no point why he taking people money if y‚Äôall Fina be lying about the service we pay for keep in mine there people who literally have no transportation‚Ä¶!

title: Insulting customer service
review: I ordered pizza which was delivered cold long after it was picked up by the driver. The customer service rep offered me a $5 refund. I hate reheated pizza, so for me the entire order was ruined and I paid ten times what they offered me. When I continued to tell them their offer was unacceptable, they increased the amount in $2 increments three times. They‚Äôve lost me as a customer. Door Dash delivers from the same place without making the customer wait an hour for cold food.

title: Just get DoorDash or ubereats
review: All of the reviews are bad‚Ä¶also Grubhub charges the most compared to other delivery apps. I almost paid 54 dollars for a personal size pizza from Pizza Hut and cinnamon rolls. There is a couple of stores on here that aren‚Äôt real‚Ä¶ like it‚Äôs a scam, when you look up the address nothing would be there or it would be a abandoned house. They take your money but a driver is never assigned and just says you order is in progress. they will give you a refund if this was to happen but i feel like it shouldn‚Äôt happen at all.

title: Grubhub is a lifesaver!
review: This is my first experience with Grubhub in Southern California. It‚Äôs easy to place orders, the restaurant choices are many and the app is user friendly! I found that the fees are minimal unlike others recently so I will be using them more. Plus the perks from certain credit cards and Grubhub rewards are very nice!üëè

title: New Satisfied Customer
review: I‚Äôm So Glad I made the switch from dealing with Uber Eat and DoorDash! After allowing DoorDash mess up 3 out of 4 recent orders. The final canceling a order and telling me I have to wait 3 days for my refund to hit my account. When that was last $28, I‚Äôm glad to switch. To reliable and timely service from Grubhubüòô

title: Horrible customer service, bad options
review: Tried to apply a gift card that i was given but no option to apply so i thought it would apply automatically at check out. The gift card did not apply and when i contacted customer service i was offered no help, nothing to assure me this wouldn‚Äôt happen again. Just that they didn‚Äôt have ‚Äúaccess to change it.‚Äù I won‚Äôt be using this app again based off this, lost a potential customer and they can keep the gift card.

title: It‚Äôs not just the app it‚Äôs the entire company
review: When you have a major outage and you can‚Äôt even get in touch with a human being, wait on hold for over 30 minutes, just to be hung up on, your credit card gets charged, and nothing is delivered. Sounds exactly like a company that deserves a lawsuit. GrubHub is a joke. I will dispute every charge with my credit card company and delete the app. I will also seek legal charges because you cannot simply take peoples money and not provide the service and then not provide support.

title: Has Gotten Way Too Expensive Since the Pandemic
review: The service fee has skyrocketed from 9% of the subtotal to sometimes as high as 19% on my orders over the past few years. Between that and the menu prices already being inflated vs ordering from the restaurant directly, I decided to switch back over to DoorDash. The same meals from the same restaurants are several dollars cheaper before the tip on DoorDash now vs GrubHub. Disappointed because I had originally switched from DoorDash to GrubHub as GrubHub appeared to be cheaper at the time. Not anymore.

title: Yummy!
review:
Grub Hub has made it super easy to order from a wide variety of my favorite delivery restaurants. The app gives fairly accurate delivery time estimates.

I would prefer if Grubhub included a section on whether a restaurant is capable of dealing with food allergies, what the protocol is, and then allow customers to indicate if that protocol is necessary.

title: Timing issues
review: I love the convenience of Grubhub and I have used it quite a few times. I have always had great drivers, the only issue I really have is a recent one where when I order the driver can pick up multiple orders. This causes issues because by the time I get my food it‚Äôs never warm enough. When I order and I‚Äôm given a time and then it changes by 20+ minutes it‚Äôs happened enough to where I don‚Äôt want to continue using the app

title: Grubhub scammed me
review: I‚Äôve been ordering from grubhub for a very long time I‚Äôm sorry I had to give them a 1 star, put I‚Äôve bought an gift card for a family member but he didn‚Äôt want it so I redeemed it . I tried to order food with it and it keeps saying my order cannot be processed so I , then tried to update my add that didn‚Äôt work either. So I said ok it doesn‚Äôt matter I won‚Äôt use the gift card not I cannot order using my card, Apple Pay, or PayPal. Atp I‚Äôm starting to get angry .. I might delete my grubhub if they don‚Äôt solve this issue.

title: Be careful of refunding too much
review: You have a limited amount of refunds for your account  after which is where they just handed you off to another specialist and said you can‚Äôt email or contact them so they have to email you within 7 to 10 business about the status change if not; if no response then I guess no refund or concession so be careful with the amount of refunds or reporting you do cause you know now to be mindful of reporting such things

title: I can‚Äôt update any of my profile
review: For the past three days I‚Äôve tried to update my profile - change the present address, etc. I get a message saying something has gone wrong and try again later. Ridiculous! I‚Äôm trying to order food and I‚Äôm supposed to wait? I have free delivery through Walmart+ and I‚Äôve had to use other apps! I‚Äôm going to delete this if it isn‚Äôt corrected.  Sorry it isn‚Äôt through Walmart but I don‚Äôt remember where I got it.

title: The worst drivers
review: They don‚Äôt allow you to rate drivers on this app and I‚Äôm noticing that every time I order using this app the drivers never follow the drop off instructions, instead call and complain about having to get out of the car. I‚Äôm sure if they did allow users to rate drivers, the ratings would all be 1 star.  So far, the worst experience of all the food delivery apps I‚Äôve used.

title: Two order canceled immediately after payment was taken out.
review: I have tired to order twice now and my orders was canceled immediately after the payment was taken out my account. Now I‚Äôm out $400 waiting for the refund which takes up to 5 days. The order needs to be canceled before the payment is done. This will take out your money then cancel ur order just to hold ur money for up to 5days.  I called the restaurant and they said they never got my order. This is the last time I LEND my money to Grubhub.

title: Delivery drivers
review: I like the fact that the drivers deliver the food , some drivers knock on the door and some don‚Äôt . But the one thing that gets me is the drivers do not read the special instructions for delivery . If my instructions say to put the food on the doorstep and I open the door and the food is on the ground that bothers me thank you for your service

title: Vouchers
review: I am supposed to get a $10 credit per month for my membership, but have only received a few. If I haven‚Äôt used my previous voucher then I don‚Äôt receive a new one each month. That needs to change or I will go elsewhere and stop my membership

title: Drivers are terrible
review: I put in my order description every time that I live in a military post and once their at the gate and realize they can‚Äôt get in everyone is surprised. I had 5 orders cancelled because of that and 2 where back to back from different drivers. I don‚Äôt know if they look before they pick it up but it seems it doesn‚Äôt bother them whatsoever keeping my food.

title: Good but needs better delivery drivers
review: Hire people who can speak English and can communicate thoroughly. Some of your drivers also expect for the customer to meet them at their vehicles to receive our food. Which is backwards when we pay for ‚Äúdelivery‚Äù to the home. Which mean front door of your home. Better training for drivers to provide better customer service

title: No such thing as ‚Äúcustomer service‚Äù
review:
When you hire just any body to deliver your food you‚Äôre going to run into issues. However - Grubhub has the worst in app help out of any food delivery service, and 0 actual customer service. So when something inevitably goes wrong you are basically just screwed!

Also got charged 5+ times because their system is crap and had a closed restaurant showing up, but the app kept crashing instead of saying the restaurant was closed. Jesus christ get it together.

title: Thank you for your delivery
review: I‚Äôm happy with everything but I will be watching my card account because sometimes someone charges my account for other restaurants so be careful and mindful I only do deliveries like this sometimes maybe once or twice a year.

title: terrible
review: this has got to be the worst app experience i have ever come across. i wanted to order something through my university, but had an error message along the lines of ‚Äúthere are some fields that haven‚Äôt been filled in‚Äù. i can assure you i filled in all the required fields. i restarted the app, deleted it and re-downloaded it, nothing worked. i then went to chat with someone from grubhub support. i told them my situation, and the person then proceeded to leave the chat without reason or notice. i then tried to chat with someone else, and they said to restart the app (which didn‚Äôt work) or order using the website (for the life of me i can‚Äôt figure out how to order from a restaurant on my campus through the app). so not only is the app shut but it would seem the customer service is as well.

title: Restaurants not participating!
review: Not sure what‚Äôs happened post-Covid, but every single restaurant I want to order from is shown as ‚Äúclosed‚Äù on the app. They aren‚Äôt closed, they just aren‚Äôt participating at peak dinner hours, or sometimes not at all. I went on Door dash and the restaurants are open there, so clearly restaurants don‚Äôt seem to like grub hub. Also, so many menus are limited compared to ordering direct from the restaurant.  I paid $10 for membership and for what? I still had to go get the food myself. I‚Äôm done with Grub!

title: Freddie‚Äôs
review: I was hungry and stuck at the terminal in okc with out my car.  Grub hub made it possible to get great food fast.  Driver was friendly and on time.  The food was excellent.  I love Freddie‚Äôs steak burger with bacon.. and their patty melt.. I always breakdown and get their out of this world concrete shakes.. i enjoy the pumpkin concrete & banana peanut butter chocolate chunk amazing custard.. thank you Freddie‚Äôs & Grubhub

title: Very pleased
review: Very pleased with Grubhub. Extremely convenient to order whatever type of food you‚Äôre craving. If the order happens to be wrong, Grubhub is quick to credit your account. A bit pricier than picking it up yourself, but you pay for convenience.

title: trash
review: This application is trash do not pay for the bad service that the order is given, they arrive two hours or later, they change the time up to three times, it is frustrating

title: Good but expensive
review:
I agree with service charges, but this is a bit much.  But sometimes I‚Äôm just lazy and don‚Äôt want to drive, so I guess it‚Äôs worth it? :)

App is decent, but there often are items, ingredients or toppings missing from the GH menus, even though I know the restaurant has them (like when I go there or order for pick-up).

title: China King is the best.
review: Hands down the best Chinese food spot in Stratford. The owners are genuinely good people too. 6 years ago my mother passed away and prior she had a good rapport with the owner based on them both being from Brooklyn. They brought us free food repeatedly after. I can‚Äôt say enough nice things about them.

title: Payment options glitching
review: I have been using grubhub to order food from my campus dining. I don‚Äôt know when this issue started but I always pay with my campus card points, today I was unable to select my card as an option and the screen would glitch the moment I tried to click anything but ‚ÄúApple pay‚Äù. I have a feeling it‚Äôs a glitch or an update flaw. Hoping it gets fixed soon.

title: This company does BAD business
review:
Customer service is terrible. The ‚Äúcustomer service‚Äù rep who identified themself as ‚ÄúFrances NP‚Äù was not helpful in anyway. ‚ÄúFrances NP‚Äù was, however, short with me, rude, and in no way cares about the customer. 
My driver refused to communicate with me. She was told by the restaurant to wait 2 minutes. The driver did not. My order was ready but Grubhub decided to delay the delivery for an hour. I went and picked it up myself so it would be hot when we ate it. I told all of this to ‚ÄúFrances NP‚Äù and they were zero help and blatantly didn‚Äôt care.

title: Terrible customer service
review: Absolute terrible customer service. I‚Äôve had several orders where the drivers go the opposite direction. 10-15 minutes go by after the latest delivery time and still no movement. I reach out to the ‚Äúhelp chat‚Äù and they just drop my order - cancel it and give me a $5 coupon. Waiting after delivery time 3-4 times just be canceled after the fact makes that awful ‚Äúgesture‚Äù terrible customer service. I will not be utilizing their services again.

title: Terrible customer service
review:
I received a gift card to use and loaded it to my account, when I tried to use the credit said it wasn‚Äôt able to process my order. I tried multiple times over multiple days. I then tried with my credit card and wouldn‚Äôt you know it, it worked.

I contacted customer service and it‚Äôs been a week and a half of reviewing my account and it‚Äôs still under review. If you‚Äôre going to use this service do not use gift cards.

title: Just use DoorDash
review: I usually use DoorDash, but I figured I‚Äôd try Grubhub, and boy was that a mistake. Instead of allowing me to cancel an order that was going to take over 2 hours to arrive, they offered a $10 voucher and claimed the order couldn‚Äôt be canceled because the restaurant was already preparing it‚Ä¶ Well Grubhub, that might be true, but who wants food that‚Äôs been sitting around the restaurant for over 2 hours? DoorDash has this figured out. Give them a call.

title: Not happy
review: Worst ordering experience my first time. My order was dropped off 10minutes away and another persons with a totally different name and address on the ticket was brought to my house. They didn‚Äôt do anything just cancelled it and refunded the money but was already hungry and waited another 2.5hrs to hear sorry place is closed now nothing we can do. Just super disappointed and if the drivers and vendors even just looked at the order and address this could be prevented. Never assume always verify!

title: Horrible customer service
review: I was a grubhub+ member but after today I canceled. Whenever I use this app to order either my order arrives missing entire items or the food is undercooked(burgers especially). Today I didn‚Äôt receive my entire order and when contacted for a refund was told they couldn‚Äôt do it because of my recent refund requests and they can offer a $10 off coupon. No I want my money back to spend on something else. Would not recommend.

title: Door dash is better
review: Had our driver drop our food then tell us we had to go to customer support to cancel our order told us we would get a refund 3-5 business days and we had a 5 off coupon that we have to use within 30 days and went to door dash instead and I‚Äôm not saying this is grub hubs fault but we shouldn‚Äôt have to order another order and pay additional money for it just so someone could ‚Äúdrop it ‚Äú grub hub should pay for it the second time

title: Just shocking how bad it is
review: I‚Äôve used grubhub for a while now, because it‚Äôs honestly the only delivery app in my middle of nowhere town, but this is genuinely one of the most inconvenient and awful delivery apps I‚Äôve had the misfortune of having to use. Problems are constant, food delivered to the wrong address more than it should be, and an interface that is very unresponsive and irritating. Is it really that hard to send the same order to the same exact place more than once üíÄ

title: Good customer service
review: There are a few places that I will avoid because I know it‚Äôs going to take forever to get the delivery when promised. When that does happen, however, Grubhub is good about compensating you with one click once your estimated delivery time window has come but your food hasn‚Äôt.

title: Thank you GrubHub
review: Thank you to a great concept, it helps my sister and I get good hot food to our elderly Mother and her mentally challenged sister. We both live too far away to get healthy food to them on a regular basis. Being able to get them something different and tasty is very important.

title: Restaurants not even available
review: I ordered from a restaurant nearby, the driver got there and my order was cancelled. We called the restaurant to find out they only take cash and don‚Äôt even have grubhub. They didn‚Äôt have any of the items on grubhubs menu on their menu. No way to report the restaurant as not available on their app and their help section is no help. Thankfully I was refunded considering I ordered $80 worth of food and we waited 45 minutes just for it to be cancelled. Deleted the app.

title: App functionality recommendation
review:
When ordering pizza there is no way to customize 
Each half of the pizza for ordering different extras
Separately on each half of the pizza. I put special instructions for this which were not paid any attention. This would be great functionality to add
To simplify orders and to maintain customer satisfaction!

title: Cancelled orders
review: It‚Äôs disappointing to see that this app doesn‚Äôt give their customers a discount on their next order when a restaurant cancel‚Äôs your order after waiting a significant amount of time. It‚Äôs best to just order from restaurants directly as they will say if they deliver to your address since most of the times they don‚Äôt update their information on this application as to what their limits are with delivery.

title: Not worth it
review: GrubHub plus is NOT worth it, half the time it doesn‚Äôt even give you $0 delivery, and they compensate with an extra service fee anyways! If you‚Äôre paying for +, that should cover the service fee and delivery. Otherwise there‚Äôs no point, you‚Äôre not getting your food any cheaper with grub+. Restaurant selection is slim pickings as well.  Also + doesn‚Äôt let you use promo codes with it, you either get the perk or the promo it won‚Äôt let you do both! Which is wrong.

title: Prompt service!
review: Had issue right after I placed an order and I realized the place was closed. Jumped on chat support and was refunded in mins with a $15 credit for the hours not being updated! It‚Äôs always impressive to great and speedy customer service!

title: Insufficient Customer Service
review: My order was delivered missing items. When I contacted the courier, I was told to contact Customer Service. The courier was not interested in helping me. Customer service processed a refund and told me I had to re-order. There was no way for them to send the courier back or send another. I had to reorder and pay MORE than my refund for the forgotten items because of service fees. I will be deleting this app as soon as the replacement order arrives. Do not recommend.

title: GrubHub should fold or go under.  They don‚Äôt deserve to be in business!
review:
The app works fine.  The company, honestly, NEEDS to go out of business and replaced with something that isn‚Äôt a joke.   Nearly 80-90% of my ordered have some form of error or issue.  

Tonight, our first order was canceled after waiting over and hour. 

The second order arrived, now 2.5 hours after we initially ordered our first order (when we started getting hungry), and an ENTIRE entree is missing.   My elderly mother did not get the food she wanted, and because we all purchased spicy items or other items she can‚Äôt have, she had to eat crackers and tuna. 

This is just ridiculous.   

You wouldn‚Äôt have to steal so much of the restaurants money, if you didn‚Äôt have to cover the costs of so many errors!

title: Terrible
review: NEVER seem to get food delivered on time. Can literally be a mile away from the store and somehow have to wait an hour & a half to two hours for EVERY order. The ‚Äúcare‚Äù specialist just feed you the same lines they were clearly force fed and then you repeat the process all over again on the next order. The best part? Paying a subscription so that grubhub ‚Äúguarantees‚Äù on time delivery and STILL having NEVER had an order delivered on time. Terrible company. Terrible service.

title: When u work like I do!
review: I love that Grubhub finds most of the best places around where u might be. I work long works at different place throughout the week and Grubhub makes it easy and so convenient to get happy healthy food to me no matter where I‚Äôm at, Thank you!

title: App is worse than others
review: If a business is closed or not accepting orders.. it should not be available for me to fill my cart. So many times I have been charged (also refunded) but turns out the restaurant is closed. Yes, I was refunded but my money gets tied up. The food is cold most of the time with orders not having the correct items. You force user to waive their rights yet continue to screw over the customer. So over subpar companies doing what they want instead of doing what‚Äôs right.

title: Always RIGHT ON TIME!!!
review: My son, 11 going on 25, lives almost an hour away (part-time) GrubHub gives me the ability to be SUPER MOM when he has cravings that only his Mama caters too, and he gets to feel like VIP first class when he makes a quick call, to me, and his food is otw! Love it!

title: Grubhub plus worth
review: If you are able to get a Grubhub Plus account, I recommend it. It‚Äôs worth the savings with no delivery fee, which sometimes is what turns me off from a lot of places. Plus, there tend to be a lot of good local deals at any time.

title: Use DoorDash. Save your time and money.
review: Waited over an hour for our food. I contacted them to make sure things were okay, they informed me their drivers were busy but they were prioritizing my order. About a minute later the order was cancelled. They offered me a $5 credit and to be refunded in 3-5 days. After an hour and a half. If there‚Äôs no drivers available they should tell you that not wait an hour and a half. Never had these issues with DoorDash ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Thieves
review: I‚Äôve been a GrubHub+ member for over 2 years. This means that delivery fees are waived for orders over $12. Randomly, GrubHub has been charging me for delivery fees (which can get very expensive) even though I‚Äôm a + member and have orders over $12. I‚Äôve attempted deleting the app, restarting it, calling the help line, and speaking with a help representative over chat. Still, this issue keeps happening. If GrubHub thinks they can steal from their loyal customers, everyone should abandon them and put them out of business.

title: Terrible customer service and fees, it‚Äôs funny
review: I‚Äôm going to keep it simple and true. I had ordered chipotle and clicked on steak burrito. They had only sent me the steak in a bowl I had asked for a refund and just wanted to take the fees for the steak they told me no. And left the chat immediately. See that‚Äôs just one instance there‚Äôs many more. The drivers will cancel on you instantly. You‚Äôll get like 3-4 drivers before you actually get your food. I feel like these are the drivers that got fired from Uber eats.

title: Terrible service
review: Ordered food for myself and kids. Waited an hour and then they email me to tell me my order was cancelled and that I would see my money back in 5 business days. They had double booked it. Wrong driver grabbed my food and they just say hey too bad so sad, we will give you your money back later. Right way would have been to attempt to expedite a new delivery but now I have to use another service and wait another hour. Terrible customer service

title: Great to have!!!
review: I love Grubhub they are able to bring me and my family dinner when I‚Äôm exhausted after a long day at work or just have to much going on to break away! Very useful and my food has always been delivered still hot and in a timely fashion!!

title: Everything is always wrong
review: This stuff is written down so is it that hard to work from a list and someone check it before it goes out???  Every time this happens now it‚Äôs my daughter‚Äôs birthday today and what does she want but both things missing. So now I have to get a refund and wait for my money 3-5 days and reorder her stuff so we can wait another hour and she can eat her stuff alone.  Unreal!  Done!

title: Incompetent Drivers
review: My Delivery driver walked up to me, I wasn‚Äôt sure what he said, when I told him my name to confirm if it was my delivery he just got on his bike turned away and said the delivery was for a girl.  These are the types of people GrubHub hires, how in the world would he know it was for a female and why didn‚Äôt he stop and talk to me(the doorman) to try and figure out the proper address? Instead he just drove away with my food, put my job at risk as I left my post to chase him down and caused me a lot of my time smh

title: Crooked company
review: They force you to work on a schedule otherwise they won‚Äôt give you a lot of orders and will give you $4 orders going 10+ miles away as a punishment and if you reject the order it affects your acceptance rate which they will eventually deactivate you for, they treat their drivers like employees yet they label us as independent contractors. This company should not be in business for breaking labor laws continuously and people shouldn‚Äôt drive for them because they will take advantage of you.

title: Great if your busy or just too lazy
review: I live away from the city, and sometimes I‚Äôm either too busy or lazy to run out or cook. Grubhub in the two times I‚Äôve used them has never let me down. Probably start using them twice a month.

title: The app‚Äôs map tells the driver to drop off a street after mine
review: The app‚Äôs map has my address wrong, so the driver will ALWAYS go a street past mine so I‚Äôm always having to text them directions. I even specify in the notes. It‚Äôs a real pain. Please fix this! I would like a priority delivery option like postmates. Other than that I would‚Äôve given 4/5 stars. PS. FIX THE MAP! Please!

title: Never Again
review: Once again our order was only half delivered. We called the pizza place and the first thing they asked was did you use Grubhub and that they‚Äôve had nothing but problems with drivers stealing food and messing up orders. When a restaurant begs customers not to use a service that makes them money you know there‚Äôs a problem. Grubhub customer service doesn‚Äôt care in the slightest. So that‚Äôs it, we won‚Äôt be using Grubhub for delivery anymore.

title: Don‚Äôt download this.
review:
Grubhub systematically takes advantages of workers and customers. 

They refuse to provide their drivers with support and accurate navigation. I live in a condo complex and my food is delivered to the wrong address every other time. No matter what instructions I provide. 

Grubhub will refund your order for this once. But if it happens twice they will just take your money. Your account will be labelled as a scammer, no matter how much evidence you provide. 

Grubhub is not a food delivery service. They make their money via fees and scams like this, claiming they provided a service when they didn‚Äôt. 

The fees are double what the food costs, plus tips, because they don‚Äôt pay their drivers. 

There is no possible way for you use this app without being scammed.

title: Here's my honest opinion
review: GrubHub is convenient and less expensive than other delivery places often food does get delivered cold and constant missing items. Most drivers are kind. GrubHub refunds quickly and has mostly nice customer service. Overall great. Just have had some incidents.

title: Random Delivery Times & Terrible Customer Service
review: I‚Äôve had too many orders change the delivery time. Worst part is that GrubHub has a policy that says ‚ÄúFood late, we‚Äôll give you a voucher‚Äù but they change the delivery time before you can even put that option in. Customer service is hit or miss. Honestly you‚Äôre better off with UberEats or DoorDash.

title: Awful
review: Grub hub never rings the bell or texts.  They just leave the food and hope you‚Äôll wander to the front door and see it‚Äôs there.  You can put a note on your order, you can click the little check that says ‚Äòtext me‚Äô, you can tip $10‚Ä¶..but it doesn‚Äôt matter.   Your food will sit there outside and you‚Äôll never even know it.   This has happened over and over and over again.  Completely insane way to run a delivery service.  Bye grub hub.

title: Screen limitation
review: We order on an iPad.  When we order too many line items it won‚Äôt allow us to scroll to the bottom.  We have to delete an item or 2 in order to verify what‚Äôs not visible on the screen, then go back and increase/add items.

title: It‚Äôs almost always wrong
review: Not feeling well so have gotten grub hub this weekend for the family.  I‚Äôve ordered it 4 times in two days.  Three out of four times the order was wrong.  The last time it took 2x the length of time it was suppose to and when it got here the ice cream was almost completely melted.  Did I mention it was not even the correct order?  You pay extra for convenience but all you get is cold food you didn‚Äôt even want.

title: Bad Delivery Driver
review: He didn‚Äôt drop off my food when I was waiting at the drop off. Refused to give any landmarks when I asked for them; and there are VERY obvious landmarks. Grubhub gave me a re-delivery but decided to assign the SAME driver who didn‚Äôt deliver the first time. Didn‚Äôt accept my order cancel which is fine, but still decided to do a second delivery. So the driver still got my money! I‚Äôm okay with the restaurant being paired but why should he get my money when he ruined my night?

title: Receipts Not Itemized
review:
Be warned‚Äîif you‚Äôre ordering group lunch for you and your co-workers, the receipt GrubHub provides is not itemized‚Ä¶ it only lists the amount for your order, even if you paid the whole bill. Itemized receipts are a requirement most companies have when it‚Äôs time to get reimbursed. I was shocked when the GrubHub costumer care representative just told me I‚Äôd need to contact everyone of my coworkers who ordered food using the Group Order link that‚Äôs generated through the Apps

I‚Äôd stick with UberEats.

title: Panera and gift card
review: Couldn‚Äôt figure out how to apply gift card.  Committed to pay out of pocket and finally found the option during review.  Not intuitive.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND you add a note to payment screen that says, ‚ÄúHave a gift card?  You can apply it at the final review/ next screen.‚Äù

title: Missed items
review: Twice when ordering from Applebees there were items missing from my order.  The first time a meal was left on the counter and the second time one item was missed.  Applebees said I need to contact Grubhub for a refund.  I was not able to find any contact info for Grubhub so I was out the food and the money.    On the second order I did tell them of the prior error in the comments but I surmise they don‚Äôt care.  They got their money at my loss.

title: Grubhub Review
review:
I like Grubhub. I order a few times a week through the app in spite of any issues that may arise. 
Firstly, their customer service is really outstanding. Each person tries their best to respectfully solve your issue. 
I have to mention the prices are quite high and by the time you come out of the app you are paying a pretty penny for your food. 
Many of the restaurant employees don‚Äôt read the order properly either. 
Lastly, time is never a priority. The drivers often come from all over to bring the food and by the time it gets here it‚Äôs cold. 
In spite of all this Grubhub is the best app. And by all but a few dollars worth the price.

title: Food never came
review: After being delayed once I looked back on the map and the driver still wasn‚Äôt going to the store. Contacted customer service, said it would be around 30 more minutes (another delay). I had so much time to think about how lazy I am and decided to get get it myself. God as my witness the restaurant was 5 minutes to my house, terrible all around. First time using Grubhub too. Despite doordash having a terrible menu it‚Äôs much more efficient.

title: Just order from the restaurant directly
review:
It‚Äôs bad enough the amount of fees they tack on to every order, but most of the menu prices are dollars more than what the restaurant charges. What would have been an $18 order from a restaurant jumped up to $35 before tip solely from fees, taxes, and GH charging $3 more per item from that restaurant. 

Never again. I‚Äôve had my account since they came to Chicago, but I will not use them anymore at all. Nearly $20 surcharge is ridiculous.

title: Always missing food!!!
review:
Be careful‚Ä¶ Grubhub is NOT reliable. It seems like the delivery drivers are NOT trained to double check ‚Äúorders.‚Äù They simply  pick up without confirming they have everything. 

What‚Äôs worse is that once you claim that food is missing on the Grubhub help service, all they do is say ‚Äúsorry and refund you.‚Äù They miss the whole point of the inconvenience they have caused and the reason why we ordered delivery for a reason!! They‚Äôre ridiculous!!

title: Much better quality than Uber eats
review: I switched to Grubhub after noticing an alarming decline in quality of customer service, delivery delays, and rude/unprofessional  delivery drivers with Uber eats. I‚Äôve never had a bad experience with Grubhub and have has delivery drivers go above and beyond.

title: Tips
review: I wish you could do a tip adjust on the app. I tip low because some drivers are horrible but once in a while I get an awesome driver, it would be nice to adjust that tip instead of having to have cash on hand to give them.

title: Terrible customer service
review: I Order 30 minutes before the store was supposed to close, when the driver got there they told them they didn‚Äôt make the order, driver leaves I never get my order, after 50 minutes of waiting I contacted customer service to find out they cancelled it because it wasn‚Äôt made and I don‚Äôt find out till 30 minutes after I was supposed to get my order and only because I contacted them

title: Door dash is terrible switch to Grubhub
review: Best experience I have ever had with a delivery service ! Not sure how they handle undelivered items so maybe I am biased at the moment but the food was warm and on time , can‚Äôt say enough about my delivery person .

title: Terrible Customer Service
review:
Horrible service from this service. Ordered food from a restaurant, waited an hour and the food still hadn‚Äôt been picked up. When we called to get a refund, the lady said the restaurant had to. But when we called the restaurant, the owner said grub hub had to issue the refund. I‚Äôm extremely unhappy with how unhelpful Grubhub was. They offered no account credit or any kind of help. 

Use doordash or literally any other food delivery app. This one is garbage.

title: Crooks with Terrible Customer Service
review: I have caught them charging higher food costs than they quote on a regular basis. When you call them out on it sometimes they‚Äôll correct it, sometimes they‚Äôll say they can‚Äôt do anything and sometimes they just disconnect because they don‚Äôt care to help you and are blowing through a massive backlog of upset customers. Terrible business. I hope they get in trouble for all the people they are stealing from.

title: Horrible customer service!
review: Often the app tells me my food is delivered but it‚Äôs not! There‚Äôs no accountability! They will sometimes refund your money (3-5 business days) and sometimes not! The people in customer service (like Emily H) just stop the chat whenever you tell them that just getting a refund in 3-5 business days and no food is not satisfactory just hang up and get off the chat. For the high cost I would imagine better customer service!

title: Don‚Äôt use grub hub
review: I ordered from a place called hooties burger bar. I get my food and it‚Äôs just hooters. Had I known it was hooters I wouldn‚Äôt have placed the order to begin with because hooters is one of those places where the food is only good if you‚Äôre right there. The lettuce was slimy and transparent, bread was soggy as well as the pickles, and the fries were cold and hard. Completely inedible. This was a $50 order and grub hub only gave me a $7 coupon to rectify the situation. I‚Äôll be sticking with door dash.

title: GHub iz 4 fud
review:
It brings me the food 
Thanks again for letting them live together and we live on our website so they will continue on the same website for all your new lives together 
I like food 
It brings the food

title: Use it all the time
review: Use it often and have found that it‚Äôs the best one for many reasons, one big one being that they are efficient and rarely mess up and are affordable most of the time.

title: No Show Food
review:
Drivers seem to think they don‚Äôt have to go into the building to deliver your food but simply text you and tell you I am here. When there‚Äôs a clear note in the comments asking it to be delivered to a specific place and your name. Then I‚Äôm given a credit thankfully and a coupon for my troubles that I can‚Äôt even use on the replacement order because my replacement order isn‚Äôt even big enough. I‚Äôm done with GrubHub.

Hangry

title: Always on time and great customer service
review: Each time we have ordered from this app the deliveries are prompt and the drivers are always courteous. We will continue to use Grub Hub for all our delivery orders! Thanks for the great service!!

title: This app is trash
review: Just use Uber eats or door dash. This app is not worth using period. It used to be fantastic, now it‚Äôs a dumpster fire. Food will be extremely late or not arrive at all. When this inevitably happens, getting your money back is next to impossible. They bend over backwards to try to make YOU cancel the order so they can keep your money. After 5 or so terrible customer service experiences I‚Äôm finally deleting this and never looking back.

title: First Timer
review:
This was the first time we ordered from GrubHub and everything went smoothly.
We have a year membership and we are hoping that GrubHub continues to receive a 5 Star Rating from us. Keep up the good work.

title: Horrible, unsecure
review: Account has been compromised multiple times with zero context on what happened or how to gain access back to my account from the GrubHub team. Overall terrible experience and now have to change cards and go through a number of other related efforts. Cannot even gain access back to my account because the team has not reset correct email in account. Avoid putting your info and data here.

title: Driver stole my food
review: I was waiting outside for my delivery driver, she barely answer the phone to follow my instructions to the delivery, marked the order as delivered and just ran away with my food, never returned the food to the restaurant and establishment has confirmed has happened twice. If you contact customer service they just cancelled the order and erase any proof of the robbery. Very disappointed since I‚Äôve been ordering a lot of food without issues before.

title: Died of starvation today.
review:
First order the delivery driver disappeared off the face of the earth. Second order gets cancelled because of a menu issue. 

Seamless & Grubhub. If your drivers can not commit to a delivery and your vendors can not commit to a menu or product then you literally have nothing here. Your entire business model is falling apart and will soon fail if you don‚Äôt tighten up the ship and hold people accountable. I will never use you again. Terrible.

title: Convenient but pricey
review: Menu items are so marked up that I only use it when I have to since I‚Äôm disabled. Why not make items the same price as you would if picking up (OR A LITTLE ABOVE since the restaurant does have to do a LITTLE extra for GrubHub deliveries) and still collect your normal fees?

title: Worst food delivery app ever
review: GrubHub is the actual worst. I could get my food here within a more reasonable timeframe (sooner than 2 hours after all their delays). It is frustrating they keep stringing you along without just telling you the food isn‚Äôt coming or they have no one to pick it up. I‚Äôm disappointed in their processes and won‚Äôt ever order through them again as more often than not I have experienced issues.

title: Some drivers get 5 stars; some drivers get 2 stars; some get MINUS STARS
review: I have very specific, yet simple, delivery instructions. Most drivers respect them. Some seem to not be able. A few have been downright rude, citing the amount of tip (20%) as insignificant and not enough to make it worth delivering to my door.

title: Expensive inconsistent and lacking quality controls.
review: Though it‚Äôs an occasionally necessary service. Inconsistencies abound in ordering. The drivers consistently fail to do simple things like count the items and or make sure utensils or sauces are present. And when a mistake is made which is frequently there‚Äôs no way to address the issue with the restaurant and or fix on the spot.

title: UNSAFE APP! STAY AWAY! BANK ACCOUNT HACKED!
review: My bank account was hacked through Grubhub and they cleared out significant amounts of money from my bank all linked to Grubhub. They placed very high dollar fraudulent orders out of state and Grubhub doesn‚Äôt even give you, the driver or the help chat agent the ability to cancel a live order or a number to talk to for direct help. 3-5 business days to get a refund. I strongly urge you to NEVER download this app.I had to google Grubhub customer service number to even find any help.

title: Tired of bad service
review: I‚Äôm sick and tired of drivers not delivering food. I was told my address was incorrect when in reality the driver was at the wrong part of the complex.  When I contacted customer service, they gave me 60 days free of some perk, which I told him I didn‚Äôt want but she was not helpful in getting my food reordered. I am done with these food delivery apps because there have been too many issues and not enough accountability for the drivers.

title: Terrible customer service
review: Placed an order, but got an ‚Äúoops a problem occurred‚Äù message, they still charged my account and held the money until I chatted with them for an hour. They would do nothing to compensate my wasted time or missed window to order the food I wanted because my account was new. Buyer beware, I‚Äôve had pleasant experiences with postmates, ubereats, and DoorDash, when there‚Äôs an issue they‚Äôve made it right, I‚Äôm never using grubhub again.

title: GrubHub is the best!!!!
review: I love GrubHub they always come through when I‚Äôm hungry. GrubHub has the best drivers GrubHub brings the best food and it does it in a timely manner there‚Äôs just something about Grubhub that I can‚Äôt live without absolutely love it. I love the city of Portland and I love GrubHub service in it.

title: They actually have drivers
review: My other apps didn‚Äôt always have drivers available which was frustrating but so far grub hub has come through. So far.

title: WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE
review: I‚Äôve been trying to get a gift card issue resolved for over a month. Every time I follow up in chat, they say ‚Äúwe will follow up in 48 hours‚Äù which of course never happens. So my account has been under review for a month and while they review, i can‚Äôt use my gift card. Smh! They just give you the runaround without really trying to resolve the issue. Never again!

title: Decent
review: Out of the three delivery companies I‚Äôve tried (Doordash, Uber Eats and Grubhub), this one has the cheapest rates. The drivers are also usually pretty nice and fast. The only downside is that once you have a few orders refunded, you‚Äôre told that they can‚Äôt do anything for you. I have problems with almost every other order, but since I got it delivered it can‚Äôt be fixed or refunded.

title: Ridiculous First Time Experience
review: I placed an order for one hamburger and a soda to drink from a hamburger restaurant. First, my order took an HOUR. Then, my order was assigned to two different drivers. Lastly, 5 mins before my delivery was due, I get a call and email saying my order was cancelled, which wasn‚Äôt my doing. Then when I called GrubHub customer support, I was only offered a $5 credit towards my next order. Completely ridiculous.

title: Account hacked
review: My account got hacked. Someone placed an unauthorized ordered and then updated the email address to theirs. So I wasn‚Äôt able to login mine again. Called customer service, they were trying to send the reset password to the associate account which has already been changed! But they just didn‚Äôt understand that and kept saying I sent a password reset to your email. Will never use the app again!

title: Just don‚Äôt do it
review: I have grub hub plus and it‚Äôs just not worth it. Instead of charging you delivery they just Jack up all the prices on every item. The delivery service is god awful since going to plus and instead of giving you a legitimate refund they give me a small fraction of what you paid and tell you you have 30 days to order through the app to receive the refund. It‚Äôs a pointless cycle. Just say no.

title: The WORST customer service
review:
I had my account hacked and someone changed the email address associated with my original account and is (still!!)
