 using my personal credit card in my account to order food from another state. I tried contacting Grub Hub immediately. It has been 72 hours, ive spoke with at least 3 different individuals and it hasnt beeen resolved. Grub hub does not care about their customers or protecting private information.

title: Convenience!!!
review: It‚Äôs tough to leave the house with 2 children sometimes so being able to order food and trust a service that delivers is a huge convenience!!!

title: Drivers picking up multiple orders cold food
review: Drivers picking up multiple orders last few times has resulted in stone cold food. I literally saw the guy sit in a parking lot away from my restaurant after picking up my order waiting on another order. He could have delivered the food in the the time he sat there. Food arrives stone cold. $30 worth of cold, gross, soggy food. Grubhub offered this Grubhub plus member $5 to make up for it. Uber eats from now on. Deleting app

title: Check your totals
review: They are adding money to you orders after you have already paid. They are trying to claim that it is because of price discrepancies at the restaurant but it‚Äôs not. It is because this company is not updating prices on their app like they are suppose to do so stuff like this does not happen. I will be talking to all my restaurant owner friends to take grubhub off of their delivery options for over charging costumers.

title: Expensive, follow up made it worse
review:
It‚Äôs so dang expensive. It literally doubles the cost. $30 for $15 order.

Update: I called like they suggested and they said I could have a five dollar credit toward my next order. I told them I wasn‚Äôt going to be using them again and they told me they tried to give me a refund but ‚Äúthe system wouldn‚Äôt let me.‚Äù 

Changing to one star. You literally added insult to injury and wasted my time.

title: Worst experience
review:
Two terrible GrubHub experiences. First one, took them over an hour to deliver and kept updating the delivery time. Second time, the menu for the restaurant was incorrect, they called and told me I had to cancel and it took customer service 30 minutes to cancel and refund me.

Only using this because of a giftcard and I will never use this again. I‚Äôve never had any of these issues with DoorDash.

title: Deleting the App
review: There was an issue with the delivery, and I got somebody responding with canned responses, probably from another country, and all it did was make me more irritated.   Have used many of these apps, and this one may have the worst customer experience as it doesn‚Äôt allow me to control notifications, intuitively, or communicate with anyone that can actually talk to me.

title: Satisfied!
review: Banking with Bank of America has its perks! I have been able to save $$$$ on my delivery fees! Also, the food is almost always warm/hot when delivered. I never would have gone through Grubhub if it wasn‚Äôt for BoA!

title: Terrible customer service
review: Someone hacked into my Grubhub account 4 days ago and I have been trying to get into contact with them since. Here we are day 4 and I‚Äôve been on hold over an hour. Still haven‚Äôt gotten a refund or been told of the hacker still has access to my account. Everytime I‚Äôve called or emailed I get told someone higher up is going to help me and that hasn‚Äôt happened yet. They do not care.

title: Account hacked, money stolen, ZERO CUSTOMER SUPPORT
review: My account was hacked and an order for $65 worth of food was places. I contacted their customer service 3 times. I was told each time the situation would be escalated and told I‚Äôd be contacted within 24 to 48 hours. I was never contacted. Customer support has done absolutely nothing to assist me with this fraudulent order. I am deleting my account and contesting the charge with my bank. Totally inexcusable. Three times I was ignored.

title: Fake Reviews, missing Items
review: Consistently missing items on our orders and difficulty resolving the issue. Reviews on App Store showing up as five star with no positive feedback in the actual review. I think something is fishy here. Restaurants hate this app, it‚Äôs so annoying for them to deal with and wasteful with packaging and plastic. Same your $$$ and cool your own meals at home or go to the restaurant in person for a better experience.

title: That time I ordered sushi‚Ä¶
review: And the GH driver kept changing their delivery time. Showed up over an hour late with hot food stacked on top of sashimi without even a cardboard barrier after driving around with it for an hour like that. And. He admitted he ran somewhere else all the way across town even though ‚ÄúI was first‚Äù. I had to trash all of my over $65 worth of food & GH nor the restaurant offered me a refund. Though, it was an inedible health hazard. I‚Äôm a Chef. And this disgusts me.

title: Fast response from customer service
review: My order was wrong, I contacted customer service and they immediately fixed my order.

title: No Customer Service
review: We placed an order that says it was delivered, but didn‚Äôt make it to our house. No photo was taken as proof of delivery. We tried to report it but could not getting any resolution without waiting in ‚Äúline‚Äù. We were #400 in line! We finally got a refund, but it took a lot of effort and time on our part. I won‚Äôt be using GrubHub again

title: I‚Äôm done
review: I kept going back and giving it another try to only continue to not get what I ordered.  How difficult is it to order food, have a delivery person drive to the restaurant, check the order and deliver it? Turns out it‚Äôs almost impossible.  The customer service is a joke. Nobody seems to care about service anymore.

title: No actual food delivery
review:
Every week my coworkers and I order for delivery.  I am sitting at my fourth consecutive cancelled order from GrubHub+.  The order is always cancelled at expected time of delivery with various reasons having been emailed to me but when I call customer service I‚Äôm told the underlying issue is error in app communicating to store.  
If you want food delivered, don‚Äôt download this app.  Great on giving refunds, terrible at delivering food.

title: Bad cancellation
review: I had a promo sub to Grubhub+ and decided to cancel early to not get charged. All cancellation verbiage said I would continue to have benefits until the end of the billing but they removed it. Service reps said it didn‚Äôt matter what the messaging said and there wasn‚Äôt anything they could do. I wouldn‚Äôt have canceled early if the messaging let me know I wouldn‚Äôt have the benefits after I canceled. Glad I deleted my account and app.

title: Eh
review: Fees even when paying for plus. Their drivers are horrible and they don‚Äôt allow us to rate them separately from the restaurant. Their Grubhub guarantee is a joke as my order was late and I was never given a credit, it says it will be issued in 24 hours and that was 2 weeks ago. Not the first time they‚Äôve completely ignored the guarantee based on late delivery.

title: A great app
review: I have been satisfied over the years dealing with this company and hopefully will continue to do the same they make the extra effort to travel long distances and you keep on time. Rad Mason

title: Horrible Customer Service
review: Texting services or calling services to the drivers no longer work. They have not worked in months. And the drivers can‚Äôt contact us to get help finding our location. What‚Äôs the point? And then when you try to talk to somebody online, you get fake responses and they don‚Äôt even read what the problem is. They are completely useless.

title: Mostly okay. Can‚Äôt get my address corrected.
review:
The app serves its purpose most of the time, but my address has been wrong for MONTHS, and I‚Äôve been going back and forth with customer service, but gotten no help. 

I‚Äôve put instructions in for drivers, but about half the time, they are ignored.

title: Delivery instructions are there for a reason
review:
More of a criticism of GH, not the drivers or restaurants. When we add delivery instructions, SHOW THEM TO THE DRIVERS. GPS is NOT always accurate and it is such a waste of time to have to go find the driver because GH didn‚Äôt show them the delivery instructions. 

Fix yer ish, GH.

title: App is outdated-preselects Apple Pay rather than gift card
review:
Very frustrating to use and it makes you dive in to multiple screens in order for it to use the gift card I already have added in my account. 

The layout of the food/menu items is very hard to navigate. 

At the end of the day it gets the job done, but I will not being buying Grubhub gift cards for myself or friends.

title: Delivery Instructiond
review: I‚Äôve had two deliveries from Grubhub. I gave written directions for the contactless delivery. Both delivery persons left the food at the incorrect door. I don‚Äôt know if the app is working incorrectly and not passing the delivery instructions to the driver or if they were both careless.

title: Needs more options and coupons
review: Not that many places to pick in my area and it definitely needs more promo codes, specially on the weekend were many other delivery apps give at least a 10% off just because it‚Äôs the weekend.

title: Options
review: Why give customers options if you‚Äôre going to do whatever you want anyway.   If I wanted my food sitting outside unattended I would have asked for it to be left I unattended. How hard is it anyway to knock on a door/ring the doorbell.  It‚Äôs a simple request why is so hard to get right?

title: Cut off ordering times when pick up
review: Two nights in a row go to order food and the restaurant all of sudden says ‚Äúclosed‚Äù and can‚Äôt complete order. Restaurant is still open you should be able to order especially since I was picking up the food and not having it delivered. Very frustrating when you go to pay and confirm order and have to start over!

title: Won't refund your order no matter how or when it arrives.
review: Driver picked up my food and drove around with it in her car for almost an hour before delivering it (the restaurant is less than 15 min away). Food arrived completely inedible and I had to toss it. GH would only refund $7 (I left a $4 tip). When I asked why they just said "this is how we manage complaints." Would give zero stars, have deleted my account.

title: How do I report that my order was not what I asked for?
review: The issue I have is that Duncan Donuts did not send me the order I asked for. Otherwise I would've given 5 stars. At Door Dash there's a way to report to the restaurant when they messed up the order.

title: Best hands down.
review: They are the best quality food delivery service on earth. They stand behind their products and unlike garbage Uber eats who don‚Äôt do anything if order is wrong, Grubhub actually apologizes and refunds the money.

title: This app is getting worse
review: What is going on with the filtering and sorting? Why is it that when I choose one kind of cuisine other types come other types are shown? For instance, if I choose Chinese why am I seeing pizzerias? This makes the app very frustrating to use. And this is only one of several complaints. But let‚Äôs get this one straightened out.

title: Do not buy anything
review: If you buy something and it gets canceled, consider your money gone because the support team will not do their job of getting you your money back, I called them and they told me 4-5 buisness days, on the 6th I still received nothing. Then I called them again and they said it‚Äôll be 2 more days, im now on the 5th day and I still havnt received even a call. Worst customer service.

title: Trash Service
review:
I never write review but this app has got me incredibly frustrated. I spoke to multiple representatives on chat and was told my order was on the way and it never arrived. They finally cancelled it after about 2 hours.

The GrubHub guarantee is baseless. They can keep their 5 and 7 dollar vouchers and buy themselves small fries at McDonald‚Äôs. Never using it again, app is going to be deleted. What a waste of a plus membership.

title: So far so good
review: I have only used GrubHub and their carriers twice so far. And so far the two drivers their professionalism their speed have been a five star rating so as of now ‚Ä¶I am truly impressed with Grubhub.

title: This is the last time
review: I‚Äôm done. Too many wrong or incomplete orders. We live too far out so we tip really high. 40% on that last order. Yet when I called the delivery person, they blamed the restaurant and said take it up with GrubHub. He is probably eating the missing item on his way back to town. Then we still have to figure out dinner. No thanks. This relationship is over. Nothing will bring me back. üëãüèº‚úåüèº

title: Underrated
review: I had a issue before with a card authorization hold but after 24 hours I was able to order my item.

title: Service fees
review:
This is an add in that was not there until
2020. Should be removed. It‚Äôs the amount of tip I give to the delivery person. I used to order Grubhub 2-3x weekly. Because of the Service fee maybe 3x monthly.

title: Incredibly easy to use
review: The food in New Orleans is always delicious, and what could be better than having it delivered right into your hands while sitting in your garden?

title: Rip Off
review:
Forever annoyed that they are tacking on fees and keeping it for themselves and not passing it along to the delivery person. 
Eight dollars in fees just to run GrubHub and I have to pay an additional five dollar tip to a delivery person? Even more annoying as you can‚Äôt directly order from the restaurants themselves because they bought into the service. Super disappointed. Times have changed.

title: Listen to me.
review:
They will always get your order wrong. And then refuse to make it right. I ordered the food because I wanted to eat it. 

You brought half of it. And then refunded what you didn‚Äôt bring. But then if I still want the food I ORDERED, I have to spend even more money than I was originally? And you also took increased taxes and delivery fees from the first order already. 

Poor form. Garbage company. Don‚Äôt support it.

title: First and last time I‚Äôll use Grubhub
review: Never been a fan of these crappy food delivery apps but I had a gift card so of course tried again. Not surprisingly, the driver picked up my food and then drove around for 45 minutes, presumably going to drop other people‚Äôs food off. The food came cold and late. Most definitely would have just picked it up myself if I knew it was going to be such a circus.

title: Food always arrives cold.  Always.
review:
Last night the guy sat in front of my building 5 minutes before bringing out the food.  Meanwhile the tracking software on the app way delayed.  

Tonight I‚Äôm watching the driver in the tracking app run all over town after picking up my food‚Ä¶. My food is getting cold as we speak.  Meanwhile he will pass the restaurant again at least once before delivering my food.

title: The best for food delivery
review: Uber eats is horrible. I‚Äôve had them cancel orders after a hour of thinking it‚Äôs on its way. Had them forget items on my order . Not yet with door dash fingers crossed.

title: Fake delivery
review: I ordered a food from through this company, at Norcross GA. and for some reasons the delivery personnel made a choice to leave the food on some chair at the hotel without informed any one. While I was waiting for my orders. Effort to trace this particular chair as well as contact Grubhub hasn‚Äôt been successful. I‚Äôm ordering my bank not no to pay for such a bad service acclaimed. I‚Äôm suspecting this delivery services as fraud. No one should trust the services

title: Repeatedly sends drivers to the wrong place
review:
UPDATE: Developer response is to say, ‚Äúcontact customer care,‚Äù but it sends you to a page where there is no customer care. The whole service is a waste of time. 

I‚Äôm finally DONE with GrubHub. The mapping software keeps sending drivers to the wrong place and no matter what driver instruction I provide, it keeps happening. Google and Waze can do it. I don‚Äôt know why GH can‚Äôt.

title: Don‚Äôt use
review:
Horrible customer service and drivers. Out of 3 times trying this app, (because Amazon‚Äôs free plus subscription), I only ever got 1 delivery. Customer service didn‚Äôt help. Wouldn‚Äôt re deliver, wouldn‚Äôt contact the driver, wouldn‚Äôt even let me send screenshots of the texts the driver had sent. The second time, it just never showed up. The driver ghosted? 
Don‚Äôt waste your time, you‚Äôll end up hangry and frustrated.

title: Lack of customer service and cancelled orders
review: Of all the delivery apps this is the worst one. I‚Äôve given Grubhub chances over the years and and either delivering late or not at all on multiple occasions over the years I am officially done. This is absolutely ridiculous. I waited an hour tonight only to have my order cancelled. I give it a 30% of delivery with Grubhub. Use Uber Eats or DoorDash. Regardless of price it will at least get delivered

title: Kudos to Grubhub!
review: I choose to order from Grubhub above all other delivery options because their drivers (95% of the time) follow instructions, are courteous and respectful and pay attention to detail. Task you!

title: Meh
review: Grubhub is cheaper than other apps and has restaurants I love, but I hate that you don‚Äôt get a text with a picture of where ur food is located like the other apps. I literally have to walk the entire lobby looking for my food (it‚Äôs never dropped off at my door like asked). The driver tracking is also not ‚Äúreal time‚Äù and exact as other apps.

title: GPS
review: Please update the gos you give the drivers. I had to direct two drivers to my building after they were given incorrect directions through the app. The food and service was wonderful!

title: Seamless
review: Great app‚Ä¶ Intuitive easy interface makes ordering and checking out painless. Only negative is the Grubhub + ‚Ä¶. I don‚Äôt see the value in it‚Ä¶ had it for a few months..ehhh

title: Service fee
review: I just feel like it‚Äôs kinda expensive especially when the driver has to do all the work. A service fee? Yeah grubhub just take away the delivery fee only to charge me extra on a service fee. Sounds like grubhub is just taking advantage of their customers and drivers.

title: Late deliveries
review:
Food deliveries always late no matter how much time is provided . You could order food first thing in the morning for dinner and even after all that time it is late. Don‚Äôt plan on it for conferences when you have a specific lunch period. 

 Hey Grub Hub, forget about your 5 dollar credit for being late and just deliver it on time

title: Very satisfied!
review: Grubhub is such a great app to use. They have a lot of deals to where you can get so much money off or free items!! Soo much better than DoorDash by far. The drivers are nice and efficient!!

title: Hacked
review: App is fine. Customer service is awful. My account was hacked and I had to contact them 4 times with no resolution. I‚Äôve used other services for years and those services will fix/refund my items immediately and resolve my issues via chat directly. With Grubhub, not only was my information compromised but they were absolutely no help when it happened.

title: Excellent to a point
review:
I have ordered from Grubhub a lot . 

The app does its job, but when you get to people it changes with drivers and restaurants. 

Do not blame this app service if your order is wrong, or not cooked correctly. 

For the most part 80 percent of the time everything is good, but there are times that things aren‚Äôt great. Don‚Äôt blame the app‚Ä¶ also you may not get satisfaction for refunds or messed up orders as the app doesent cook the food or deliver‚Ä¶

title: Customer service
review:
Please please please hire better people or educate the one you have on how to treat customers. Oh and you should make the options that we pick on the app such as (Hand the order to me) but instead the driver just leave it wherever then leave. I try to contact support but they always have a way to shut me down even tho I'm a plus member!! If that matters lol...
I'm done with food delivery

title: Terrible
review: I ordered bread and a steak with two sides from a restaurant, once I was handed the bag I realized the bread wasn‚Äôt there so I refunded for it, just to get back inside and open the actual container for the food and the steak isn‚Äôt there either just the two sides, so I‚Äôm trying to refund for it and it won‚Äôt let me it keeps taking me back to the restaurant page. It was almost 30 dollars and I got nothing from it??

title: Use at your own risk.
review: I am only continuing this app to finish out my trail. The drivers do not follow directions. The option is available to add notes for the deliver and they don‚Äôt read them. I had my food mars delivered just to have to have it reordered but the company. I missed my lunch time and the food is cold most of the time it arrives‚Ä¶ use at your own risk.

title: TERRIBLE
review: Terrible company. The drivers do their job fairly well BUT - many mistakes - wrong orders - an hour or more wait - no refund on undelivered orders - no contact or try to fix the situation. Ignore complaints. POOR POOR POOR way of running a business. Will NEVER NEVER use again and will inform others. Actually less than ZERO. Cost me money - lost meals and much stress. Always anout the MONEY- what happened to GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! None here.üëπüëπü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨

title: Thank you
review: I'm currently under the weather with COVID-19. I appreciate the contactless option as to getting the food I like while being in quarantine. Thank you Cynthia (my delivery driver) much appreciated

title: UI is fine but they‚Äôre not reliable
review:
Not the first time, here‚Äôs the gist:
. Delivery was promised in 40 minutes. Driver was there on time. Food was not close to being ready. Driver left for another delivery. Couldn‚Äôt get any further info from the restaurant or the driver. Neither did Grubhub‚Ä¶ had to cancel after waiting for an hour and 45 minutes.

All they can do is offer 10$ coupons

title: Trash app
review:
If I could give no stars I would. Used Grubhub for the first time and the driver stole my food but luckily I got my money back
And they won‚Äôt let me delete my account very trash delivery app

title: Misleading
review: Grubhub listed a restaurant near me under a nationally-recognized name when in fact it was a poorly-rated local place. The time estimate increased by an hour because the restaurant had to sub rice for noodles; I was committed at that point. I thought, ‚Äúsurely this won‚Äôt take a whole hour.‚Äù The driver then proceeded to drive around with my food for the whole hour while making other pick-ups and deliveries.

title: First order in a couple years
review: This is my first order in some years as well as in a new city and the first one was great! Let‚Äôs keep striving for all 5 stars!

title: Garbage customer service
review: Missing item? They‚Äôre not going to redeliver. Only refund that item. It doesn‚Äôt matter if it‚Äôs the main food item or whatever. They can‚Äôt refund the taxes, fees or tips on that item either so you lose money for them missing an item. Horrible company policy. Grubhub needs to step up, no one would be happy with losing money for their mess up.

title: Grubhub account hacked
review: Someone hacked my account and spent over $300 in varied cities. Called Grubhub (due to seeing prefer I did not make) while it was happening and they did not cancel it they stated that it had to go under review. I don‚Äôt understand because I am on the phone stating it is not me making the orders and records show someone changed my Grubhub password. They stating they are going to call me back but never do.

title: Horrible
review: I tried to order food 2 different days and both days, there were no drivers, my delivery time kept getting pushed back over and over again and their only solution was to refund me and offer a free trial of GH+‚Ä¶ üôÑ like i would actually want to try to order anything with them again! Door dash is much better so I‚Äôll be using them from now on.

title: Datoswife
review: All GrubHub drivers are very courteous majority early on delivery hardly ever an issue with any restaurants and if so GrubHub usually gets to it takes care of it on our hands down a daily use for me

title: Great way to get Great Food!
review: When you are disabled and can‚Äôt drive it is a real treat to find this service and to get food from one of your favorite restauarants; Pizza Union San Marcos. Thx again for the great service!!!

title: Forewarning terrible delivery times in El Paso Tx area.
review: Tried using the app more than a few times in El Paso Tx area and my food was always more than an hour late. Didn‚Äôt matter if I ordered less than a mile away it was always late. When I reached out to customer service they would give me $5-$10 credit for the late delivery. Totally didn‚Äôt make up for the cold fries and watered down drinks. Gonna try doordash.

title: Convenience
review: I enjoy Grubhub because of the convenience of how quickly you can order. Sometimes they have good deals to shave off all those extra fees. But sometimes their fees are over the top.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review:
Tried 3 times to place an order and it would place and immediately cancel‚Ä¶contacted customer service and the response/solution was to ‚Äúuninstall and re-install the app‚Äù‚Ä¶then they asked me to try their website but to clear all cookies and cache, Seriously??? 

Guess what?  I uninstalled the app and used Uber Eats that worked perfectly‚Ä¶bye bye Grubhub!!!!  Worthless and a waste of time.

title: Will not refund bad orders
review: I had bad luck with a local restaurant messing up my orders significantly enough that I couldn‚Äôt eat what they brought. After 2 times Grubhub said I was requesting ‚Äúunusual amounts of refunds‚Äù and refused to refund money. This was after I ordered a family meal for 8 people and received a single sandwich and had photos of the receipt showing the wrong item was delivered. This place is a scam. Go with DoorDash or Uber eats.

title: Deliveries Are Often Wrong!
review: Would it take any more time for a driver to check the contents of the order with the restaurant as opposed to blindly grabbing a bag of food and having unsatisfied customers. Waiting a hour for food and the only resolution is a refund doesn‚Äôt build trust in your ability to provide a service.

title: Always cancelling orders
review: Been using Grubhub for 6 years and there is a 50/50 chance my order will be cancelled every single time I use this app. The customer service people are absolutely no help and they‚Äôre pretty snarky and rude on top of that. Why even bother paying for a + membership for a company that doesn‚Äôt fulfill their orders and then doesn‚Äôt offer any solutions besides ‚ÄúOops sorry‚Äù. Going to Doordash ‚úåÔ∏è

title: Only Here for GrubHub+
review: Worst customer service when there's an issue. Account gets flagged and frozen for normal use of having food delivered but they claim suspicious activity. I'm sorry isn't that what GrubHub is? Food delivery. Customer service gives same robotic answer that's in some book somewhere. They don't care about their customers.

title: Too expensive
review: I have Grub Hub plus that is supposed to include free delivery.  Instead of big delivery fees, they charge additional ‚Äúservice fees‚Äù.  Door Dash does not.  The only time I order through Grub Hub these days is if I cannot find the restaurant I want on Door Dash and I cannot go pick up the order.

title: As people have mentioned‚Ä¶ customer service is garbage
review: I feel like there have been too many incidences where the order was partially missing and they only refund you the cost of the missing food but not the delivery fees. Ordered four items, only one came and still had to pay the entire cost of fees. It‚Äôs unfair and should be addressed by Grubhub. Shame on them.

title: Trash
review:
Get local delivery from the merchant. All just randomly assigns people as quickly as possible and won‚Äôt show they‚Äôve cancelled until they have a ‚Äúnew driver‚Äù that may also cancel. All this after already placing the order. It‚Äôs like a game if ‚Äúwill I ever get my food‚Äù roulette.

The end result is that the app owners bend over the users, drivers and stores; while holding zero accountability.

title: From love to hate
review: The delivery drivers are professional and courteous.  I have used this app for approximately 3 years and loved it but the last 6 months or so have been terrible.  Constantly missing up to half my order each time I place an order.  Not sure if I‚Äôll be using this service anymore.

title: It‚Äôs not worth
review: Tbh, Grubhub just doesn‚Äôt compare to DoorDash, it‚Äôs the same price for GH+ as DoorDash subscription, but less options and deals, and higher prices than door dash, also, I have yet to receive my order on time and not have it be delayed. I really wish I didn‚Äôt miss my  renew sub date lol, but won‚Äôt be subscribing for another month.

title: Need improvement with food concern
review: If delivered with Grubhub all good need to be specifically sealed with label at store while it‚Äôs delivered because we feel that all delivery is not the same because of Covid and need pictures send from when they pick up also for better customer experience and company may have upper hand.

title: Grubhub
review: This app is amazing but it can be not so amazing when I ordered subways cookies they we never got the cookies cause they didn‚Äôt have any and they didn‚Äôt give me my money back

title: GrubHub+ ROCKS
review: I live in a semi-rural area, next to a city with a major university. While my town has fantastic restaurants, it‚Äôs incredibly convenient to have GrubHub+ so I can order delivery without the extra delivery fees!

title: Credits
review: Everyone note this shows Ty company sends credits on through codes to your email. Nothing actually goes through to your account in the hopes that it gets lost in spam folders or other emails. Please remember to try pull one over on them as much as possible as they will continuously try to screw you with there awful customer service responses!

title: Horrible!
review: If I could rate negative stars I would. I used this app for a while and in the last 3ish months it has been nothing but issues. Cold food. Incorrect food. Food delivered to the wrong address. Don‚Äôt expect to get help from customer service. They are beyond awful. Unprofessional. You will not get reimbursed. They will offer you credits toward future orders.  It‚Äôs the worst company I have ever dealt with.

title: Great app
review: This app is ok in ordering your food. When an error took place, Grubhub left me on hold for over 45 minutes, and never bothered to pick up. I had to notify the restaurant not to deliver my food, because grubhub has foreign employees who claim they speak English to get the job, but can‚Äôt comprehend English while trying to interact with customers. Grubhub never apologized or offered any discounts. They lost me.

title: Just a bit too much
review: I would use the service more if it was just a bit less expensive.  Kinda seems like a high school math - maximizing profit problem ‚Ä¶you missed the vertex ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

title: Terrible Customer Service! üò°
review: My Mom ordered from GrubHub yesterday, And all I can say is that they had terrible customer service! We waited two hours for the person to deliver our food and no one showed up! And last month when she ordered from GrubHub the Woman that was supposed to give us our food Was going the opposite direction! Never ordering from here ever again! üò°

title: Great app
review: Love the service and product but the app has a lot of competition. User friendly and has great deals in ur local area; also has a majority of restaurants and fast food in your local area.

title: Never use this app
review: They give you the option to have ‚Äúcontact less delivery‚Äù or in person delivery. When I pick the in person option they still leave my food at the gate. So many times someone else took my food or they just delivered it to the wrong address. Much easier to drive to the restaurant and pickup the food myself.

title: Bad Service
review: My account was suspended for no reason whatsoever. I was not allowed to order anything from anywhere even though my payment went through. They kept refunding me on every order. When I called customer service they said they could not tell me want my account was suspended. Such bad service and customer care. So disappointed.

title: Great app worth it
review: Such a useful app, extremely user friendly, no issues whatsoever, straightforward and easy to earn money and even set goal.

title: No cash!!!
review: I really like this but they don‚Äôt accept cash!! I would be getting this WAY MORE but they don‚Äôt accept cashüòï I‚Äôm a teenage girl and I do things around the neighborhood a lot so I get payed in cash therefore I can‚Äôt purchase anything because they don‚Äôt accept cash!!üò≠ please fix this!

title: Worst service ever
review: Your app is terrible to many complications with the gps and delivery the drivers are doing there part by delivering the food just never to the right address I hope in the future this is resolved or this company is dissolved, very unsatisfied I only used this app because I didn‚Äôt see Wendy‚Äôs on Uber eats with 0 dollar delivery will never order from this app again.

title: Delicious food
review: Picked up a pizza from one of Riverhead‚Äôs finest restaurants last night. If you want a pie that‚Äôs done right along with the authentic Italian food they prepare; this is the place to visit. Thank you Cucina25!!

title: Grub hub
review: We use it when we are out and need a bite to eat- No often- but everytime we have used it - It has been great- Convenient and easy to use.

review: Asian boneless chicken wings are good, ask for extra sauce. Onion rings are amazing, my grandson liked his ham and cheese sub. They have kids subs. Over all wish the kids subs was a few dollars cheaper. I would recommend eating at Slacks.

title: Competitors Are Better
review: I have the premium service for DoorDash GrubHub and Uber eats. I‚Äôve never had as many issues with the other two that I have had with Grubhub. Today, for the second time in a row, I‚Äôve wasted an hour or two trying to order through Grubhub. Either the food never arrives or the order is terribly incorrect. Cannot recommend the app any less.

title: I recommend Grubhub
review: My orders have been more timely than my experiences with other services I have used. I am enjoying my experience using Grubhub recommend using this service. The drivers are courteous.

title: I want to love it.
review: EVERYTIME I order it seems something is made wrong, missing, or it‚Äôs SO late it‚Äôs still gay or freezing, stuff spilled-last time they delivered an almost empty spilled drink.. they never ever remember the condiments, it‚Äôs SO much for delivery and taxes..and other fees..it‚Äôs just a lot of extra money to have the wrong items or cold late items delivered.

title: Most of the time my order is cancelled
review: By then I usually don‚Äôt have the money to order anything else till the refund go thru sometimes its right away and other times it take days I get off late and everything closed so very Leary to order if I‚Äôd late in the day like today but I‚Äôm going to try

title: Recently broken
review: Congratulations, one of your recent updates completely broke the app. It spins on an orange screen while launching now. It might be due to an vpn or ad blocker, but I don't have time to debug your app for you. And if that's the case, it's ridiculous to track users that pay real money for a service. Please cut this crap out, and hire more engineers if necessary to work properly.

title: Food To You

title: What about when the order is wrong?
review: Have placed a bunch of orders and a few times it‚Äôs wrong what we get should the restaurant pay for Grubhub to bring back the correct order?

title: Not worth it
review: Grubhub is very poorly run here in North Texas. The lack of drivers, poor customer service, very long delivery delays are not worth a consumers time and aggravation. How can a convenience service be so inconvenient? Until Grubhub gets their act together in switching to another service. My order took over an hour and a half to be delivered which is unacceptable. It‚Äôs not on the restaurant, it‚Äôs on Grubhub.

title: Worst compared to Uber and DoorDash
review: Wouldn‚Äôt bother using this service. They don‚Äôt hire drivers that have any common sense. They have drivers who deliver their own orders instead of urs, then call back telling u the drivers outside and wants to know if u have their order. Just really unprofessional, on top of the fact they dunno what they‚Äôre doing half the time. Will not use them again.

title: Delivery person
review: The woman was kind and patient with me because I was late getting the food from her. Would love to have her deliver again

title: Never had a good experience
review: Seriously, I was fine waiting, but after 30 minutes my order was just cancelled. No explanation. Between this and other food delivery apps, it's always cold, always late, never reliable. It's most likely the drivers biting off more than they can chew.

title: Needs better food pictures
review: Many dishes pictures. The ones that have them, feature just one picture in the header it‚Äôs partially cut off.

title: Order
review: Quick and easy to order

title: Customer service is horrible.
review: Never using this app again fr. I needed a refund 3x and I didn‚Äôt get it. Those 3 times they didn‚Äôt get my order right. No refund. If the driver is late? No refund of course the food is going to be cold; don‚Äôt even want the food anymore.

title: Worst food delivery service on the market
review: They don‚Äôt even have drivers to deliver your food and when you reach out to customer service, they‚Äôre no help whatsoever and actually super rude. This company has a lot of problems. Don‚Äôt see it making it much longer unless they make big changes. There are way better alternatives to this app.

title: Conscience
review: My second try with this app and there‚Äôs issues on communication between customers and distributors last time. Hope this is better.

title: Terrible service. Cancelled my order after we waited  minutes
review:
This is completely unacceptable. This is why we stopped using Grubhub a year or so again. Your service is terrible, and you are completely insensitive to the customer having a lunch hour.

Thought we would try you again, and sorry that we did.

title: Greed
review: I think it‚Äôs past time for delivery services as well as the restaurants do away with the service fees, (to cover operating costs). Fake Covid is no longer an issue. If a restaurant is still having trouble keeping the doors open, they should close the doors!!

title: Amazing and fast
review: Grubhub food is always easy to order and always helpful never had an issue:)

review: I was briefly in NY, no problems & everything arrived within promised range. I will likely use again next time I travel.

title: My review was deleted because it wasn‚Äôt favorable to the company
review: Stay away from Grubhub. The drivers are lazy and customer service is horrible. I was a loyal customer until recently. Long story short, my food never arrived even though I contacted and talked to the delivery drive. I had to fight tooth and nail to receive a refund, spoke with two representatives until I got my money back.

review: I had a $35 credit, but when I went to order food, it was nowhere to be seen.  I only got the credit a week or two ago.  There should be an email warning us they're going to expire if there's a short expiration date on it!

title: Food always cold ‚Ä¶
review: Not sure how this thing works but every time I‚Äôm forced to use food apps like this my food is always cold and nasty. One time at work someone even cancelled picking up my order so it took 2 hours. Really disappointed. Would not recommend unless you have no other choice.

title: Terrible Service-Cancelled all orders
review: Grubhub has cancelled the last 7 orders I‚Äôve made!! I have been gifted food gift cards to help my family as I recover from a tragic accident, and they must not service the area. Once it was an hour wait, and they cancelled it an hour after order. Do not buy gift cards or order through grubhub if you are located in the north west Minneapolis suburb.

review: Four stars, because I wish that when restaurants did there own delivery I could track their progress to my door.

review: I love Grubhub but I do not love that some restaurants are just certain foods from other restaurants listed, I.e ‚Äúwild burger‚Äù being just a list of burgers from Buffalo Wild Wings. It is very deceiving because it doesn‚Äôt state that in menu.

title: Orders always late. No compensation ever
review: My order has been over an hour late or has been dropped an hour after purchase the last three times I‚Äôve purchased. You cannot get ahold of them on the phone due to ‚Äúusually high call volume‚Äù and the people you talk to through the app refuse to refund you. Use any other food delivery app

title: Incorrect menu prices lead to being charged extra without consent.
review: Restaurants should not be able to charge the customers extra money b/c the app hasn‚Äôt been updated to show the new prices. That‚Äôs not the customer‚Äôs fault.

title: Worst delivery app
review: My order was already going to be delivered late, switched several drivers before being cancelled. Waited almost an hour and a half before not even getting my food. Then their offering was $5 off next order which is what I already used on the one that got cancelled. Pretty pathetic solution if you ask me

title: ALWAYS late and ALWAYS cold
review: It‚Äôs suspicious that Grubhub has so many reviews that are overwhelmingly negative, but still show as five stars. Anyway, every time we‚Äôve used them, the map always shows the driver going to the restaurant, then going to a completely different restaurant and doing another delivery before they finally arrive with your order.

review: Time and time again the delivery drivers ignore the delivery instructions that I am wheelchair bound and need the food delivered to my door. Instead they leave it on the front steps of my 6 story apartment building where it is immediately stolen. They could care less.

title: This app is trash
review: They take orders even when they have no drivers logged in/available then just keep delaying the order so you‚Äôre waiting an hour and a half just for them to end up cancelling due to not being able to find a driver. You could have eaten 4 times by then. I could have made 7 different meals JUST TELL US THERE IS NOONE AVAILABLE INSTEAD OF MAKING US WAIT NEARLY 2 HOURS WHILE HUNGRY JUST TO CANCEL YA JERKS!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Don‚Äôt order through these guys
review: I can‚Äôt count how many times I gone through to the app just to find that delivery is paused due to high demand every time I ended up using doordash I was only able to order about three times out of the several hundreds of times that I went to thier app just go through door dash they‚Äôll deliver for you

review: Prices keep going up while service and speed continue to decline. Unless you have no other option, grubhub is definitely not worth paying double for your food just to get it an hour later. If you get it at all.

In this day and age how someone can have this job without being able to follow a gps is unacceptable.

title: Terrible Customer Service
review: Incorrect order (which happens) but then followed by a poor customer service to which my chat was ended by the rep because I couldn‚Äôt respond quickly enough. To summarize: we ordered 4 items, they delivered one, charged us $20 for it and said it was company policy. Last time using this service. üëéüëé

review: I‚Äôve order food from the app 3 times, each time they delivered they have forgotten to bring half the order. This last time I got 9 out of 18 wings and the forgot my waffle fries. title: Better Than UberEats
review: Compared to having the app in 2020, the bugs and glitches in the app aren‚Äôt as major anymore.

title: Worst Food Delivery Ever:
review: For A Month Straight They‚Äôve Been Telling Me I Have To Wait 48 Hours If They Need Anything Without Giving Me Anymore Information‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm Done Using This App For Good, After I Get M‚Äôy Refund For The Order That Never Went Through I‚Äôm Deleting This App & Never Coming Back To It!!! This Is Unbelievable, Ya‚Äôll Want People To Use The App But Can‚Äôt Order Food & Saying 48 Hours For A Month Straight Is Not 48 Hours!!!

title: App is super sketchy
review: App would not allow me to update my address. Took me 20 minutes to have to delete and re-add the app. to get the address updated.  Then I was offered $5 but when it was time to pay the option for the $5 off was no where available.

title: Refuses to give refunds when you don‚Äôt get items
review: I have a huge problem with drivers leaving my drinks and kids meals out. Which is pretty much the sole purpose of me ordering food to make them happy and I can‚Äôt even manage that by using this app. So I‚Äôm out the money on those items and I gotta go spent the money again and go get it myself.

title: Buyers be aware
review: They can charge additional funds (even several days after the order) beyond what's agreed on when checking out, and they won't even notify you. Remember to check your bank statements! review: All of a sudden I no longer find the black owned restaurants I order from on Grubhub. They redirect me to  different restaurants which I have zero interest in trying. I e seen this happen with over 6 restaurants I ordered from. After two orders, they magically stopped showing up or claim as closed! What the heck is going on?

title: Don‚Äôt try this app
review:
They over charge on everything!
I payed for Grubhub +(which would be 0 delivery fee) it‚Äôs not even worth it cause everything still cost a lot (I have all these random fees ) that would make it add up to a lot. You are better off going to the restaurant and places in person to save some money . This app is not worth it.

title: Need the ability to add notes.
review: I keep making the same mistakes.  I need a the ability to add notes for myself for restaurants or dishes, e.g. get the less sweet bubble tea, order extra ginger, extra spicy means regular spicy.

title: Review
review: Grub-hub has been a great blessing to me, I‚Äôm paralyzed,& get tired of the microwave ding as my dinner bell!! I‚Äôve been lucky in that the drivers have been very kind and accommodating! True Blessing! Thank you!!

title: Tips options
review: Everything is good but why the default tip option is 1$ put it higher sometimes i press confirm and forget to edit the tip default tip should be atleast 10%!

title: Wish I could add more sauces
review: The app is ok. It‚Äôs frustrating when I want to add more sauces from a place (for whatever cost) but I can‚Äôt do that with the app. If it had an option to add however many additional sauces then it would be great.

title: Order
review: This was my 1st time using Grubhub and I was very pleased with the service, will definitely use again

title: Way better than Uber eats
review: Best customer service, user friendly interface and supports restaurants.

title: Price
review: Just wish they were a little cheaper other wise fantastic

title: Beware of marked up price
review: I noticed prices have increased significantly from the restaurant I frequented, after comparing prices through the restaurant‚Äôs website to Grubhub‚Äôs, true enough, Grubhub had significantly marked up all the prices, don‚Äôt fall for coupon and their scam, you are still paying more after taking into account all the marked up items.

title: Bad customer service
review: I chatted with a customer service rep, Zachary V. He was terrible to work with, should definitely not be working in customer service. Didn‚Äôt issue the credit he told me he would, refused to cancel an order even though they hadn‚Äôt even made the food yet. Very disappointed in the quality coming from Grubhub lately

title: error
review: couldn't order from toppings for right half of pizza from the app. Only way to order was to "reorder" a pizza I ordered previously..

review: Your refund process is ridiculous. You subtract the partial refund from the original amount and then charge me again for that amount. Then you process the refund for the first charge which takes days to clear, so for a while I‚Äôm double charged instead of a basic partial refund.

title: Love chipotle!

title: EXPENSIVE

Work gave me a $25 gift card. Most of the restaurants I would pick still had $12 -$18 MORE to pay even after the $25. Who knew getting pho, 2 spring rolls, and a tea delivered to your house cost over $40. 

I finally found a restaurant that only had $7 in excess of $25 for my pho, spring rolls, and tea. Too bad I've already lost my sanity due to how expensive this country is.

review: 6 dollar deal delivery fee, plus up-charge on dishes in general, plus service charge, plus tip. Even more expensive than door dash and other delivery services. A dish that would normally cost me $18 ended up costing $38. Won‚Äôt be using this app again.

title: It works.
review: To be honest, the only reason I‚Äôll give 2 stars is because you were the only app with drivers out right now. Otherwise, your delivery fees are disgusting and I wouldn‚Äôt use your app if I didn‚Äôt have to. But still, you came in clutch with a $20 double cheeseburger from Steak ‚Äòn Shake‚Ä¶.

title: Awesome food
review: Took a while to get but I ordered during traffic time but I must say it was hot crispy and really tasteful only problem is they forgot the drink and cookie that came with the pot pie meal other than that it was really good üòä

title: Glitchy
review: I like that they pay their drivers. But the app could use some work. It froze to where I couldn‚Äôt make any selections and had to close/open a couple times to get back to my orders.

title: Great service
review: First time I have use it. It was indeed awesome. But I wish I could have had more choices of restaurants especially Captain Cook. Great service!!!

title: App is a scam
review: You‚Äôll wait 2 hours for your order and it will either be ice cold and half-smashed or it won‚Äôt arrive at all. But don‚Äôt worry, they‚Äôll give you $5 off your *next* order in lieu of a refund on the food you never got in this one! I gave GrubHub 3 tries and they were all dismal failures. Do not use this app if you value your time, money, and sanity.

title: Drivers
review: Drivers are great but some of the food establishments I have chosen are sub par.  I have vertigo and can‚Äôt drive right now.  This helps me tremendously.  Thank you.

review: They don‚Äôt take responsibility for any wrong/missing item delivered. They just issue a refund and tell you to reorder, but why would I reorder when I know the next one can be wrong too?

review: App worked fine until it made me sign up for 30 day free Grubhub+ after the entire initiation of the order stemmed from the link through our PRIME membership. Unlikely coincidence onsidering tech-savyness of both companies.

title: Smooth operating UI
review:
Have not used GH in years, using it for the first time sort of was just so darn easy.
Pop up and down arrows made sense. Nailed it

title: Terrible
review: Apparently the delivery drivers take orders and only deliver them if they feel like it. Multiple times the driver didn‚Äôt bother to pick up the order leaving us wondering if we were going to get our food or figure something else out. I deleted the app and won‚Äôt be using the service again.

title: Incompetent drivers
review: I have never in my entire life left a review on an app, but I just have to express my disappointment. On two different occasions my food was dropped off at the wrong house. My house is not difficult to find and the instructions are as clear as day. I understand that no one is to blame but that doesn‚Äôt lessen my frustration!

title: Begging for review
review: I‚Äôm sick of apps asking for my review, I have yet to run into a app that works perfect and doesn‚Äôt cost me money.  Grub hub jacks up the food prices and adds on fees plus their ‚Äúmonthly‚Äù charge to have access to the plus features. For those that want delivery and don‚Äôt mind way overpaying for the convenience. So yes, since this how these apps are- one star it is.

title: Did NOT give me proper Coupon
review: This service did NOT give me a $25 coupon off for my first order. This is the ONLY reason I used this app. WILL NEVER be using this ‚ÄúGrubhub‚Äù a g a i n!!!!!

title: First Timer
review:
Ordered through GrubHub for the very first time last night, and the whole process was seamlessly smooth and pleasant. 

The transparency of each component of my order and cost, the transport component with the driver, and the estimated time of delivery was flawless and uplifting.
 
I‚Äôm definitely a believer and keeper with GrubHub and will order through them again in the near future. 

Blessings and SHALOM!!

title: Oder never arrived and was not refunded
review: My order never arrived and I was not given the option to contact the driver after it said it was delivered. I contacted customer service and they said they would give me a refund, but they just gave me credit for the app, but not equal to the amount i spent on the incomplete order. Overall really disappointed and hangry.

title: Taj on wheels
review: I‚Äôm not a super fan of Indian food, but this food was incredible. The taste the moist chicken the seasoning five stars I‚Äôll be ordering from the Taj on wheels again and again thank you.!!!

title: Food almost always late
review: It‚Äôs ok but they have drivers that deliver to complete opposite locations of where you are pretty frequently so your food is cold and will need some microwaving. On average add 20-30 minutes on to the original estimate. They charge a lot for service fees and delivery fees to get cold food delivered.

title: Easy
review: The process of finding and ordering what I want is fast and simple no matter where I am.

title: Mis delivered
review:
Seems no matter how detailed the instructions are to get to my door they always take my food to the wrong place. One driver even left the food at the curbside. 
I only use them because I‚Äôm disabled. But, they asked me to walk around and see if I could find the food instead of getting on the driver/delivery person.

title: Plz use any other service
review: Grubhub does not care about their customers or how good their drivers are. The driver brought me someone else‚Äôs order, so I got a refund and ordered again. The driver then brought me my ORIGINAL order. Some of the boxes had clearly been opened and it was COLD. I never got the new order I placed. Tried to refund but it never went through. WTH.

title: Won‚Äôt Let Me Order
review: I‚Äôve tried ordering via the browser and the app. I guess technology is not their strength which is scary considering it is the basis of their business. It just keeps refunding me and say that my order was cancelled but never says why. It happens for any restaurant we choose. Do not use if you actually want to eat.

title: App is easy
review: Love this app, I like being able to find the specials. Keeps me saving money and trying new restaurants.

title: Not good
review:
I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs wrong with them lately, but I seem to NEVER get my whole order recently. 

I ordered for my family and only received food for one or two, leaving the rest of the family with no food. When I contact the drivers I‚Äôm told that‚Äôs all they were given. So either the drivers are stealing the food or the restaurants aren‚Äôt getting the full orders. I‚Äôm betting that Grubhub isn‚Äôt getting the full orders to the restaurant, otherwise how is a $70 order only two small food items?

They offered a refund, but what I want is what I paid for. 

Do not recommend using.

title: BK delivered‚Ä¶ great!!!
review: I never have to sit at another drive through again‚Ä¶ and the Impossible burger is unbelievably better than the actual burger!!!  Happy girl.

title: Wonderful service!
review: Quick and reliable

title: Now with more fees!
review: Even if you do Grubhub+ there are some businesses that ‚Äúdon‚Äôt participate in Grubhub+‚Äù but you don‚Äôt find out til the order submission.  And now all the businesses have ‚Äúservice fees‚Äù in addition to delivery fees and driver tip. I‚Äôll save myself the extra $15 and pick up my own food at that point.

title: At Woolf Realty
review: We use the service all the time for lunch and dinner at home 95% of the time everything‚Äôs the way it should be in on time

title: It‚Äôs a great resource but way to pricey
review: I don‚Äôt mind paying someone to pick up and deliver my food, but all the little fees or ‚Äúsubscription‚Äù add up and it‚Äôs a bit ridiculous

title: Not great
review:
My issue is that the delivery drivers never follow the directions has I put them in the system. 

I never want my food left on the door step. It‚Äôs crap customer service and when ever you try to talk to somebody about any issue it never works out.

title: Customer service and security is a JOKE
review: Someone hacked my account and changed email/pw. I caught it before they could charge anything and had to cancel my connected credit card. Grubhub proceeded to do absolutely nothing about this despite me reaching out multiple times. So I no longer have a Grubhub account. What a way to do business.

title: Terrible app
review: Glitchy app, customer service non-existent. One star is actually too generous. I have now tried to get my issue resolved three times using their chart help service, which most of the time leads to no response and even when it does has been useless. Worst experience I‚Äôve ever had with an app of any kind.

title: Wrong Order Delivered, Refund Not Given
review: I received an entirely different persons order. When I chatted with GrubHub they said I wouldn‚Äôt get a refund, and that to get what I wanted I had to reorder on my own. This isn‚Äôt acceptable. I didn‚Äôt my order, and still have to pay for something I didn‚Äôt actually get?  I would not recommend anyone use GrubHub.

title: Gotta love the convenience
review: Some days I get out of work late and don‚Äôt want to cook. So convenient to order food and have it delivered.

title: Order Canceled
review: First time user of Grubhub, and received a phone call 10 minutes prior to when my order was going to be delivered advising that the restaurant did not receive my order and it would need to be canceled. Not a great experience as a first time customer! This will be the first and only time I use the service.

title: Fast delivery
review: Thank you so much we are under the weather! We appreciate you so much!

title: Mediocre
review: Frequently late with customer service that has one response. Have a $5 or $10 coupon. They also have absurd fees tacked on top of upcharges on the food. Other than that it's a delivery service.

title: Got Banned From DD
review: I‚Äôm not sure how but got completely banned from DoorDash. Tried this. Just got my first order pretty well done pretty cheap.

title: Free delivery promo not true for all restaurants
review: App is fine but there are restrictions to free delivery promo. Some restaurants not included which is disappointing.  There‚Äôs no explanation or even a requirement set for minimum purchase. I rather tip the driver that money so I chose another restaurant.

title: Way too easy to pick the wrong address
review: There are a few duplicate addresses in my city and the interface makes it WAY too easy to select the wrong one, then if the driver doesn‚Äôt answer their phone, they can‚Äôt change the address. Literally any other app is better.

title: Needs enhancement
review: So I can favorite restaurants, but why the eff can‚Äôt we also favorite items on their menu?! It would make ordering our favorite items extremely easier.

title: More options please
review: Just wish there were more options, especially coffee!

title: Rating
review: Everything was done in excellence and order. Thank you

title: Terrible Customer Service
review: I hate that I have to talk to someone to cancel my order, by the time someone is able to help me they've already started working on my order and now I have to pay a fee if I want to cancel. Why can‚Äôt the just use an automated system at least they work faster.

title: Hacked account, no support
review: My account, like many others, was hacked. I got charges to my bank and had to cancel my card. There was no customer support from grubhub and i already favored all of the other delivery options. If you see this message just stick with uber eats or doordash. Do some research for alternatives and dont get this app.

title: Bad service
review: First time using the app, place an order of more than 75 dollars for my family lunch, 20 min before the order arrived I received an email saying ‚Äúorder cancel‚Äù your redound to your card within 5 business days‚Äù this is beyond unacceptable, they kept my money for 5 days and left me without lunch!

title: Why
review: Foodler was better Also you can‚Äôt put specific notes on restaurants and dishes to specifically recall what you liked and why Also the programming seems to steer you away from where you want to order from - instead to some programmed algorithm of where GrubHub wants you to order from.

title: You won‚Äôt take my money
review: Tried to order 4 times from 4 different places. Every time the order could not be completed for reasons unknown. title: S√∫per!!! 5 Stars.
review: wowww !!!!!!!! This app is the best of manyü§óü§óü§ó.  super easy to use and deliveries in 10-15 earlier than estimated. super happy with this application !!. I recommend it 5 stars.

title: The Fish Place
review: The food was excellent and well priced. And Huge portions. I will probably have this restaurant deliver every weekend. Huge variety of food!!

title: My order was so late!
review: I placed my order and it would be here in 25-30 minutes which was fine. But my food arrival got pushed back three times that it took over 2 HOURS to get here and it never did! I‚Äôm so disappointed because this was my first time trying this app. I‚Äôll never do it again.

title: Love the app
review: Grubhub is the best app I‚Äôve ever used in my life compared to DoorDash and postmarks it even has the best delivery drivers and the best service keep up the amazing work

title: Terrible drivers
review: They need to get better drivers. The amount of times I‚Äôve had to request a refund because a driver forgot an item or dropped the food at the wrong location is insane.  There‚Äôs never any proof either that they dropped it off at the right location.  Ubereats is better

title: Will never use them again!
review:
I AM DONE WITH THESE GUYS!

I‚Äôve used them for years and every once in awhile they‚Äôd forget an item, now it‚Äôs happening every time!
I asked for them to deliver the food that was missing since I already paid the obscene fees and charges, but they‚Äôll only do a refund, then when it came to a refund, they wouldn‚Äôt give it to me because of too many complaints‚Ä¶ HOW THE F IS THAT MY FAULT!?
So I told them I will never use them again, and the customer service manager said she didn‚Äôt care‚Ä¶ really? I spend on average $1200 a month with them, so I guess that‚Äôs not enough?

review:
I hate this app and will no lover use their services. Two weeks ago they didn‚Äôt deliver my order and said it came.

Today, it was my mother‚Äôs birthday and they only sent one food order instead of two. When I called the driver he blasted rap music over the phone twice. 

I‚Äôm done with these loser drivers stealing my orders!

title: Charge Too Much
review: Delivery apps like this will milk you for any extra penny you have. Great app to save time if you can‚Äôt walk the extra 5 miles to go to these restaurants, horrible app for saving money; you might as well walk. Nobody is paying you to use this app, so why pay Grubhub to save money only to spend even more?

title: Don‚Äôt waste your money
review: Even with grubhub pro and a $12 tip for food from a restaurant 2 miles away, the delivery person is now on the other side of town (10+ miles away) delivering another order before mine because that TOTALLY makes sense.   If you enjoy wasting your money for cold food, look no further!

title: Good service
review: Never had an issue that wasn‚Äôt resolved! Always early

title: Fast Delivery  Guy
review: Thank you for a fast Delivery, my mom is in hospital and her food tray came and she was very dissatisfied, so I placed an order and you guys Delivered her food so fast!

title: Forgotten Meal
review: The delivery driver forgot one of my kids meals and the other got his so there‚Äôs not a good situation at my house. I have to re-order something pay more money and watch my kids argue over who gets what after paying almost $100 for four meals. This is ridiculous. Do not recommend GrubHub or this driver especially.

title: Seems Straight
review: Every order I‚Äôve received through GH has been fresh and on time.

title: Don‚Äôt use this app if you want lunch
review: I ordered lunch today. 15 minutes into my 30 min lunch break(15 min after food was due to arrive) I got notice my order was cancelled due to a ‚Äúglitch‚Äô I would be refunded in 3-5 business days. So I have no lunch, no money and no time to figure out an alternative. And for the inconvenience I got a ‚Äúsorry‚Äô

title: Could be better
review: It‚Äôs not, but these people care. Let them prove you wrong, for us, they have proven valiente.

title: Few Menu Options
review: Not a lot of menu choices. Does not offer a lot of normal menu options that are on multiple restaurants menus and are available for delivery with other delivery services

title: I love GH!
review: I find some of my new favorite restaurants in my area on GrubHub weekly!!! My food is always on time and in great shape like I was picking it up myself.

title: Worst app and service
review: Extremely unprofessional and full of bugs. Every single delivery was +1 hour late. I send messages through the customer service chat, and there is a bug: as soon as they respond, I automatically get a message saying that I did not respond, and they close the chat.

title: Tipping is not quite right
review: Defaults to 25% which is incredible in its own right, but they also calculate tip based on the total after taxes and fees. Tips are supposed to be calculated based on the subtotal.

title: Horrible service
review: Horrible delivery drivers who leave your food where ever without contacting you, and horrible customer service when you call or use their chat. Problem keeps happening again and again and they never help or really do anything

title: High fees, limited options
review: ‚ÄúService Fees‚Äù are much higher than other delivery apps.  Also, there are less dining/location options available.

title: Zero customer service
review:
This literally happened:

1) I ordered food

2) App said it was delivered but food never came

3) Customer service says they contacted the driver and he dropped off food in my front door

4) They offered to refund or reorder. I asked to reorder. By now it‚Äôs 90 mins after my initial ETA

5) Two hours have passed. They cancel my order a second time saying there‚Äôs a problem with the restaurant. 

6) All they offer is 10% discount on next order. For a 2-hour wait with no food at the end of it!

7) I‚Äôm deleting this app. So many options in this space.

title: Only game in town
review: With where I live it‚Äôs the only way to get any quality food delivered. I‚Äôve noticed we‚Äôre getting charged a delivery on top of a service fee and that just doesn‚Äôt sit well with me. But I guess it‚Äôs my own fault for not planning a supper in advance.

title: Probably will try again - pretty good
review: Good empanadas, only came with two of the three sauces advertised, and one of those barely had a coating of the sauce on the bottom of the cup

title: Grubhub
review: Great app they get back to when there‚Äôs a problem Great prices I recommend this over any delivery app

title: Wish it weren‚Äôt so expensive though
review: But grateful for the service!

title: Terrible delivery and App
review: I feel awful for any restaurant trying to work with Grubhub. Constant delivery issues and only using because we received a gift card. And it was extremely confusing and time consuming to use gift card. What does it matter‚Ä¶.Apple won‚Äôt post this anyways ;)

title: Great
review: Great order that I got from Applebee‚Äôs. I‚Äôm ordering the same thing again today it was great thank you

title: Would recommend door dash
review:
I cancelled my dash pass once I found out that plus was included with prime, and my very first order was cancelled. I then couldn‚Äôt use first time order promos when I went to order again. Support did not help. 

Also, I can use door dash much later than I can this app.

title: Where‚Äôs my driver
review: Lately your tracking of driver has been off! Like showing driver are not near but show in one minute!

title: Cold food/ Late deliveries
review: I‚Äôm not one to make a review but this app has been awful for me, delivery that get canceled, or keep getting delayed, my food comes cold 50 percent of the time and now I lost my favorite place because my address is to far now, honestly if u are gonna choose a app, use door dash way more reliable

title: Love grub hub
review: It‚Äôs a little cheaper than other food delivery apps. Not many issues with app or workers. Great service!!!

title: Wait 2 hours then canceled
review:
Self explanatory. Can‚Äôt fulfill an order? That‚Äôs fine! Waiting 2 hours to tell me about it? Not fine! 

It‚Äôs almost like every restaurant is now closed and I can‚Äôt get food, and maybe I would have if I wasn‚Äôt waiting for your service. 

Your company is a joke. Back to Doordash I go:)

title: Worst food app I‚Äôve ever used.
review:
The menus aren‚Äôt full or represent what all is at the stores.
Often sizes are missing, like only being able to choose small drinks.
The drivers are rude and unhelpful. 
I have had an incredibly difficult time using this app, if I‚Äôm ever given a GrubHub gift card again I‚Äôll be regifting it.

title: Grub Hub + Issues
review:
First time using since signing up for the Plus program. Finished the order only to be told, with no advance notice, that the restaurant ‚Äúdoes not participate. Amateur hour at Grub Hub. Plus is a real reputational minus.

I heard from GrubHub about my review, offering to help. The dopes referred me to a section that does not exist in their app.  From bad to worse.

title: Satisfied
review: I will definitely use this app often, delivery driver was on time, followed instructions. Food was safely sealed and still warm.

title: The worst
review: Ordered food 5 times got food once. Got food one time and it was really bad not even worth the tip paid to driver. Other four time order cancelled or could not be placed. Great way to work through emotions. Every body excited for food then depressed when the food won‚Äôt come. Waste of time and effort.

title: Very poor experience time after time
review: Terrible experience, especially when using the app. Deliveries canceled on me by Grubhub, incorrect information about driver availability, glitchy functionality. Restaurant owners and consumers inconvenienced all around! With so many competitors who blow Grubhub out of the water I plan on never using GH again.

title: Terrible application and customer service
review: I used Uber Eats for the first time a month ago. When I received my food, it had multiple pieces of hair in it. After contacting Uber eats immediately- with proof of calls and emails they asked me to replace the order and would remove the charges. After countless times they did not remove both charges or fees totaling of over $100 because I now had to place the order twice. Over 5-7 calls with customer service the issue was never resolved and the service reps repeat themselves countless times over and over to apologize but have zero idea how to communicate or fix the issue. I asked for a supervisor and she said they‚Äôd contact me in a few business days and did not. After going to an event and speaking to a representative they offered me a $30 gift card which I tried to use tonight. After adding it to my account and placing the order the app said not available. Again, I called customer service and she asked me to delete the app and redownload it. Now the promo is gone if my $30 and over 30 minutes on the phone she asks me to wait 1-3 hours to figure out the issue. So again you have taken my money with no service and terrible customer service. Now the restaurant is closed and I have no gift card. I would not recommend this company to any individual and their customer service reps need more training assist customers oppose to continuously apologizing. I have had two horrible experiences and this company in my eyes just takes your money.

title: Scam o Rama
review: Use one of their many competitors. While traveling to celebrate Rosh Hashana, I attempted to use the ‚Äúschedule ahead‚Äù service for about five meals & one small grocery order to be delivered to my hotel front desk over the two days. The first night I had ordered two, samosas that I planned to eat for breakfast & an entree from another restaurant. Both said they had been delivered, and I had been charged for both, but the hotel only had one. The driver of the entr√©e left a note that he couldn‚Äôt find the place. Apparently that doesn‚Äôt matter & I had to pay for it anyway because I ordered it in advance (the order was placed over two days from delivery). Absolutely no recourse for a refund. And I didn‚Äôt have dinner. I ordered a small grocery order for the following morning, water and 2 bottled coffees to be delivered by 8:20 am so that I could receive it before I left for services. By 8:45 it hadn‚Äôt arrived. I pushed the help button a number of times- BY THE WAY THERE IS APPARENTLY A HEFTY CHARGE FOR ASKING FOR ASSISTANCE FOR A SCREWED UP ORDER. So if you do make the mistake of downloading this app, don‚Äôt push that button. I had another order for lunch that was supposed to come that afternoon but was canceled with the explanation that ‚Äúthe restaurant couldn‚Äôt get your order together, sorry‚Äù. It was at that point I canceled all remaining orders, 3 or 4, switched to Grubhub and had zero problems. I‚Äôll not likely ever Uber anything again. Skip this disaster.

title: Thanks for letting me get robbed multiple times and refusing to help
review: I hate this app and have officially stopped using it after being played for the last time. For a month now, I have a petty neighbor because he beats on his girlfriend and I defend her by calling the police or telling our landlord. So I‚Äôm retaliation l, he‚Äôs stealing my stuff: groceries, deliveries and my food. I‚Äôve told this app about what was going on and why I was having to recive so many refunds this month and even told them about the police report I‚Äôve made because of all of this. They deleted my account‚Ä¶..their ‚Äúcustomer service‚Äù calls me a lier and ends the chat. Now they are claiming I have multiple accounts. I‚Äôm sorry that people scam you guys a lot but that isn‚Äôt every case. I barely order out anymore because of what my neighbor is doing. I ordered maybe 3 times and each time he‚Äôs stolen it. I‚Äôve even had a driver last night just not even deliver my food and THEY REFUSED TO REFUND ME! I sent a picture of the driver pretending to drop off me food, pick it up and leave with it (yes I tried to stop him but I‚Äôm 7 months pregnant, can‚Äôt really move that fast) all I wanted is my money back and I was made to seem like I was a liar and a theft. So I don‚Äôt recommend this app at all, honestly I don‚Äôt recommend any of these ‚Äúdelivery apps‚Äù DoorDash allows too many thefts, ubereats refuses to listen to their customers and grubhub is ridiculously expensive.

title: Totally disappointed
review: This app worked fine for a while, then it started to involve some operations that failed the customer satisfaction for sure. I just ordered a dinner a couple of days ago and everything was just fine until minutes after the order was placed and almost ready to deliver. So it happened that I opened the app to check order status and my order was canceled, and the stated argument was that I called the restaurant to cancel the order over phone. Besides that Uber customer service told me when chatting that they were sorry and my $ can‚Äôt be refunded because I have canceled too many orders recently which was totally false and not demonstrated. Then #1 how is it possible that Uber may allow a customer to cancel and order over phone that he placed online through the app instead of canceling using the app, and #2 how is that you can tell me I won‚Äôt receive full refund for a non-demonstrated action. Guys you need to improve your operations or if this continues happening you will totally lost many clients. I uninstalled the app and hope to find some other new app or an entrepreneur who can do a little better with less complications because this is a difficult time to waste $ for no good reason. I better call straight to the restaurant and make my order than handle my $ to such an irresponsible entity.

title: Refund
review: So as of today I deleted this app and I‚Äôm no longer giving my business to Uber for them to steal from me. I ordered an item from a restaurant mango‚Äôs grill Keller but on the same day i decided to cancel it and order something else from the same restaurant. Upon my cancellation the app told me it would be a standard 4-7 business days for my refund to be processed so I was alright waiting but it was already 5 days and I had not received my refund so I decided to follow up and see what the hold up was just for Uber to transfer me over and over and end up not resolving my issue just to receive an email that I was not eligible for a refund. I tried to call and a customer service agent from Uber notifies me that because it was past 48hrs of me contacting uber about my refund that they would not issue it back to me because they have ‚Äòprocedure‚Äôs‚Äô in place to be followed. I am not going to get my refund because I followed the process that the app told me to but apparently I was supposed to call Uber to cancel the order for me. How does this make sense? Why are there not steps on the app then to be user friendly and also give out information about cancellation and what not. This app has left a bad taste in my mouth and please be careful anyone using the app. This is daylight theft. Save your money and go get your orders to go or dine-in. My two cents. If I could put 0 stars for this review I would.

title: Wow wow wow wow
