The issue is, they don‚Äôt refund customers for your charges nor discounts applied, even when deliveries are wholly wrong.  You get the same copy and pasted message ‚Äúrest assured, we will be forwarding this to our team‚Äù.  It doesn‚Äôt change.  Please save your time and money by ordering with seamless, grub hub, caviar, or any other food delivery app - I and those I know haven‚Äôt had a problem on any app other than Uber eats

title: Un happy with past order
review: I recently ordered from rib shack barbecue in Union. The food was wasn‚Äôt to my liking. I had two orders of mac & cheese missing from my order. You guys refunded me five dollars the two mac & cheese that  was $3.95 each I think and $5 that is efficient and I am not happy with that. I would like my full refund back. I‚Äôm always satisfied when I order from you guys or at the restaurant I choose from the site this one I refuse to pay for it. It was disgusting and my order was missing. And I am very unhappy with the outcome of everything.

title: Ripoff
review: I order one simple pizza and it was supposed to come at 6:30 and I even paid extra for fast delivery yet my order didn‚Äôt even have a driver till 7:10 and my order didn‚Äôt come till 7:30(the only reason I‚Äôm rating it a 5 is so people can see this and not be scammed)

title: Screwed up order, no assistance
review: I placed an order where they charged me nearly $20 of fees on a $30 order. I requested a special side to be included. Just to make sure I Calle free restaraunt, they didn‚Äôt answer, the driver, he didn‚Äôt answer nor did he speak English. Finally I called Uber Eats support and they said they wouldn‚Äôt do anything and to go kick rocks. For the massive fees they charge they provide awful service, I‚Äôll never order through them. Rip off artists and rude people all around. Scummy. I have an open PayPal dispute right now as a last resort.

title: Too many ads coming in has notifications on this app
review: Recently, I‚Äôve noticed too many ads coming in as notifications on this app I was for warned by 9to5Mac. This would be happening now I am seeing it in person.   I normally only open this app after I‚Äôve ordered, but it keeps popping up new advertising opportunities which I‚Äôm not necessarily interested in.  This needs to be fixed.

title: Driver hustling her business on my dime!!
review:
I just had some ice cream delivered to my clients house for getting under contract in the sale of their home.
They were given a brown paper bag with the ice cream in it, and ‚ÄòAngel B‚Äô written On the bag, and THEN they were given a flyer for the driver‚Äôs animal aromatherapy business.

Excuse me!?! I did not order anything remotely close to aromatherapy for animals!
 So to say my clients were a bit confused is an understatement. They said they were like, ‚ÄòIs the ice cream therapy for our dog? We were so confused!‚Äô
üÜòü§¨ü§¨ü§¨
She can hustle her animal aromatherapy on her own time, thankyouverymuch!!

No need to screw up a delivery even further‚Ä¶ I am Angel P, not B. 

And btw, this was the absolute first time I have EVER used √úber Eats. 
What an introduction!!!!
I would love to take my tip back from my order. The only thing she got correct was the address and that was cuz it was on the ticket!

Unreal.

title: Classic bait and switch garbage
review: You would think that a company as established as Uber wouldn‚Äôt pull shady nonsense but unfortunately they do. I am sick and tired of receiving emails with discount codes that only work for one or two restaurants in my area. when I try to place an order I find out at checkout that whatever nonsense they sent me in an email does not work. I am sick and tired of their crap and will no longer be using this app.  There are too many other delivery options available that don‚Äôt pull moves like this. Bye Uber

title: respectfully
review: I don‚Äôt recommend nobody to download this app I use to like Uber but not anymore after they took my money they doing fraud they charge for order that you cancel n they would not refund you yo money back which that‚Äôs so mess up I hate it never again y‚Äôall will not get money no more

title: Canceled order, lied about it & lied about my order history
review: This was my second attempt at ever using Uber eats because someone gave us a gift card. App would not allow me to enter my gift card. I ordered using my own payment. 30 minutes later, the order was canceled without ever notifying me. They say the merchant canceled it. The merchant disputes this. The chat told me that they declined to help me do the prior number of disputes. However, I have only ever use the app one time before 3 years ago and it went through without incident.

title: PIN function is garbage
review: Pay $120 a year for Uber one???? Don‚Äôt do it. They‚Äôll say you gave a pin for your delivery that was never delivered. Gives you zero options to handle the fact that you paid already in your time waiting for the food and hard earned dollars go to nothing. Wait a day to recoup your lost funds because they won‚Äôt even generate a receipt for you immediately? No. Don‚Äôt do it. They‚Äôd rather take your money, leave you without food, and leave the driver hoping they get tipped for not delivering your food.

title: Awesome & Convenient
review: I love Uber Eats. The app is easy to navigate and as always Uber & Uber Eats is all about customer service. This makes any occasion easy when you need a last minute meal delivered right to you and if there is a legitimate problem with your order they take care of it quick and easy.

title: Constantly Disappointed
review: My order is constantlyyy wrong when I order from UberEats. On top of that, the system for ‚Äúcorrecting‚Äù the problem is horrible. Constantly disappointed, paying more money than the food is worth when I‚Äôm missing half my order, and when they‚Äôve refunded me in Uber Cash I always got less Uber Cash in my account than was supposed to be refunded. And if you call customer service, they‚Äôll tell you there‚Äôs nothing they can do. Frustrated and hungry. Will never use UberEats again.

title: The only delivery service after storm Ian
review: I am so thankful for Uber eats and they have a dedicated new customer because they are the only delivery service running right now. We are slammed at work, people need us right now, but I need to feed my employees. Now I‚Äôm home and exhausted. Thank you Uber Eats!!! I‚Äôll reach for you first now!

title: Incessant notifications
review: The one thing I can‚Äôt stand about this app is the frequent notifications about promotions. It‚Äôs like getting coupons pushed to my notifications every day. Very tacky and annoying and I cannot see any way to shut them off except to completely turn off notifications for the app, which means I don‚Äôt get delivery alerts that I actually want. DoorDash does not do this.

title: No longer usable service is sooooo bad
review: Missing orders, missing items, charging for orders not delivered after refunding for drivers bailing‚Ä¶but worst of all is their absolute lack customer service.  After years of using Uber eats we can no longer deal with their lack of service, even as UberOne no customer service rep will help they‚Äôll just hang up when u ask a question they don‚Äôt understand due to THEIR language.  I stuck around to see if it would get better but it only gets worse so to the competitor I go

title: Going back to DoorDash
review: Horrible experience as a 1st time user. I ordered food, the driver was great, but food was wrong. I only got the option to rate the driver, not the restaurant. I asked for a refund and their automated system only gave me back $5 out of the $16 worth of missing items. Note my entire bill was $157. Customer service chat, took over an hour and still didn‚Äôt fix it. I just gave up. Still no way to review or contact the restaurant that I can find.  DoorDash has much better customer service and resolution management.

title: Not happy
review:
Wait was way longer then listed on app. The first person was on a bike who was 6 miles away to pick my food up. I told her this was making me late, so she canceled. The next person was on a bike and road pass the restaurant and my house to go Several mile away. At this point I had to leave and now I have to wait 3 to 7 business days for my order. 
 If they are on a bike they should not take the order if they are far away. I don‚Äôt want anyone bringing my food when they‚Äôre on a bike for numerous reasons!!

title: Live activity plz!!
review: I really like this app and I use it almost every day. But sometimes when I want to know where my food is I have to click the app and check it, I really wish you guys could do the live activity so that I could know when my food would get delivered!!!

title: I love Uber eats
review: I love the service & how they take care of loyal customers. 95% of time when I have a issue with order or anything they make it right. I definitely recommend! Also recommended paying for membership because it does save money if you order often

title: Terrible
review: Honestly I like sticking to doordash cause it won‚Äôt have stuff like ubereats does. They will randomly cancel my order after waiting 20 minutes with no reasoning and there will be times that I‚Äôll accidentally order and try to cancel but they basically charge the whole fee. Already cancelled my ubereats premium subscription just not worth it when they can just constantly change the estimated delivery time instead of being late

title: They upcharge your food
review: They charge you an extra 1.5 on every menu item while charging you additional fees. You can get a $0 delivery fee but get charged $14 in additional fees, it‚Äôs happened to me before. I also just spent an hour trying to order myself a meal while giving my kid a bath. Order never went through. Tried again, same thing, called the restaurant said it‚Äôs an Uber eats issue. Will never use again. Avoid this scam at all cost, cook from home. I do a meal kit plan and it‚Äôs saved me $300 a month. Uber eats is a scam.

title: Poor service makes me Hangry
review:
When Uber Eats gets an order wrong you might as well skip dinner. Their support times don‚Äôt reflect the time sensitive service they provide. I ordered food around 6:30 and at 10:00 I still didn‚Äôt have dinner. 

When my order was delivered late it was no big deal, I‚Äôve come to expect that. But, I immediately noticed I got the wrong order altogether. I used the app to contact the driver to rectify it before they got far. They never answered. 

I used the app to contact support. They did not respond quickly so I called the restaurant. The restaurant called Uber and assured me that would call me shortly to replace the order. 

They did not. Eventually I got ahold of them by calling their restaurant support number but by then it was too late to reorder. 

I got a refund. But I‚Äôm still hungry, and it‚Äôs past my kids bedtime.

title: They are horrible
review: They scammed my cousin they stole her money and it‚Äôs not adding up like we tried to order some snacks and we couldn‚Äôt so we tried not to anymore and then she had a lot of money but she looked at the app and saw that they weren‚Äôt giving her the money and then they said wait about a week like Charlotte pls tell me why a week like it‚Äôs a whole bunch of salt in that water and then we talking about sueing them because ain‚Äôt no way in the name captain under pants we ain‚Äôt waiting that long for like $80 dollars to come back

title: Promotions completely break the app
review:
Qualified for a promotion at a place I frequently order from, now I can't order. Opening the cart throws "Sorry try again". If I try using Uber's website or the Uber app it just loads infinitely when trying to compute the final total. Can't even find a way to talk to a human or report a problem with the app.

If you can't handle promotions, then just let me pay normally..

title: Garbage app garbage company
review: Both this company and app are a complete joke. They take 0 accountability both on the customer and worker side. Undeniably screwing over both parties simultaneously for their own profits. Only on Uber eats can I have 3 straight food orders in a row not be delivered and told it is my fault, no refund and I need to do the work to contact the driver and see what could have been done better. That is an absolute joke and laughable approach to customer service. You guys need to step it up because in your current state your business is trash.

title: The best
review: Feeds me when I‚Äôm hungry !!! Not always a perfect experience but thanks for your hard work‚Ä¶ would like to see more training for companies to provide better quality food and experience.. the oops of missing items has drastically improved ‚Ä¶ Thanks for that !!

title: Group order feature smart but needs work
review: Was hard for everyone to figure out how to finish. Credit card form in that flow doesn‚Äôt dismiss when you tap the payment method. Nor does it have a save or next button at the bottom. Instead it has an X top left which feels like cancel. Not continue.

title: Quality Service
review: Pretty good and prompt. Only thing is might take 3-5 business days to refund your $ to your bank account if a product is out of stock. Overall worth it so far and you can use standard Uber Cash from the regular Uber app for purchases which is nice, too! üòä

title: Your drivers steal food
review: I have had not one, not two, but three drivers in the course of the last few weeks pick up my food - drive it all the way to me and disappear and all I get back is Uber cash - not a refund to my card. And the two deliveries I used that didn‚Äôt show was used from the Uber cash. Just pointless. I have a ring doorbell camera and a detailed description in my notes of my house. No one ever showed. I had to contact my bank for fraud to get an actual refund and submitted a new card.

title: Unreliable
review: Don‚Äôt fall into the trap. It can be convenient but continues to be unreliable. An order received after 45 minutes the establishment is allowed to cancel the order with no reasoning nor repercussion. But the individual with a processed amount expecting a service to be executed since it was confirmed, is now left with nothing. Maybe instill harsher requirements on how the business can do whatever they want, when a customer gets charged for a cancellation, is that fair?

title: Total Trash
review: Not exactly sure why this app‚Äôs overall rating is so high‚Ä¶I see a lot of negative reviews that have 5 stars somehow ü§î anyway this is about the worst food delivery app I‚Äôve ever used. Totally unreliable. I‚Äôve given this app more chances than it deserves. Delivery always takes much longer than the given estimation or my order is randomly cancelled after waiting for an hour. Which is really annoying when you‚Äôre hungry and are willing to pay the astronomical prices. Total trash UberEats you should be ashamed.

title: Horrible Service
review: I got a $50 gift card from a family friend after my son was born. My wife and I tried to redeem it and order a meal to be delivered so we could focus on taking care of our son. I have not tried to place the order 10+ times in the span of an hour, and the order has not gone through once. I have tried to reach out to customer service with no response. Instead of being a convenience, Uber eats has made our already stressful life more stressful. Awful experience all around.

title: Too much extra charges
review: Bad business practice. I ordered through Uber eats and immediately after, I realized it was the wrong location. I called the restaurant immediately to cancel but they told me to do it through the app. It took me a couple minutes to cancel with the app because I‚Äôve never done it. The next day, I realized I was charged anyway. So I paid for no food. I understand if Don‚Äôt let me cancel but they should have told me, I would have taken the food. Don‚Äôt ever use Uber too, so much fees and no customer service.

title: Best offer pick up service.
review: I think UberEats is the most careful of all good delivery services, it‚Äôs backed by an easy to use platform with deals on free delivery, reduced delivery, something for everyone. If I were staying at a hotel and needed something to eat, UberEats would be my first choice in order delivery services. √úber thanks üëçüèΩ

title: Lists restaurants that don‚Äôt work with Uber Eats
review: Ordered from a local favorite. Menu was consistent with the menu currently being offered in the restaurant. Delivery estimated at 50 min. After 1.5 hours, I called the restaurant (because Uber is impossible to contact), and was informed that that restaurant not only doesn‚Äôt work with Uber Eats - it never has. The manager was very surprised to learn their menu was listed and of Uber‚Äôs charging for their food. Any trust in this app has been lost. Multiple attempts to contact Uber Eats was met with robots unable to help.

title: -10 stars REPEAT cancelled orders
review:
This app is such a joke lately. 
The communication is so far below what should be ethically acceptable to be considered a business. 
REPEATED cancelled orders where the DRIVER now has a hot meal for themselves. No responsibility for the people THEY HAVE DRIVING FOR THEM, that they ‚Äúhire‚Äù. 
Wasted time again and again, orders cancelled after an hour wait when delivery is scheduled for 10 minutes or less. 
Or better yet, turfed to FOUR different drivers because the first TOOK the food for themselves and then left the app. Assigned to next driver. And so on. 
Uber eats and Uber have lost Uber One/Gold (or whatever crap they call it) users/subscribers. 

Waste of time and money and resources, restaurants fed up with it as well, offering to REMAKE it for a discount because they physically handed to it to, in the case of tonight, Brian. Two minutes prior to our inquiry. 

‚úåüèª

title: Good luck trying to get ahold of someone
review: Terrible customer service. Driver said food was delivered at 9:53 but food never arrived. Check all around my property and seen nothing. Reached out to driver just to have my call ignored. Checked cameras from 9:30 up to 10:00 and seen no one drop anything off. Worse part is that I can‚Äôt even get a human on the phone to voice a concern. Everything is ‚Äúhandled‚Äù through the app using predetermined responses. Yes I got a refund but the fact that I can‚Äôt speak to someone about this is ridiculous.

title: Stay away! They keep charging after canceling!
review: Free 30 day Uber eats is NOT worth it! Cancelled via email before offer ended because there is no way to unsubscribe in the app - no link, no options to get out. Customer service basically threatened for disputing fees added AFTER cancellation that ‚Äúyou shouldn‚Äôt have disputed‚Äù and then blocked Uber rides, which had been separate from Eats. All but one driver was creepy and stalkerish. Horrible customer service - they won‚Äôt let you leave and add extortion fees when you try to. Not worth it!

title: CAN‚ÄôT DELETE TIP after FAILED deliveries!
review:
I‚Äôve had multiple failed deliveries, did not receive my food and tipped well.
I‚Äôm able to get a full refund for everything but cannot take back the tip the delivery driver does not deserve as they failed to even be a delivery service as I received zero of my order. 
Very disappointing when this happens! 
I love Ubereats but I need an option to change my tip like they use to have. I tip well to encourage and help delivery drivers and for good service but if I do it beforehand cannot alter it even if they fail to deliver.
I always tip beforehand because or else drivers would take up to 30 minutes to an hour to get here and the food would be cold.
Delivery service is suppose to deliver and when that service fails it‚Äôs very disappointing!

title: Spend more money
review: I got an amazing deal from my girlfriends phone, never used the app. Make an account, do everything the app wants; then they disable her account and we have no idea why. Just wanted a good meal on a good deal; so instead of paying $20 through the offer THEY gave us we spend $40. Never ever using this app again they‚Äôll just disable you for no reason and no explanation then make you spend even more money. This is why I use DoorDash and not this crap app and I‚Äôm telling everyone else the same

title: Poor customer service
review: After multiple issues with this company I decided to part ways and take my business elsewhere. I placed an order and the courier stole my food and put down they delivered it. They have no customer support number to call you have to go to a chatroom and speak to a robot. For a company as big as this there should be a support number for customers they can call for any issues and actually be able to speak to a human on the other end to help resolve issues.

title: Needed changes
review: Overall I like the app add its ease of use. I don‚Äôt like how Uber eats resolves problems with orders. They will refund the order but they won‚Äôt rectify the problem, also they should modify the app so it can be viewed in landscape mode. I use my iPad more often than not because of the bigger screen, but the app is only configured for phone use.

title: Charged twice
review: I made and cancelled an order and was charged twice for an order i had already cancelled. I contacted my bank and Uber Eats and they both that it didn‚Äôt matter that i cancelled the order ‚Äúmake sure you double check your order before you order.‚Äù I WILL NEVER USE UBER EATS AGAIN ! This isn‚Äôt fair they‚Äôre saying that because their merchant is out of money BUT ITS NOT TRUE BECAUSE I HAD ALREADY MADE AN ALTERNATE ORDER SO STARBUCKS IS T OUT OF MONEY. Bottom line is they are not here to help you, they are there to make you feel stupid and customer service is bad.

title: Notification spam from the app
review: Can‚Äôt disable promotional notifications in the App‚Äôs settings, resulting in constant spam of notifications. Disabling them globally in ios settings is a poor work around because it limits app‚Äôs core functionality. All other major apps allow you to selectively disable notifications by type. But this app doesn‚Äôt, making it spammy by design. Apple app store should block these kinds of apps to protect the quality of the ecosystem. There are better alternatives to this app.

title: I LOVE UBER EATS!
review: I‚Äôve been using DoorDash for years now. I overheard a friend talk about Uber Eats. I decided to download the app. I am so glad that I did. It is way easier to use and a lot more choices. Even the promotions were better than DoorDash. I am very happy and pleased with my decision. You guys will probably have a forever customer now.

title: Not ordering from UberEats again
review: It‚Äôs unreal how long I‚Äôve been waiting for my order. Uber‚Äôs service has become increasing unreliable. After deleting the app, I added it recently to try the service again, I‚Äôm disappointed yet again to wait 2 hours for my order. Never ordering from Uber Eats again. I never write reviews, as I simply don‚Äôt continue to do business with a merchant who provides bad service, but UberEats takes the cake as the service was so terrible today I needed to share this feedback.

title: I‚Äôm deleting this app
review: I do not have money to waste when there are days I literally starve so I‚Äôm not going to continue to waste my time trying to save money when you end up spending more . These support people do not care and just frustrate you even more . I receive a message that says don‚Äôt wait to claim your $20 off and a meal on us but it seems like it‚Äôs just a way to get you to pay something else . This is false advertising and deceiving people and shows no respect or concern for any customers .

title: Joke of an app
review: A couple joke of an app and customer service is hard to get a hold of, they make it nearly impossible to talk to an actual person. When you do they don‚Äôt help the issue you might be having, they say sorry then continue to give the same automated response thinking that will help. Save yourself the time and money and don‚Äôt get this app, get another delivery service app because this one ain‚Äôt it. This was my first time using the app and it will be my last, high disappointment.

title: Taking advantage of special needs
review: Special-needs people that use this app to feed themselves. They give refunds but it‚Äôs never enough to cover a 2st order. It‚Äôs like them stealing little by little . An it takes 48 hours for them to refund! Today my client doesn‚Äôt have enough to make other order. When trying to get ahold of someone to talk to , but they don‚Äôt have a hotline to talk to someone . All  my clients want is their food they order . taking a vantage of people that can barely take care of themselves is not cool.

title: App is clunky
review: I had to enter multiple selections multiple times before it would accept my second menu item. It just disappeared without any error and I had to start over. Took me 15 extra minutes to get through the process. I‚Äôve also had problems in the past where the app menu didn‚Äôt exactly match the restaurant menu. The restaurant blames Uber Eats, as they should!  Anyway, I eventually got the order placed, I hope!

title: Perfect customer service
review: After having issues with my order, I reached out to uber eats customer service and by the following morning they manage to compensate me for my order which I highly appreciate. Will be returning to the app again sometime soon

title: Uber has gone way down hill
review: This app has become so unreliable when it comes to restaurants either not delivering food at all or canceling after waiting 30+ minutes or just arriving way after initially promised or placing the order. Paying for priority on many occasions feels like it‚Äôs a total scam and they can tell you that the order will be later without giving any restitution customer service is absolutely useless and condescending. it is sad to see such a good company have gone so far downhill.

title: Nope!
review: They allowed me to purchase there subscription service, Uber One, without verifying my CVV, which is fine, because I lose my cards all the time. The funny thing is, right after that, they would not allow me to purchase food without verification. So I was able to set myself up for a monthly fee, which I was entice to do becauseI was going to save on the order I was currently making, then I was not allowed to make that order. Also, it just doesn‚Äôt have nearly as many options as DoorDash!!!

title: Paying for priority is pointless
review: I love using Uber eats. Especially when I can‚Äôt get out or just don‚Äôt want to cook. The only problem I have had is I‚Äôve paid the extra fee for priority to be delivered straight to me and still waited past the wait time.. A lot of the time I waited past the wait time. So paying for priority is pointless to me.

title: Allow more saved addresses
review: Why is it only 4 addresses?? It makes no sense. I work in more than 3 different places, and I often visit my family, so I NEED to add more addresses. Also, you should allow the user to save as 2 diff addresses, e.g. one for day delivery and another one for evening delivery, because the access doors can vary, even if it is the same building. It's amazing you haven't contemplated this basic need yet.

title: This app should be called Uber Thieves
review: I honestly don‚Äôt understand how is it that I don‚Äôt receive my food and you still charge me the money that I spent for the food that I should have received and then not give me my refund. Your policy is absurd and the fact that you stole my money it‚Äôs upsetting. I used to order from this app, and I even did the deliveries myself. Now that you showed your true face, I will no longer use your service, nor will I work with a bunch of thieves. if I could, I would give you guys -20 stars.

title: Fraud
review:
Spent two hours disputing an increase from an original estimate of 30 $ to a final delivery of 100$ - with 3 substitutions . 

One of the items substituted was feta with a sticker price of 8 dollars which appeared to become an 18 dollar item - even though item doesn‚Äôt come up when you search for it - and non of the items cost as much in Uber 

After talking for 2 hours with support and them telling me - that they can charge what ever they want and not provide an itemized receipt that would show how the coast of my order increased by 70$. 
Not responding Uber one employee Shivan Gupta started to teach me about fairness. And in the end completely ignored my questions and stopped responding at all. 
So it was my final experience with the platform, And how lovely was it especially after paying a 10$ fee for such a privilege. 
Great experience

title: you can always count on cherries for late night food
review: When I‚Äôm starving and can‚Äôt find anything open, it‚Äôs always Sherrys. The food is good and most times it‚Äôs always hot and delicious. I don‚Äôt know what you‚Äôre waiting for order something you‚Äôll be happy that you did.

title: Worst Food delivery app there is
review: What would you like. Outrageous prices, slow deliveries, your delivery driver dropping off someone else‚Äôs food when it would‚Äôve been faster to drop off your food first, cancelled orders constantly. Well if you‚Äôd like all of the above download this app and watch your 10 dollar order turn into a 21 dollar order. Get doordash or grubhub because this app is a true money grab. Currently waiting on my food that‚Äôs been ‚Äúon the move‚Äù for an hour. (I live 12 min from the restaurant I ordered from)

title: Uber Eats Took My Money
review: The customer service here is a joke. My order was cancelled BY UBER EATS because the driver couldn‚Äôt find my house. The driver called me to help find the place and I gave her the best instructions I could. She told me she is going to call Uber and hung up the phone. Shortly after, my order was cancelled and UBER said they were going to give me a refund. I waited and the refund never came. I called Uber and they said because it‚Äôs been 48 hours, they couldn‚Äôt issue a refund. Never got my food and they won‚Äôt give me my money back.

title: Cold Food Every Time
review:
Pay for priority deliver that says 25-35 minutes and took an hour and a half. Refund? Nope! 

There should be a test for every Uber driver to make sure they know how to drive in the city. These people, and I don‚Äôt mean the drivers only, app makers as well, don‚Äôt know how to navigate the city. I‚Äôll watch my delivery and they will take side streets instead of the freeway. A 15 minute drive will take them 35 minutes cause the drivers follow the stupid navigation app given to them instead of driving the fastest route. Garbage

title: The order is always messed up
review: I‚Äôve had it for two months after years of using doordash. I have had constant issues like orders being an hour or more late multiple times. My order today was missing over half of the items. Uber eats doesn‚Äôt care at all. When there is an issue with doordash like this they give you a credit or refund your entire order to make up for the inconvenience. I highly recommend utilizing any other delivery service besides Uber eats.

title: Happy
review: I am literally flabbergasted at how quick and easy it is to use this app! I was driving I had a craving for cocos Mediterranean and I clicked search and it came up popular item clicked on it literally a minute and by the time I get to my office my lunch will be ready! You can‚Äôt beat that

title: Very high prices within the app, ‚Äúbenefits‚Äù are useless
review: This is not beneficial. I want to save money with small orders yet the orders are still high. Even with Uber one, I have to spend over $20 to apply the promo and despite that my order is still high because the promo does nothing to reduce the price. I applied for Uber one expecting the first month to be free (as they advertised) yet I was charged $5 on my card after applying. This is useless, I am an unsatisfied customer

title: Good while it lasted‚Ä¶
review: I used to enjoy this app as a college student, but the last food order I had came ice cold and Uber did not do anything to fix the problem. The order I currently have was promised by 9:45 as an UberOne member but all of a sudden they changed it to 10:15 without keeping their promise of gifting $5 if it came after 9:45. This has gotten annoying and I can‚Äôt afford to spend this amount of money on poor quality service/planning.

title: It‚Äôs a nice service
review: I drive a truck and can‚Äôt get the truck into a lot of places so it‚Äôs nice having this service but sometimes the food is terrible but that‚Äôs the restaurants fault I guess. Someone pay off the order is missing but that‚Äôs probably the restaurant too.

title: Too many promos
review:
Use Uber eats like every other week, but get multiple promo notifications EVERY day.

It‚Äôs really annoying I can‚Äôt disable it.  I can turn off notifications but then I can‚Äôt get updates of my deliveries! Gonna give it another week, if it continues gonna delete the app and switch to Grubhub or something‚Ä¶  Might be less selection in my area but at least I don‚Äôt get these annoying notifications all day

title: Unavailable and Unreliable
review:
I've only ever been able to use this app in bigger cities, and 8/10 times the driver will steal one of the items from my order, or the restaurant will get it wrong even though I directly put what I wanted in said order.

The app sends constant unnecessary notifications, most about how they added more new locations, however for 4 years they have not and will not deliver to my home location.

title: Worst service ever
review:
It‚Äôs the worst customer service I have ever seen. 
I have to wait for my order for more than 2 hours from a restaurant that is 20 min away, and unfortunately I was having Avery hungry kids with me to be surprised after that with a wrong messy order and we have nothing to eat, then when I contact customer service instead of apologizing there is no response even I had a promotion with $25 they haven‚Äôt refund it Back. 
It was my first and last time to use this miserable application.

title: App bug
review: Is anyone else experiencing the map tweaking? My orders had a different drop off place than my house, like 2 streets over. The map looks weird because it puts the black line in a different street even when I put in my correct address.

title: Pretty good
review: overall it has most of all the restaurants I like on the app and rewards are always good . Has a wide variety of different places to eat from and again always has offers . It‚Äôs just the taxes when u got to checkout that‚Äôs the only issue lol

title: What‚Äôs going on?
review: VirtuallyEvery restaurant I go to in the app‚Ä¶ It allows me to choose items‚Ä¶ And when I go to my cart I get a message that says ‚Äúsorry your menu options have changed while ordering‚Äù or something like that‚Ä¶ But regardless I‚Äôm not able to complete the order. Literally six different restaurants, almost all of which I‚Äôve ordered from previously, showed me this message‚Ä¶ And it‚Äôs been happening for several weeks?

title: Goodbye Uber Eats
review: I have used Uber Eats for many years and now I am at my wits end. I am being charged a service fee higher than even the taxes. And when I place orders my food ends up arriving cold because it takes so long to find a driver. The app ends up saying things like ‚Äúoops, looks like we‚Äôll need to find a new driver,‚Äù which is ridiculous because by the time they find one I could have gone and picked my food up myself and have already ate it. I will no longer be using Uber Eats, time to switch to Door Dash.

title: Usually great
review: I use Postmates at least once a week on average and subscribe and ALWAYS tip drivers 20% plus and usually add Cash too just cause I know how hard this world is! But IM still very upset that about a month ago I ordered a pizza when I was out of town ( I have my location setting set to while using app because I don‚Äôt see the purpose of a delivery app knowing my exact location every minute of every day) when I got home LATE and exhausted from traveling I ordered supper and it was sent to a popular chain but in my previous location, I immediately received a notification that I was FAR from the delivery address and I canceled the order ( but was still billed) then reordered the exact same order from correct location and it was also Canceled!!!   Both show canceled on my account but I was still charged for the first accidental order AND had to cook supper at 8-9pm after traveling ALL DAY! So, NOT happy about that! I feel like im a fair customer and try my best to be honest and fair to my clients this is something that I am very unhappy about having to pay an extra almost $83 this month on my credit card for a order that was canceled within minutes of placing the order!

title: Support is horrendous, stick to other companies
review:
Tried using Postmates for the first time and after searching/selecting and then submitting an order, it kicked back saying ‚Äúno drivers available‚Äù. I think okay, fine I‚Äôll see if other closer restaurants will work‚Ä¶ I find a local restaurant and place the order. It arrives in a semi-reasonable time frame. Come to find out it‚Äôs missing items from my order that I paid for. I contact Help, who are absolutely beyond useless. They just provide canned answers stating ‚Äúthis order is not eligible for any refund or adjustment, but we will use this info to better our service in the future‚Äù. I‚Äôm sorry, what? I have used other services (DoorDash, etc) who immediately rectify and take accountability for issues using their service. I even escalated it to a supervisor who literally just copy/pasted the same answer with no help. They also keep closing it out as ‚Äòresolved‚Äô when it‚Äôs not. I‚Äôm super frustrated and I will absolutely never use this service again after this being my first experience. 

Like I said, stick to the other companies that know what they are doing.

title: Worse than going to the ER
review:
A few nights ago I placed an order on Postmates. It was late (1:30 am) and not a lot of places were open near me. I had to work early in the morning (7 am) and needed to go to bed but I was hungry and hadn‚Äôt eaten since lunch (1 pm) the previous day. It said my food would arrive at 2:05am with priority delivery. For whatever reason the arrival time got pushed back to 2:30am and my order was ready for pickup around 2:15. On the map I watched my delivery driver circle the building and park about a block away from the restaurant. Then all of a sudden they cancelled my order after waiting over an hour and I had to start the process again eventually getting a delivery from a place I didn‚Äôt want over 2 hours from the time I placed my original order. At least when you go to the ER they let you know that it‚Äôs gonna take awhile before providing you with absolutely nothing that makes you feel any better. 

Also Postmates will charge you more than the total it gives you when you place the order with absolutely no explanation of the additional cost ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

title: Will 100% still your money
review: I downloaded this app signed up put credit card, debit card, Apple Pay and $130 Uber cash on my account. Now when I try to use my Uber cash even with my card there is an error. I let Postmates know this in the beginning of October and they have done nothing but repeatedly sent me the same message without reading what the actual complaint was which is they have $110 of mine that I cannot spend. I live in California (expensive), I‚Äôm  pregnant with an entire family and $110 is a lot of money which I was trying to feed my family with and Postmates will not give it back nor fix the app. We are in a recession and this company will not even respond to me anymore when I ask them for legal information so I can‚Äôt even attempt to get my money back. Now I will be taking this to social media, the actual media and everywhere else until I get my money back or they fix the app. This is unacceptable and that is the last of my money since I have been on leave for disability and I want it back or I wanna be able to provide food for my family.

title: Insane
review:
Their fees are outrageous.
Not only do they ALREADY up their prices on every item from businesses to profit from, but they also charge you all these ‚Äúfees‚Äù. If I place an order and the order comes out to $11, the total with the FEES will come out to $20. How is that even fair? You‚Äôre better off just driving to whatever food place yourself. Not to mention, when you order through the app, the restaurant/place almost ALWAYS messes up your order somehow and you only get a partial refund depending on what happened and left with a messed up order still. 
Their customer support team via phone has always been delightful which is why I‚Äôm giving two stars, but without them, it‚Äôd be a one star. 
OH, and for some reason, when you order through the app, it won‚Äôt show all the item the restaurants sell. I even called restaurants and asked why it‚Äôs not on there and they have no idea..

title: Horrible customer service
review: If I could rate the Postmates service a negative star I would.  The app itself is fine, but the service is horrendous.  On multiple occasions our delivery was missing items from our order.  After reporting the issue, Postmates would issue an apology but not provide a refund for the missing items.  We used to be able to get them to issue a refund after some arguing with customer service, but now they are saying we have had too many issues in the past and they won‚Äôt refund for order issues anymore.  I find it hard to understand why it is our fault for their delivery failures and why we should have to pay for items we never received.  I hope sometime slaps them with a class action lawsuit because that is the only way they will learn that unfairly ripping off their customers and providing zero customer service is a bad business strategy.

title: The worst food service company‚Ä¶steer clear
review: Postmates is the fastest way to go broke ordering delivery. We have been customers for a long time now and we pay the yearly ‚ÄúUnlimited‚Äù service fee in an attempt to make the experience more palatable to our wallet. Even when ordering from a place with ‚Äúfree delivery‚Äù and having an unlimited membership, there are still a ton of extra fees. Restaurants also get paid 30% less when people use Postmates to order so the restaurants also jack up their prices to cover their losses. Who pays for all of this? You/us! If you ever have a problem with your order, don‚Äôt expect any help from customer service. They use an automated service first, then pass you off to someone over seas that copy/pastes boiler-plate responses. Use another food service company..any other company, actually. This is by far the worst. We are done and have deleted the app, once and for all.

title: Terrible support, scammers
review:
I made an order for a pretty large group of people at work. After multiple delays the delivery personally finally showed up at the drop off location, marked my order ‚ÄúDelivered‚Äù, and left. Shortly after she messaged me saying that she didn‚Äôt bring the food because the restaurant cancelled the order. 

I sent this to Postmates support along with screenshots of the message from the delivery person herself saying that she never got the food. After a lot of back and forth they said they were sorry but because the delivery driver showed up at the delivery location, they were unable to give me a refund. 

I paid for food not for someone to show up at the drop off location empty handed. This is after spending thousands on large orders through the app. Very disappointed with this level of service, and I won‚Äôt be using this app again.

title: Terrible customer service- never again.
review:
Before the other night I had placed a total of 3 orders ever on this app. One of the orders I had ended with me receiving an order missing items. I contacted customer service and they fixed it. Fine. But then I placed an order last Friday and once again my order was missing food. I was told that nothing could be done for me as I had already had a partial refund in the past. Excuse me? So now that I have another bad order you decide to completely alienate me from ever using the app again by telling me you won‚Äôt help? And to top it off, you told me to go review the driver as a way of alerting you to my bad experience? So you want the driver to take the blame? 

I am deleting the app, reporting you to BBB, and opening a PayPal dispute since you think you can take my money and not provide me the food I ordered. Never again.

title: this app gets on my nerves
review: this app is crazy with the taxing. for example it says my total is around 15$ and then when I pay it‚Äôs like 23$ dollars. it also charges a delivery fee when I pay monthly for better deals.  makes no sense. not to mention the fact that you can deliver from some places but then when you try to pick up from that place it isn‚Äôt available ( btw picking up is cheaper so ofc they do that üôÑ) but it makes no sense that a driver can pick it up but you can‚Äôt. also I have ordered from a place only to have the driver text me and say it was closed. as well as have a driver pick up my food and never show up, he stayed in a parking lot I could see it on the maps. plus they ALWAYS forget items. recently I ordered subway and got a sandwich drink and cookie, bro forgot the cookie and drink ‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs like the whole order smh ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Bad customer service
review: I ordered from Rad lobster last night right after I ordered I took a shower when I came down stairs to check the status of the order it said I canceled it! First lie! Come to find out that my order had been given to someone else. I said I would like to reorder,but I‚Äôm not paying for it. They said they could not do that . Second lie! The next thing I see is four different orders from four different Rad lobsters. I told them to cancel all orders and they said they will! I woke up this morning and sure enough there is 4 orders on my account! I tried to delete them and I got all but one! When I opened my door to go to work there is a red lobster sitting on my side porch. I‚Äôm assuming it‚Äôs been there all night since y‚Äôall do not daliver at700 in the morning! Y‚Äôall can come pick up this order and trash it, but I‚Äôm not paying for it!

title: Literally the worst customer service ever
review:
They will steal your money amd food. Amd do NOTHING about it

I‚Äôve used this many times before but tonight was the final straw. I was notified My food was delivered. Opened my door and saw it wasn‚Äôt. I tried actually calling the driver first. No response. So I contacted cyst support and they literally told me they couldn‚Äôt do anything about it or even refund me because the driver hit confirmed delivery. So I‚Äôm out $36 including his tip‚Ä¶ and have no food.
That‚Äôs unacceptable. So basically any driver who‚Äôs hungry can say it‚Äôs delivered, take your food, amd there‚Äôs nothing you can do about it. Oh also he still gets paid. The chat person even ended the chat with me and had the nerve to send me a ‚Äúdid we resolve your issue‚Äù message. No! You didn‚Äôt!.
Don‚Äôt use this. Use Lyft. I‚Äôve literally just canceled my Uber and postmates accounts because of this.

title: Customer service is non-existent, use a different food app
review: I don‚Äôt know how Postmates stays in business, never had experiences so bad as using this app. Not only did the delivery person deliver to the wrong address, they left the food outside during heat wave by the parking lot next to the call box and made no attempt to call me. They sent a picture of the food at the wrong call box and by the time my partner and I rushed down 3 floors to get outside I‚Äôm 87 degree heat our food was already gone. Trash company. I reach out to the customer service company to tell them of the situation and they were like sorry there‚Äôs nothing we can do. You just gotta eat the cost. They ‚Äútried to contact you‚Äù like I have call logs, no one called. No reimbursement. Use Grubhub, this company is trash.

title: Use other food apps!
review: I placed an order from a convenience store that was supposed to take 15-30 minutes: an hour later and a dasher had not even arrived at store. Couldn‚Äôt contact support through the app so had to do it online. The agent said they could not do anything as it had not past the latest possible delivery time, which was only 5 minutes away. (And 30 minutes later than the previous delivery time) I then explained it has already been an hour and they said all they could do was reimburse me 20% which was $2.16. Waste of time and energy ordering on this app. I hate writing reviews but that‚Äôs wild. DD is a better app, quicker deliveries, easier to reach support, and seem to actually help resolve your order issues.

title: No English speakers available
review: Don‚Äôt use them for shopping. The drivers can add anything they want that‚Äôs not on your list without asking to keep their tips higher and customer service won‚Äôt do anything. I had a lady add items I didn‚Äôt even order, and they just kept showing me my final receipt I must‚Äôve order it, but can‚Äôt provide my original order. Luckily you change the tip, but I still have to pay for things I didn‚Äôt ask for. You can‚Äôt call, you can only chat with people overseas who don‚Äôt know enough English to understand the issue. They‚Äôre rude and consistently cut the chats prematurely, you have to wait like 30 mins for someone to read what you‚Äôre issue and then just say sorry, you have the best resolution.

title: Unprofessional Customer Service
review: Spoke to an agent about a reorder for an order that was dropped off that the wrong house in the wrong neighborhood. All I asked was for a reorder. The agent gave me a partial refund after a 5 minute hold. I asked how much the refund before and did not answer question. Sent back a message saying that I could re order again online. I assume that is an automatic email response they had. I asked to speak to a supervisor after multiple times asking how much the refund was for and another agent entered the chat and said that a supervisor wouldn‚Äôt be available for 2 hours. Unprofessional behavior and unacceptable. I would have understood if my initial question was answered but the agent was reluctant to even help.

title: This is complicated
review: Is a blind man I really enjoy having the option to have food that I want brought to my home. Unfortunately, not everything on the app is a sasable with the Apple screen raider. Every time asked me to click a button and it does not tell me afterwards whether or not I have her have not clicked it even if I let it play through the entire audio script again. this makes it really complicated when it comes to check boxes in the app. Otherwise I would ready to five star but since assessability is not yet there, I have to be honest and give it a three.

title: Multi stops need to stop
review: It‚Äôs very frustrating that they don‚Äôt reshuffle drivers if an order is taking longer than expected. The driver will often pick up multiple orders before then delivering them to each person. It means that if one order is being, everyone is also delayed. Now instead of having 1 upset person because of the food delay, you now have multiple people upset. The app should reprioritize orders and reassign them. This affects the quality of food which is delivered because of multiple pick ups and multiple deliveries. Ugh.

title: Don‚Äôt Use Trust
review:
(Remember look at the comments not the Stars)
Honestly this app is the worst app to order food from always getting wrong order of foods, and when i try too resolve the issue the workers on the chat are so unprofessional, never want to get a refund when order take 1hr long when they advertised it well only be 20 to 30mins and without warning they well have your order delayed and not tell you , honestly if you feel like you wanna go thru a hassle and a hour wait for food then i wouldn't recommend this app to anyone , and now I understand why they dont refund anymore on order their fault now cause so many screw up with this app now.

title: So many problems!!!

Half the orders they end up canceling because of issues with drivers this has happened THREE separate times.  And the other half of the time the driver assigned seems to quit halfway through the order and then the whole process starts over again, making my food take 30-44 minutes longer.  It‚Äôs ridiculous, I NEVER have these issues with DoorDash. I‚Äôm DONE with Postmates!

title: LOST A CUSTOMER TONIGHT! DONT USE!!!
review: My first order was supposed to be 20 off and they took my promotion from me told me I can‚Äôt use it! THAT IS OUTRAGEOUS!!! Why give someone something and then take it away from them?!?! Now I‚Äôm STUCK with a promotion I can‚Äôt even use!!! HIGHLY UNFAIR HIGHLY UPSET HIGHLY DONT RECOMMEND THIS APP!!! UBER EATS HAS DONE THIS SAME THING TO ME AND I HAVEN'T BEEN APPRAISED FOR IT!!üòï I‚Äôve send OVER HUNDREDS of dollars on Uber eats to be faked out on another app you NO BETTER THAN THEMüòí DONT GIVE SOMEONE SOMETHING AND THEN DONT ALLOW THEM TO USE IT!!!

title: Not quite 5 star

It was all driver related and I could not truly express what the problem was, there was only options to choose from. I will say y‚Äôall were prompt in giving a credit, but I feel like the problems with the driver needed to be noted and addressed which they were not.

title: Just don‚Äôt buy if u want all food
review: I ordered taco bell and got 4 things of nacho cheese and even ordered extra cheese. I got no nachos and just cheese and all the cheese was empty. I have contacted the company and is waiting for them to contact me back but overall this is the first time it‚Äôs happen. Also it said I was getting my order picked up by one guy and then switched to another guy and the guy that delivered the food is a different person. It says to rate the guys delivery but it‚Äôs not the same guy. Do I think he ate it? maybe . The bag wasn‚Äôt open or ripped and it was tape down with the stickers so I don‚Äôt think so but It was just weird.

title: Terrible
review: I thought I‚Äôd have my food for lunch today at work and I get a text saying it arrived. It‚Äôs not at my building where I work at like not even here it‚Äôs at some other building not even close to mine. I even gave her a tip before ordering and I most definitely regret it. And it‚Äôs even more annoying knowing I can‚Äôt get a refund because the driver dropped it off so it would be in my possession but how is it in my possession when it‚Äôs not even at my job someone else has my food right now. I‚Äôm never getting this app or any food delivery app again I‚Äôll do better taking my time to get my own food.

title: Once you know what you like..
review:
It's perfect , how to find what you like? 
The convenient symbol Postmates uses

title: i have never once gotten my order right from postmates
review: and they have a limit to how many refunds you can get (even though it‚Äôs ALWAYS THEIR FAULT), make it impossible to remove tips (although their customer service claims you can), and make it impossible to contact your driver after you contact customer service. deleted the app tonight because i was missing half my $50 order. tipped my terrible driver QUIANLING $8 (she literally called me to come get my order and just left when i told her it was wrong) that i will never get back. wasted lots and lots of money on this app.

title: Not even usable
review: This is the biggest waste of space ever on earth its there for no reason bc u cant even use it they jus dont wanna make money thats why this app is way less known then door dash or uber bc nobody can even use it if they want terrible and disgusting its here jus for people to download so they can make money from the actual download its self they r not a real business like uber or door dash this is no more then an indian scam calling website and they want ur debit card jus like a scammer would im no detective but if i had to say this app and its owners are doing something shady 1000% dont trust them

Don‚Äôt waste your time!

title: This service has PLUMMETED
review: This is about the 10th time I‚Äôve had a delivery driver steal my food and mark it as delivered, but I‚Äôve had enough. I‚Äôve ended my membership. I ordered an entire meal and this driver named MIYRA in Los Gatos marked it as picked up, waited 10 minutes, then marked delivered. When I called support, they said it had been delivered to an address - which was the restaurants. These drivers are scamming the company and customers and the best they can do is offer a refund in 3-5 business days. I‚Äôm so over this, Postmates. Punish your drivers and make them photograph evidence of delivery for once in their lives.

title: Extremely irritating
review: I order food at 1:07 pm. It said it would be here by 1:20. (Starbucks is extremely close to my location). It is now 1:36, my order is ready waiting at Starbucks and there is still not a delivery person assigned to my order. I contacted support and it was not helpful at all, they aren‚Äôt real humans it‚Äôs literally just computers. It now says my order will be delivered by 2:10 latest because it hasn‚Äôt connected me to a driver. I‚Äôve tried contacting support and they r the most unhelpful thing ever. Bye.

title: Beware when ordering in a hotel
review: My driver delivered to the wrong hotel room number even though it was specified in the unit number. She even admitted on call that she delivered to the wrong room. She promised that she would redeliver it at the correct spot but she never did. I contacted Postmates over this but they said that a refund is not possible because she went to the ‚Äúcorrect‚Äù address even though it was in the WRONG unit number. I‚Äôve been a customer for YEARS under the Unlimited plan but clearly Postmates doesn‚Äôt care for their customers. Never again, switching to Grubhub.

title: Sierra-no show-canceled order
review: I ordered my pizza. Took screen shots of the order, with details of what is on pizza. This Sierra girl sends a message to me asking what is on my pizza, when it‚Äôs clearly in the description. I‚Äôm watching the click tick down. I‚Äôm watching her read the messages! Never responds back after asking me that one question. And I never here from her. Hour later I call the number on her profile as it says my order is still in transit, a man answers and tells me my order was canceled. What? My husband told me not to use Postmates! Will never use again

title: Worst service.
review: I will no longer be using Postmates, and I highly recommend that others do the same. The past month, I have had a problem with nearly every single order I have received, whether it be arriving an hour late, receiving less than half of my order, or the order being completely cold by the time it arrives. This is a continuous issue, and is clearly a waste of both your time and your money (and that‚Äôs not even going into the ridiculous upcharges and ‚Äúservice fees‚Äù that add up to ten dollars on your order).

title: Feel like a secretary sometimes
review: I leave the app open for the duration of the delivery and it never fails that the driver tries to call and the app leaves me completely in the dark about it. Also, if the driver is going to call me every time then why don‚Äôt I just place the order with the driver directly and cut out the app?

title: Postmates is consistently terrible
review: Every time I come back to postmates because they offer a discount, I regret it. My orders are always late because drivers take multiple orders and deliver to areas very far away from my delivery address. But, you don‚Äôt know this until after placing your order. I placed an order from a restaurant 20 minutes away. It‚Äôs been 1.5 hours since I placed the order and I have yet to receive it. Food is consistently cold because of the significant delays in deliveries. This is the last time I will ever use their service.

title: THE ABSOLUTE WORST. RUN AWAY.
review:
Oh, yeah. Shouty caps bad. 

Back when Postmates was Postmates and not Uber Eats masquerading as Postmates, it was great. Ever since it changed hands it‚Äôs been a nightmare. 

The communication is basically zero. I waited for hours thinking my order was still coming. Only to find out (after climbing through a labyrinth on their app) there‚Äôs no one around to deliver it. 

How about just say so? Just friggin tell me that when I place the order, so my kids and I aren‚Äôt waiting for breakfasts that just aren‚Äôt coming. I‚Äôm wheelchair-bound and can‚Äôt just get up and go fetch food on the fly. It would be nice to be informed. 

But cha won‚Äôt. These folks don‚Äôt believe in going, ‚ÄúHey there! Your food can‚Äôt be delivered. There‚Äôs just no one around to go get your order. Sorry. ü§∑üèº‚Äù 

Maybe try Doordash. Or opt for calling the restaurant directly. Just stay away from the Uber‚Äôs attempt at food delivery.

title: the worst company i have ever interacted with.
review:
this happened 2 years ago and i‚Äôm still reeling from how unprofessional, greedy, and inefficient this company is. 
not only had I ordered an item from them and not received it, but they charged me TWICE for the unreceived item. i contacted customer experience immediately, and it wasn‚Äôt resolved for FOUR MONTHS. i didn‚Äôt need the money so much as i wanted to make sure postmates didn‚Äôt have it. i haven‚Äôt used a food delivery app since, and especially caution my friends and family against postmates specifically.

title: You have more options than other delivery apps

I'll continue ordering food but I Def won't use postmates / Uber eats ever again.

title: Bad company practice.
review:
Fist of all bought out by Uber awhile ago so already a negative but that‚Äôs not why.  If you are a regular on the app orders will get canceled for no reason, or they won‚Äôt follow instructions and still refuse to issue a refund on the food. 

Here is what killed it for me, I spent $65 on an order that the food came rotten the instructions where not followed and when reached out to customer support the exact word said.  ‚ÄúSorry but do to the fact you reached out regarding this order already I won‚Äôt help you‚Äù.     I will be reaching out to the BBB.

Somehow the multiple ‚Äúservice fees‚Äù totaling as much as $10-$15 never makes its way to the drivers. Postmate‚Äôs ‚Äúgreeded‚Äù themselves out of a repeat customer.

Smh

title: Very Convenient

title: My go to

title: If your a thief or a moron, Postmates will hire you

If you feel like keeping the goods of others and don‚Äôt care if waiting with a torn ACL and are dependent on delivery for survival, Postmates. Don‚Äôt worry about reprisal. title: Terrible customer service

title: If it‚Äôs a last resort post mates
review:

Same issue

title: Awful
review:

title: Thank youuuu PostMates

title: Done with all delivery services for food.
review: Done using delivery services. I am not because of you but because the restaurants that i order from simply can never get the orders right. So i am paying you to deliver wrong orders. title: Postmates if fine, but it‚Äôs not this
review: My main issue is without fail- Uber eats, door dash, and other all fail to find me every time. Only Postmates people do. It‚Äôs the apps fault as far as I can tell. They deny it, but it‚Äôs beyond coincidence by now. Their gps is just not good. So when I want Postmates half the time they will joint venture with another service. And it‚Äôs a nightmare. Awful

title: The costumer service is non existent

I tried emailing, texting, calling and chatting through the app to fix this error and get a refund on my food that I never received, and after an hour I still have not been refunded. title: Horrible

title: Awesomeness
review: To bad delivery services wasn‚Äôt around a long time ago, it‚Äôs just not for Pizza! Gives people jobs and the one‚Äôs that don‚Äôt want to go out and get the food the opportunity to order whatever they crave!!!

title: Terrible customer support
review: Their no ability to call which only leave text support. Every message took 10 to 15 minutes. It took so long to get a response from someone the app kept thinking I was afk and was asking was I still there while waiting for the other person to respond. It took an hour of ‚Äújust give me a few minutes‚Äù to be told what a policy is. Literally the worst delivery app I‚Äôve ever used.

title: Postmates!
review: I order from here and uber eats all the time, they are the best and always consider you and your time. they are always there if you need help and they give you lots of coupons

title: Terrible service, unable to locate a driver

I would urge you to use other food delivery apps. Postmates will charge you for undelivered orders simple because they could not provide the service they pride themselves on: delivery food. You cannot receive a refund for a canceled order because they took too long to TRY and locate a driver.
I will reiterate, USE A COMPETITOR to deliver you food in a safe and timely manner!
Location: major metropolitan city in the southwest.

title: Last option for food delivery
review: Postmates definitely has cheaper prices when it comes to other apps such as UberEats or DoorDash, but the quality of the service is horrendous. If you don‚Äôt pay your drivers a big enough tip, they‚Äôll take FOREVER to deliver your food! I can‚Äôt tell you the amount of times I just cancelled my order because it was infuriating waiting for food that would seemingly never come‚Ä¶

title: Excellent Delivery Service

title: use at your own risk
review: this app is only slightly better than doordash, but barely, i've had multiple orders either incorrect or missing items and have been refused refund's multiple times as well, there's also a new feature that you have to pay extra if you want your food to still be hot when it gets there, the drivers are rude and refuse to follow simple instructions, i've had drivers literally make me walk up to their window and they passed me the food from their car, i work in customer service too and sure i hate it but i still do my job, i thought the drivers would do the same ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Liking this

title: Cancel

For the next 2 hours while I'm sitting there starving it kept going up and up until it reached 10:00. Then the order just cancels and I waisted three hours for nothing. All they give is a crummy refund. This has happened many times before. I‚Äôm deleting the app.

review:

You can order and have food arrive an hour late as is my current experience right now as I write this app. 

Uninstalling after tonight. Will take my business elsewhere.

review: Despite my frequent use the Uber GPS still directs them wrongly.  I pretty much have to tell every driver not to go into the next-door seminary. Other than that I found the Postmates is pretty reliable. Much more reliable than DoorDash.

title: Fastest and most efficient delivery service
review: If you hate having your deliveries given to the wrong address. This company is the most efficient and I would say has the fewest mistakes or missed dinners.

title: Priority delivery fee is a scam
review:
We ordered from two different accounts (at the same time) the exact same order to be delivered to two nearby addresses (next door to each other).  Ran this experiment 5 times.  ‚ÄúPriority delivery‚Äù order arrived later 3 times and at the same time as the normal order 2 times‚Ä¶ 
P.S. always add 30 minutes to the estimated delivery time, and sometimes add an hour‚Ä¶. They are ALWAYS very, very, very late.

title: The driver contact is horrible
review: I did not receive my order even though the app said I did. And when I tried to contact the driver serval times I was unable to. When I reported that I had a problem I was told by a representative that I should try to contact the driver even though I already tried that. I was not given any compensation or anything, I still lost my money and got no food. This app is Garbage.

title: The worst app ever.
review: I ordered food for my sick 2 year old daughter and they took my money but didn‚Äôt send out food and when I called them about it they said I didn‚Äôt have an order on file. I talked to 5 different people and 3 of the 5 told me totally different things. Now im stuck with no money and a sick, hungry baby. This app is by far the worst food delivery app EVER. Do not order from them. I could literally cry right now.

title: delivery‚Äôs
review: i only don‚Äôt like 1 thing about postmates is that they give the drivers so many other deliveries before mine. I had to wait 1 hr 30 mins before receiving my order just because the delivery driver had like 5 other orders. Like how does that leave your food fresh when y‚Äôall are giving the drivers many many other orders.

title: bad delivery drivers in AZ
review: the past few times I‚Äôve ordered food they always arrive at the destination but then cancel the order and they take the food, and then when I try to message the delivery driver back they close out the message. I order my food at work and I tell them what kind of vehicle I drive, but they either put it on the wrong vehicle or cancel the order, bad service, bad drivers.

title: A Little Expensive
review: But worth it.  It‚Äôs been easier to order from Postmates, and we personally like Uber.  The competition may be cheaper, but Postmates makes it happen with ease.  Rock on with your bad selves, Postmates!

title: Review
review: I think there could be more strict rules that need to be followed to ensure the correct order is being sent out, the food modification options are being followed and communication about such is happening so people can choose to cancel if they don‚Äôt fulfill the order

title: Update not going to happen
review: I went to use it and it says I need to update to use so I hit update and it comes back I need a 14.8 or higher version of iOS. I have an iPhone 8 if it won‚Äôt work on version 14.2 I think Postmates has a big problem. My phone doesn‚Äôt have the bells and whistles to need a 14.8 version so I guess you don‚Äôt want to do business with me. Fix it to handle 14.2 again and I can use it.

title: Two canceled orders
review: I ordered from a local franchise and a half hour my order was canceled . I don‚Äôt know why. I placed the same order at a different location of the franchise, and close to a half hour later it was canceled too! I just placed the same order at a different location, same franchise. Waiting to see if it works.

title: Great app except time thing
review: Seth is great, and works very reliably now. But it is annoying how much they always make you rate the restaurant or you‚Äôve ordered from multiple times. And they also sent so many pop-ups that are not relevant to a purchase. It‚Äôs very annoying

title: Horrible
review:
I‚Äôm SHOCKED people still use postmates. The ‚Äúother fees‚Äù total at least $10 per order. You can just use a different app and not have to pay those.

You also wait crazy long times for the delivery person to even be assigned so by the time your food arrives it‚Äôs cold and gross.

Their customer service is HORRIBLE. They refuse to fix issues that is their fault (like assigning a delivery person and thus the food being spoiled by the time it arrives).

If you try to cancel an order that‚Äôs over an hour late, they still charge you $20 for the order!! 

Postmates is trash. Stop paying all these crazy fees to keep them afloat so they can steal your money.

title: Deliveries while staying in Nashville
review:
The first delivery the driver did not knock on the door and we had no idea our order had arrived. Cold coffee.
The second order time or order was cancelled because the store was apparently out of something included in our order.

title: App malfunctioned and ROBBED of over 70 dollars
review: Tried to Order pizza. The app became stuck on send for over 30 minutes. We had no choice but to cancel. We then called support and we‚Äôre RUDELY hung up on. Wouldn‚Äôt even offer to give us food or credit for the money we paid. We want our money refunded. It‚Äôs not our fault your app malfunctioned. We will be reporting you to the better business bureau.

title: Absolutely Terrible every time
review: I‚Äôve ordered a few times and each time the driver either took the food, took something from my order, or left it at an entirely different house.  When I try to contact customer support, it goes through a 3rd party that just hangs up on you. Absolutely unacceptable and highly unprofessional people work for this app. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!

title: Options
review: Love how many more options you can choose from than other restaurant take out/food apps.

title: I love it
review: If it wasn‚Äôt for Postmates deals I would be so lost they have delivery specials that no man can‚Äôt turn down 25$ off types of specials and even better ones

title: delivered but not received
review: I barely use postmates because I always have complications. I decided to use it today because I had a coupon but it said my food was delivered, but I never got it. I live at a university and wrote specific instructions to hand it to me. Either the driver gave it to someone else and didn‚Äôt confirm, or kept it for himself. Such an unorganized app with horrible deliverers.

title: The food delivery person will screw up your instructions guaranteed
review: They don‚Äôt care what you tell them as far as instructions and the customer service also doesn‚Äôt care. Have had multiple meals ruined because everyone associated with this app just seem to have a DMV level of apathy and disdain for their customers. Just a trash app. Do yourself a favor and use DoorDash.

title: Better options
review:
Better options for order on Postmates compared to Uber eats.

Wished I could change bread type for Hawkins Burgers :/

title: Bad payment options
review: I think it‚Äôs stupid you can only use Apple Pay, Venmo, or PayPal to pay for your order. What happened to just putting your debit in. No one used Venmo, rarely does anyone use Apple Pay. I never used this app and I never plan on it now. Ig I‚Äôll go to grub hub or another competitor who allows ppl to use their debit card. I mean that‚Äôs what‚Äôs it for isn‚Äôt it? Very disappointed

title: Terrible customer service
review: I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs the drivers in my area where the restaurants but I always seem to have an issue with my orders that I recently ordered two times in one day the first time my order was missing part of it and later on my driver never brought my order and they got canceled I will still charge for it I am upset

title: Did NOT deliver full order, charged full price
review: Ordered from red lobster and didn‚Äôt receive a third of what we ordered. I messaged Postmates and was told they can‚Äôt refund any part of the order to please leave a review. Basically beware, you may get what you ordered or you may not, but you‚Äôll be paying for it either way. I‚Äôve never had that problem with DoorDash.

title: On point
review: Pricing always competitive and customer service always on point

title: Awesome
review: I don‚Äôt know why everyone‚Äôs complaining in their reviews. I‚Äôve never had a bad experience with postmates and I use it literally everyday.

title: Worst Experiences Ever
review: Could not think of a sadder excuse for a food delivery app. The customer service doesnt answer texts and barely answered the phone calls. They overcharged for several items multiple times and refused to fix the issue. This company clearly only cares about money and not its customers so its a horrible one and deserves to be put out of business.

title: Discounts only for groups
review: Every discount offer I look at has a minimum dollar amount that is for several people. A single person wouldn‚Äôt be ordering enough food to meet the minimum. What gives?

title: Solid
review: Always reliable, will reimburse you if they mess up, and they usually have some kind of deals.

title: Item out of stock and I can‚Äôt get a refund?
review: Starbucks was out of the drink I ordered.  No one told me until the order was being picked up so I had no chance to ask for a replacement or cancel my order.  Now I am being charged for a Strawberry Acai Refresher that I never received and I can‚Äôt get a hold of anyone at Postmates to refund me for the missing item.

title: On Top of It
review: Although the restaurants in the area have troubles from time to time, the PostMates Customer Service is puntual and quick to help.

title: Next bubble to burst
review: Service is complete trash, worse daily.  I have to get refunded majority of my orders and just go without or get in my car and go pick up after wasting time with completely false delivery windows or drivers who completely ignore addresses.  No convenience with any of it, so the app and service are worthless.

title: Doordash is better
review: I ordered Jack in the box and had a delivery driver named Meredith. She did not deliver my food and marked it as delivered so I contacted customer service and they did not give me a refund. They just apologized and she left with my money and my food and they did not do anything to help me. Never using postmates again. Doordash is cheaper when ordering Jack in the box anyways.

title: Merchants: Try Harder
review: So many messed up menus, either they should hire someone who knows how to make it correctly or Uber should help and regulate. I know it isn‚Äôt technically their fault but it‚Äôs their platform.

title: Used to love this service!!
review: Giving one star because doordash has been my go to for a few years now, and when we have issues with the food they were really good at fixing the issue. I don‚Äôt blame them for the crappy food that these restaurants are serving but I do expect them to at least fix the problem when there is one. Last night I got a complete wrong order, showed the receipt in the messages so that we could at the very least get the food replaced. Didn‚Äôt open it, even offered to give it back. Or have a credit or refund. They chose to say we had did this before and there was nothing they could do. Which is ridiculous cause we have only complained one other time about this restaurant. A year ago, at that!! But also who doesn‚Äôt complain when the order is completely wrong or missing items, which has been very often lately which is why we started to use it less. And then when I think just maybe, just maybe my order will be correct, this happens. Do we just accept it even though we spent our money on it?!?!? Like I‚Äôm sorry but that‚Äôs not something I‚Äôm doing. I would rather have the food replaced than to receive the money but apparently they don‚Äôt like doing that either. So my family, friends and I have chosen to delete out accounts and go with another service. You should be ashamed of yourselves. Even tried speaking with a supervisor but still the same results. Be cautious using this app because they don‚Äôt like to do what‚Äôs right!!! Very disappointing DOORDASH! Do better!!

title: Beware of driver name OTM
review: Person never dropped off food and toke a black photo. Never answered me either.
