They are very lazy and most are too illiterate to follow simple directions such as HAND IT TO ME! Dashers will pick up the call but not the order. I‚Äôve had dashers literally sitting in the parking lot high off drugs while I‚Äôm waiting on my order to be delivered. Called the merchant only for them to say they have completed my order 45 minutes ago. Gets up and go to the place and the dasher is over dosing in the parking lot from some type of drug with my food in the car. These people hire anybody but refused to hire me. Tuh!

title: Laggy and buggy
review: Grocery stores are bugged. I can only order from food places with small menus but with places that have a large menu/more items to load the app crashes and gets stuck on the loading animation and eventually freezes(animation and no touch control) Restarting, redownloading, different devices(I‚Äôve tried 3 apple devices) or different profiles do not fix this issue. As an app developer I know these things can happen and hope this review gets seen and fixed because this error makes me use Uber eats instead when I originally just use door dash, y‚Äôall are losing my service so please fix this! I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs not just me as my gf has the same issue and she completely deleted the app and exclusively uses Uber eats now

title: Very reoccurring customer
review: Time and time again I order something from my town, and time and time again I don‚Äôt receive my full order. I process through the ‚Äúhelp‚Äù tab, I do not want a refund I want the food I ordered for my wife. Consistently we have one of our meals left at the resturant even though we ordered two. The only solution offered by the horrible support service is a refund for your food. Not for the tip, not for the delivery fee, just the food. So if I actually want my order I have to go back and spend even MORE on those things when it wasn‚Äôt right the first time. Let me be clear when I say this has happened CONSOSTENTLY. It‚Äôs one thing if things are forgotten, but to pay MORE to have what was forgotten re-delivered? Horrible service.

title: Do not use this crap
review:
At least half of the dashers will be people too incompetent to get hired at any job. You‚Äôll buy an $8 meal but after Doordash fees and tip it‚Äôll be $22. Oh, but you can spend $12 a month to get rid of scummy fees, but only if what you order is over $10 in food ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è you‚Äôre better off spending that money on gas and going to get your food yourself. 
I ordered a burger for me and nuggets with fries for my girlfriend, we received only the fries. Doordash at least let‚Äôs you refund if there‚Äôs a problem‚Ä¶ only one item though ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è 

Go get your food yourself. Do not overpay to have some disgusting unsanitary random stranger to handle your food. I have had instances where the seal was broken and we suddenly have 6 fries total. Doordash will let LITERALLY anyone deliver. It‚Äôs easier to become a driver than it is to buy a gun in Texas.

title: Does Not Handle Archiving of Old Orders Gracefully
review: Functionally a fine app. But note to Devs: when you go to pull up an old order that is VERY old and thus probably not archived anymore, it fails in an ugly way. For example, rather than showing a page saying that there was an error, it shows a white screen with something that someone on the backend would want to see (‚Äúsomething goes wrong to fetch order with detail,‚Ä¶‚Äù). The message changes depending on the order, but if you click the same order over and over the message that is shown stays the same. Maybe something to fix for the next version?

title: Love this technology
review:
As much I‚Äôm not a fan of new technologies today but in all due reality this has been amazing just like Uber eats. But DoorDash has been allot easier to use other than Uber eats. Especially for people like me who gets tired coming home from work cause I work graveyards and I do get tired to go anywhere‚Ä¶. I give thanks to the people who is willing to deliver food and other convenience stuff.. and also along with Uber I am thankful for that technology as well to give people rides and from where ever they needed to be‚Ä¶ I am grateful for both feature.. 

God bless you all üôèüèΩüôÇ

title: Marked up and always late
review: The food is excellent and delivered fast *for a large fee*. They will send your favorite foods to your house *at their own prices*. Their prices are higher than the restaurants, but if you sign up for their promotion then you can have it delivered for FREE *kinda* don‚Äôt forget the extra driver charge, and don‚Äôt forget to add the express option to insure your driver doesn‚Äôt take your food on a wild 30 minute ride. Oh yea and if your order gets messed up they‚Äôll totally reimburse you!* but not really* did your 15 waffle not come with everything like utensils butter or syrup, that‚Äôs okay they‚Äôll give you a 1.10 credit towards your next rip off session. Did you accidentally order your food to a different state, don‚Äôt worry they‚Äôll warn you that it seems like you‚Äôre far away. *sometimes*

title: Why Does DD Charge More Than the Restaurant for Food??
review: This app works great but over the past couple of months, I‚Äôve noticed that everything is more expensive than the actual restaurants charge ‚Äî I‚Äôll literally go on the restaurant‚Äôs website and see their cost for the item.. and then on Door Dash, it‚Äôs anywhere between $3-$6 more‚Ä¶ per item!! That‚Äôs ridiculous. Between all of the extra fees and increase on food items, it‚Äôs cheaper for me to just use gas and pick up directly from the restaurant instead of going through DD. At least the restaurant won‚Äôt charge the extra fees (and I‚Äôm a Dash Pass member too..). Is DD pocketing the difference between what the restaurant charges and what‚Äôs on the app??

title: Such horrible customer service
review: I scheduled ahead of time a delivery of pizzas for a party we had planned and after the time the pizza should have arrived I received a call from door dash customer service telling me that my order would need to be canceled because it couldn't be fullfilled but I could try reordering the same order again (which wouldve taken up to 2 hours to fulfill). The customer service person actually hung up on me when I inquired why I would reorder with no garuntee that it'd be fulfilled. I have never left a bad review before but this isn't the first problem I've encountered with door dash nor the first time I've been hung up on by them. I will not be renewing my membership and I suggest you look at other options for your food delivery service. This company is horrible.

title: I deleted for the lack of integrity
review: So, I have been using this app for a year. I have been having a problem to get my order as the dasher in my area keep not delivering my order and it takes three days to get my refund. There is no way to contact your dasher as from one call to the customer service they stated that the number in the app is not related to dasher but to the assistant or something like that. It‚Äôs just very easy for the dasher to submit that the order was dropped off, but there is no integrity check even though ‚Äútechnology now can detect food package using AI and machine learning‚Äù. However, it was easy to request a refund, but how could they refund the wasted time? So I decided to eat healthy and not waste time. Also I am a student, so getting my refund in three days is a big deal to me.

title: 100 orders
review:
Probably done 100 orders on door dash, Been getting meals 30 min delays. Not the drivers fault. The calculations are way off. It‚Äôs getting annoying.

Started ordering from this Taco Bell that constantly messed up my orders. First 3 times DD refunded my money instantly, it was away s 2 small items. Then one day they said no more refunds. Got on with help center. They refused to help. Kept sending robot responses. I said cool you are just doing your job, please send confirmation you have sent this issue further up the chain, I even have video proof of me opening the food bags. No confirmation email. No reply to me requesting that I wanted a confirmation email. They would close the chat, i would re open it and they kept shutting down the chat. I would expect this of a scam caller, but not a big corporation. Very garbage.

title: Pay your Dashers so I don‚Äôt have to
review:
It‚Äôs painfully obvious that you don‚Äôt pay your Dashers as you should. Tipping them as much as I am, I feel like I am footing the paycheck. You shouldn‚Äôt suggest as much as you do, and I shouldn‚Äôt have to tip like I do. 

Also. At least give me the opportunity to give a tip AFTER I receive the meal. Why would I tip without knowing what the service quality is. It doesn‚Äôt make any sense. Half the time there is an issue with the order of delivery time is wrong. And I‚Äôm not new here. I‚Äôve spent a good portion of my income receiving food. 

I still love the service option, but you need to adjust the cost, because I can compare to other services that clearly don‚Äôt try and make me feel bad about offering a tip I can afford. And a tip is for extra, not for the expected service.

title: Good but pricy
review:
The app is pretty good, great even at times, but it‚Äôs getting ridiculous with the delivery fees. Before it was just $5 for the extra fees on your meal but now it can range anywhere from $10 to $15 bucks with every order. The delivery drivers are great but if you at least want to give them a tip of $5, it‚Äôs nearly $15 to $20 on top of your order that‚Äôs already expensive depending on how much you‚Äôre ordering and I usually go for the cheap stuff

Imagine ordering from McDonald‚Äôs for a $6 meal and end up spending $20 to $25 bucks just for one person. It can definitely be pricy if you‚Äôre trying to budget and have no car to do pickups. The app is great but it definitely needs work

title: There‚Äôs a chance that someone can just take your food and money
review: I‚Äôve been using Doordash for a few months and it‚Äôs been great. This is the first time something bad had happened and it‚Äôs made me nervous that stuff like this can happen more often so I‚Äôm taking a break from this app for now. A person named Amy was supposed to give me my food that I payed $21 for and she ended up taking it. She never moved from her spot on the map, wouldn‚Äôt answer my texts, and when I tried to call her it said that her phone is not in service anymore. There was nothing else I can do besides canceling it after waiting an hour and getting $20 worth of credits for a next order on the app.

title: Do you want to pay a premium for the wrong food 50% of the time?!
review:
Then this is the app for you! Did you order some nice soup and an iced coffee for lunch? Well, you‚Äôll probably receive a pizza and a small order of rice. Did you order a late night pretzel and some coffee to get some work done? Well, congratulations on your new Q-Tips and deodorant. Be prepared for missing items as well (like the quesadilla that was conveniently missing from my last order).

In all seriousness, there‚Äôs probably a 50% chance you‚Äôre going to get the right items and you‚Äôre going to pay a premium on them. Anyone can be a Doordasher, and without serious oversight and punishment for dashers nothing will ever change.

Use at your own risk or use if you want to get some random food or pharmacy items! Random is fun sometimes.

title: Don‚Äôt use Door Dash food won‚Äôt come
review: Don‚Äôt waste your time! I live in an apartment the driver got lost. She then proceeded to tell me I had to speak Spanish. I cannot speak Spanish beautiful language but I can‚Äôt speak it. So to be told she can‚Äôt bring my food because I can‚Äôt direct her in Spanish to my house is absolutely ridiculous! Door Dash doesn‚Äôt do anything to make it right. Didn‚Äôt give me credit after they said they would. So I had no dinner and my food never came. They lied and said they were going to escalate the issue and see me an email. Both of those things were a lie. Go to another company I have had the delivery people drop my food at the wrong house, not speak English, scream at me, make me meet them in my development to pick food up, steal my food. Go with a better company this one is a scam.

title: Pretty sure the driver stole our lunch!
review:
My brother paid $30 for our lunch and accidentally tipped $10, but was fine with it because he wanted the person to have a nice tip. We waited over an hour for him to get a notification that the food was here. It‚Äôs not. The food is nowhere in sight and the picture the driver took is of a house down the street. The picture doesn‚Äôt even show the food, it‚Äôs just a photo of the neighbors house taken from the driver‚Äôs car. He asked the neighbor and no one dropped any food off there. When he tried to reach out to customer service, the agent ended the chat out of nowhere while he was trying to type his response. 

I‚Äôve driven for DoorDash before and if I got a $10 tip, I would do everything in my power to make sure that customer received good service.

title: Why does it refresh??
review: I love Door Dash. I really do. But when you click on a restaurant to look at their offerings, and then go back to the main list, ultimately the whole app refreshes and brings you to the top of the page. It‚Äôs ***incredibly*** frustrating to then have to scroll back down to where you were. Often times, after this happening a couple times, I switch to UberEats and buy through them. I get that maybe a restaurant or two has gone offline in that time and they‚Äôre reflecting that change, but why not just keep those restaurants on the page and reflect that they‚Äôre closed until the user refreshes the page.

title: No
review: This has got to be one of the worst and most pathetic app I‚Äôve used! First off why have 50% discounts and not even take out 50% off your total order?! Secondly why have an app as a food delivery service when yah look severely understaffed I ordered sum not too long ago and by the time my food got there it was basically frozen solid!!! And yah really gone mean to tell me that every time I order I‚Äôm gonna have cold food cause yah struggling to look for dashers when I‚Äôm in the city as well like c‚Äômon now it‚Äôs really pathetic on yah end for real like don‚Äôt have a service like this if yah gonna keep delaying my order cause yah need to look for people to deliver only to have me wait more than 2 hrs just to have someone deliver a simple order PLEASE DON‚ÄôT EVER ORDER USING THIS SERVICE EVER AGAIN!!! That‚Äôs why Uber eats is superior I swear bro üòí

title: Good luck
review: If you dasher spills your drink good luck getting a replacement. The driver was amazing and super nice, accidents happen. However I still wanted my drink and since I paid for it I just wanted to get it redelivered. They refused and told me they would give me the cost of the drink to reorder. What about the tax I‚Äôll have to pay? The delivery fee I‚Äôll pay because I don‚Äôt meet the $12 minimum? What about the tip for the driver? ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not necessary for you to tip on the orders‚Äù ‚Ä¶ excuse me? People do this for a living‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm going to tip for someone taking time out of their day and using their gas to come and bring me a drink when I can‚Äôt physically get around well or I‚Äôm very sick. Do better door dash. My subscription is canceled and I won‚Äôt be using for a very long time.

title: Best review( real n***a answer)
review: If you want real advice take it right here it‚Äôs waaaay better if you go by yourself grab your food and take it home then using this app but if you can‚Äôt go grab the food yourself use this I only rated it one star because of the tax that‚Äôs thrown on here for no reason I can‚Äôt even tip the DoorDash driver bc 10 dollars gets added on every meal you order to sum up the story / if you absolutely can‚Äôt get the food yourself use this app but if you can then absolutely do NOT use this app you‚Äôll waste waay more money on tax than gas using this. This app can also just help you find other places to eat and what the menus and prices will be I keep it on my phone just in case I‚Äôm ever in a situation where I have into use it but I barley ever use this app because of the money tax

title: Spectacularly Bad
review: Between the up charges, the dashers who will drop your food off at the wrong house or at the driveway and not the front door and the customer service that goes through an entire script before you can get a refund for a delivery never showing up, I can‚Äôt recommend this for anyone. Plus we need to get back to a lifestyle of picking up our own food rather than paying 40% more after charges and tips to have it brought to us. On the flip side, having driven for DoorDash and Postmates in 2020 when my job was on hiatus, I can heartily encourage you to support Postmates if you must order delivery. Their drivers are treated much better and have better earning potential‚Ä¶ and it shows cause I‚Äôve never had a problem with a Postmates driver dropping food off at the door.

title: What a joke
review: After waiting two hours for my order I called support to get assistance and told them that my order had first and canceled for no reason and that when I called the restaurant to come pick it up myself they informed me that they had assigned a new driver to my new order. my driver was not the issue it was the app canceling the order without a reason and when I informed customer service of this they informed me that they can offer me a five dollar credit for my $43 order that is now pending on my account two different times because I had to redo the order. so two hour wait for an order that was supposed to arrive within 30 minutes and almost $90 taken out of my account until the first refund goes through, and they offer me five dollars‚Ä¶

title: New Changes
review: Disappointed in the new changes to their delivery system. I used to be able to rely on a timely delivery and the food was always warm and fresh. Recently, Doordash has updated how they do deliveries and they will have a dasher do multiple stops and don‚Äôt come  straight to me. Now, instead of the estimated 20-30 minute delivery, I will about 1 hour before I get my food. It‚Äôs very frustrating because my food is cold/soggy. Unless I add the extra fee to have it come straight to me, I have to wait for low quality food that I could‚Äôve gotten myself in a shorter time. As a loyal customer for 4 years, I‚Äôm very disappointed in the new way they are running their business and will no longer be using their app.

title: Better packaging for orders NEEDED
review: Companies that partner with door dash should do better about providing quality and acceptable packaging for delivery orders to ensure the customer‚Äôs food isn‚Äôt tampered with. Door dash should include this in their policies if company‚Äôs wish to partner with doordash to extend their services through delivery. Some places use brown packaging bags that are sealed with a sticker and stapled to ensure the food is not tampered with yet some places only place the food within a plastic bag with no stability and double tie the bag as if the dasher cannot untie the knot and tamper with the contents. This should be heavily considered by the higher ups at door dash more so from a public health and safety standpoint to ensure more quality services is being provided for users of their services.

title: Food Delivery app
review:
Of all the food delivery services door dash is truthfully the best one you can get. It has the best stores, the best customer service, and it does grocery items. Even the paid pass is worth it, especially if you order from the grocery a lot.   There is not a better option than door dash. It‚Äôs the Swiss Army knife of these apps. Easy to use and decent prices. 

Came back to update my review, I‚Äôm continuing to love the app!!! It is truely the best food delivery service you can get. 10/10 this app gets it right. I can‚Äôt recommend it enough

title: Not Worth It
review: I used DoorDash all the time and had no problems until recently. I even purchased the DashPass at one point since I used it so frequently. However, recent their app has had nothing but issues. It crashes all the time, it always reloads and says it‚Äôs too busy, and I am frequently left with incorrect orders or missing items. The most ridiculous part of all is the prices and fees. It‚Äôs just not worth it for the poor service. If you are left without your dinner like I was last weekend, (because it wasn‚Äôt delivered with the rest of my food) all you can get is a refund. Then they charge you the same fees again to have it delivered. Between the poor app performance and the lack of customer care, I will be taking my business elsewhere.

title: Paying for Instant delivery is a scam!!
review: As a longtime DoorDash user, it‚Äôs absolutely appalling for the company to constantly raise rates on delivery service by introducing things such as Instant delivery. This capitalistic mindset from the business is creating an unstable experience for customers Who wants to use the service at an affordable price. Most people who use the regular service are paying up to $10+ in fees and tips which was not the case a few months ago. While using the ‚Äúnew standard service‚Äù, my food is arriving much later and colder than usually. As a consumer, it‚Äôs starting to be apparent that I‚Äôm better off buying my items at the location instead of using DoorDash. Or just use a different service all together.

title: Not getting my food 2 times in a row
review: Door dash was very reliable at first but for the last couple orders it‚Äôs been awful. My first order was for a wing place and I typed my order in and made sure everything was right opened it to check 99% of my food I had on there was gone and it was already here before I found out so at delivery I got one thing I order potato wedges and nothing else. Then again today I received the wrong order again. Something is going on I didn‚Äôt even receive what was on my receipt, was some other persons food. Yes Ik sounds bad ordering it like that but I‚Äôm 17 and not allowed to really cook a lot of things and my moms out of town on a weekend vacation. It‚Äôs very unbecoming bc every experience before was absolutely wonderful whys it going bad now.

title: I love DoorDash! But‚Ä¶.
review: I love DoorDash because it has all of my family‚Äôs favorite food. It is so easy to place your order and go. But, there are 2 problems about DoorDash. Number one is that it takes 40-50 minutes to get to you. Usually it‚Äôs in the forty‚Äôs, but sometimes it takes longer. Number two is that sometimes they mix the orders or something is missing from the meal. Also, if you/we get someone‚Äôs else‚Äôs order, what if we are allergic to their food, or their allergic to our food. That might be a problem. But, other than that, I love DoorDash and I would recommend getting DoorDash. üòÅ

title: Liars. They‚Äôll Steal Your Money
review: I ordered food tonight and it wasn‚Äôt delivered to the correct address. Not only did the customer service reps deny that my order wasn‚Äôt received, but they literally went in and CHANGED my address to coincide with their story being that I had given the wrong address. That wasn‚Äôt true because I ordered the same meal the day before to the correct address and pressed ‚Äúreorder‚Äù and confirmed my meal without making any changes. Then, they ended the conversation when I was trying to speak with a supervisor. This company is deceitful. I was a loyal customer for a long time and deleted my account tonight because they not only lied, but also refused to refund me my money after I didn‚Äôt receive my order. Terrible customer service - the worst of them all.

title: Fantastic App, however strange extra charges
review:
When you order delivery, they tack on ‚Äúfees and taxes‚Äù onto your order. You would imagine this would include the taxes on your food, however, everything on the menu is also raised a few dollars for some apparent reason. The food and service is great, there are discounts, promo codes, and such. But I don‚Äôt want to pay 30 dollars for 4 chicken sandwiches from Popeyes. I might as well get chick fil-a at that point. 

Otherwise, fantastic app, reaches out to multiple restaurants that are difficult to get too, as well as offering a premium that reduces your taxes.

title: Don‚Äôt use DoorDash
review: I ordered food then double dashed a bag a chips from another store. Instead of them having one dasher do the delivery they had two different dashers. But the first dasher received both orders and when he went to get the chips my order for him disappeared because they sent the second dasher for the chips. I spoke with the first dasher and he said he spoke with DoorDash and they told him he canceled the order himself which he didn‚Äôt they sent a second dasher and just lied to him. Not to mention the second dasher delivered the chips to the wrong address and DoorDash refused to refund me for it. I canceled my dash pass and will never use this app again. They refused to take the blame or solve the problem your better off with postmates or Uber eats. Save yourself the trouble do NOT use this app.

title: The system and ‚Äúmembership‚Äù is worth it
review: The only downside is that DoorDash doesn‚Äôt do traditional grocery stores, at least in my area. Otherwise enough businesses in my area work with DoorDash to make paying the yearly subscription worth it. I order dinner for me, the kids, my extended family‚Ä¶and I especially like to order chocolate late at night from Walgreens. If I really want cookies but the kids are already asleep (single mom)‚Ä¶.I rely on DoorDash and Dashers in my community for little things to help my daily schedule. Thanks to Dashers especially!

title: Fantastic Service BUT.
review: Fantastic service. Fantastic delivery time. But (for my order at least) it‚Äôs insane that if I were to go and pick up my order myself, it would have been $10. My order with DoorDash is close to $30. Inflation has screwed all of us. This feeds in to the memes about DoorDash that a $5 meal costs $60 hahahah Again, this is not a negative review, I am fully happy with your service, I suppose this is just a comment about the times that we are living in. Have a wonderful evening, and I hope DoorDash lives on another day!

title: Takes out YOUR money for dasher‚Äôs mistakes
review:
I made a large orders for grocery, I keep missing half the items because of them being out of stock and I still got charged over $50 than the bill I received from target. The customer support were only somewhat helpful and in the end I lost about $10 when I tally all up. It feels like you are always overcharged for the bill you get apart from the service and the tips and this is not fair considering I‚Äôm already a member. 

I‚Äôve been using doordash SINCE the pandemic and I‚Äôve had the same issue over and over. 

I never write reviews but I‚Äôve never been this frustrated with doordash for the degree of dishonesty I‚Äôve dealt with over the years. I cannot hope for them to improve anymore. Absolutely terrible.

title: You get what you get and they don‚Äôt make it up to you
review: I ordered KFC while I was staying in Connecticut with my fianc√© seeing her family, it was a long day and nobody wanted to cook so I ordered food. The process of buying it online with door dash was easy, what ruined it for me is at some point from ordering the food and receiving it, it got spilled every where in the bag. Im talking gravy and potatoes opened up and made everything a mess including the chicken, kinda made it all far less appetizing. Like imagine putting your entire meal in a bucket and putting it in one of the paint mixers that shakes it to ensure it‚Äôs well mixed. Well my food was well mixed when it arrived I took a picture of it and sent it to them and they didn‚Äôt do much to make up for it. Bare minimum type of service.

title: Terrible customer service
review:
If you have any desire to have a possibility of good customer support, don‚Äôt use this. Do yourself a favor and get your food in any other possible way. Grubhub, ubereats, hiring a dog with a backpack and a working knowledge of currency. Anything is better than this.

They screwed up my order, twice for the same order, trying to get any customer service was a nightmare. The chat option sucked and agents just trying to placate me instead of just doing what I asked: issuing a full refund. They keep sending me emails saying they‚Äôre trying to call me, when I haven‚Äôt gotten any calls from anyone from doordash. In the emails they say I can respond to that within 72 hours, when I do I get no response. Just a terrible experience all around.

title: Overcharging greedy business
review:
I‚Äôve driven for DoorDash and they barely break even . They‚Äôre overcharging double ‚Äúlocal‚Äù fees. Just straight up money that can last you decades all of it goes to you guys. 3 Taco Bell items for $31 ? Dang I know inflation is bad but you can do better . Be grateful you were successful with this app but just remember how it started before more people realize and your income declines. This will make a great rant for 3.2 mil people üòÇüòÇü§£üòä stop being greedy and lower the ‚Äúlocal‚Äù fees or at least just charge me once not 2x local fees .. the restaurant is up the street for $31. This is in PDX. You guys already billion dollar company üòÇüòÇ just scamming the poor. This company does not care about anything besides their money. Great PR üôÉ
Some will steal your info as well and charge your whole paycheck.

title: Did they steal my money?üòÄ
review:
I thought it was a bit odd the first time I got a refund for a drink I never got(which happened multiple times I chose to do original payment method so I can get my money back 
They say 3-7 business days or something like that and you‚Äôll be refunded I usually don‚Äôt go back to look at my bank statements after that amount of time bc I would forget to but today
I checked to see if I had been refunded my money back and would you believe it I hadn‚Äôt 
So I went back to see if I had ever been refunded for past transactions and no I have not so this entire time I have just been losing money to this appü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: No compensation for wrong orders because of too many past complaints?
review: I‚Äôd love to rate this app a 5 star as it‚Äôs good and I appreciate the ability to have food delivered to me. However, I continue to get the wrong orders from the restaurants I buy from and because I‚Äôve had too many in the past they‚Äôve now declined to compensate me in return for not getting what I asked for. It makes no sense why I am being penalized for the operations mistake. I get that it could be seen as suspicious but when I have the wrong order I am going to say so. I wish there was a way to connect to the store itself and resolve disputes as it would be much easier.

title: Payment
review: I‚Äôve been ordering DoorDash lately and then I had to delete my credit card because of how my siblings would be using it without my permission, and now that I put in one credit card I have ,DoorDash expects me to have another credit card I only have one and I had to go get food myself, this is frustrating. I then had to ask my mom for her credit card for the second verification that it needed and it didn‚Äôt work either, this is just very frustrating cause I don‚Äôt have a car yet and have yo get myself one soon and now I‚Äôm having to get the food myself, I‚Äôm not complaint about getting the food myself I get to save more money like that but I don‚Äôt like how DoorDash had to just expect their customers to have two credit cards

title: Legal Proceedings
review:
My husband and I have been using DoorDash for over 3 years, before during and after the pandemic. This month, their driver hit my car parked on the road. No big deal, it happens, it wasn‚Äôt a lot of damage outside of cosmetics, but the driver drove off and we had them on camera. 
 
We contacted their legal team and informed local police, but DoorDash ghosted us for two weeks. All right, we used our local police to subpoena the drivers information to get the incident paid for.
 
We used DoorDash a couple times last week, but today, they decided to deactivate both of our accounts instead of complying with us. You‚Äôve lost our business permanently. Extremely unprofessional, and I look forward to your downfall for poor customer service.

title: Too expensive now.
review:
Update:  this service getting worse while also getting even more expensive.  Menus have shrunk, ads are annoying when you just want to order some dam food.  Everything is way more expensive than at the place then ad all the fees.  Not worth it anymore. Nickeled and dimed to death and the long fall of the stock price reflects I am not the only ditching door dash. 

Service fee plus monthly fee plus city fee plus tip all on top of the order. Comes out to about $10 for delivery. Promos were worth it but now even those are not really a discount. 3 dollars off an order for ordering 2 coke products that add up to 6 dollars is not a discount, it is an upsell. Don‚Äôt play me for a sucker.

title: Express delivery is a joke.
review: I paid the extra fee for express delivery because we were ordering sushi and it says ‚Äústraight to you‚Äù which, for sushi, I really think is important so it doesn‚Äôt sit in a car for other deliveries.  However, on the map, I watched the dasher make at least 2 other deliveries fiest.  When I contacted customer service, they said they group deliveries by location.  I asked what the point of ‚Äústraight to you‚Äù is and they basically wouldn‚Äôt answer the question even after I said please just answer my question.  I didn‚Äôt want a refund‚Ä¶. I wanted to know if it was really supposed to be ‚Äústraight to you‚Äù so I knew whether to ever do it again‚Ä¶. And they could NOT give me an answer.

title: No cancellation option within seconds of ordering
review: Worked a 12 hour shift, was very tired so I decided to order from door dash so I wouldn‚Äôt have to drive,  ordered to only find out it was for pick up after I double clicked to pay for order using Apple Pay. Within a second it said the restaurant was preparing my order. I hit the help button to cancel my order and the app stated that I could cancel my order but I could not get a refund due to the store ‚Äúalready preparing my order‚Äù. Within seconds of trying to cancel my order the door dash producers did not allow me to refund my order. I had to drive there because I would lose 29$ and wouldn‚Äôt get any food either. It‚Äôs sad that this app allows this, very greedy on behalf of door dash üëéüèºüëéüèº

title: HORRIBLE DO NOT GET THIS APP
review: DoorDash has made me so mad multiple times, my order is always being cancelled and it takes the longest for the money to reflect back in my card! The Dasher is always getting lost with my order and when they call me on my mobile device, they are telling me their like miles away from my location and it made me so upset because I had to get out of my house, get in my car, and drive many miles away from my home to where the door dasher was so I can get my order! The whole entire purpose of me getting my food delivered to my house was because I didn‚Äôt want to leave my house! And I will no longer order from DoorDash again! Waitr is much better and they always get my order on time and they never cancel my order!

title: Fixing location pin canceled my order??
review:
I ordered two things from Jollibee. I check out and everything. Jollibee is preparing my order, it was supposed to arrive around 6:00 pm and there‚Äôs like 43 minutes left. I notice that my location pin doesn‚Äôt actually represent where I live. I adjust it to my actual location, and now I see that my order is going to take 60-70 minutes?? And now I‚Äôm wondering if I‚Äôve been charged again for this ‚Äúnew‚Äù order(I live in an apartment complex, buildings are like 1-2 minutes away from eachother by car, so it‚Äôs not like the distance between what doordash put as ‚Äúmy house‚Äù should‚Äôve drastically changed the time)
This is my first HOUR using doordash, and honestly after I get my Jollibee I‚Äôm switching to Grubhub ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è doorflop

title: Refund
review: I have had multiple issues with dashers not bringing my order or missing parts of it. Then all they want to do is give you credits. Well after the dasher just lied and said my food was delivered when it was not. I don‚Äôt want to place another order then and have it happen again. Then I have an issue where they charge me $96 for dash pass instead of my normal 9.99. I called and finally got someone on the phone who informed me that he does not know why it happens. He also said it has happened to multiple people. Then says that it will take 7 days to get refunded. If you know that there has been issues for a while you should fix it! I don‚Äôt know about everyone else but $96 is a lot of money to be just gone in a blink for me.

title: App latency issues
review:
App had been lagging a lot for me recently. Starts off at the bugging of my dashes just fine but a while it it starts to get bogged down with something cause all interactions in the app to before delayed by several seconds each. This makes it hard to accept dashes, turn by turn navigation a, marking dashes as done and completing photos and then close out that dash. 

Really need to figure out what‚Äôs going on ther as it has persisted through several app updates and it‚Äôs still going. 

Please also update the app so we can utilize the new ‚Äúlive activities‚Äù Apple has rolled out. This have get us in screen navigation better and the ability to accept or decline new orders

title: Disappointed
review: I‚Äôve been using Door Dash for quite some time without issue.  I travel a lot, and use it exclusively if available in that particular area.  I ordered a steak dinner in Temple TX one night.  It never showed. I made multiple attempts through the app to submit a no-show report.  Nothing happened.  Zero communication from door dasher driver.  No help from Door Dash.  Eventually called and finally talked to a human later in the week. She politely said she cannot help me and that it was peculiar that there was no picture taken or notes from dasher.  Guess I‚Äôm out the $50 bucks and inflated tip.  Got to work and found out that a lot of co-workers were having the same issue.  It‚Äôs a great concept, but there‚Äôs apparently no resolution if your food doesn‚Äôt show.

title: Cancelled orders
review:
Most of the orders I have placed on the app had been cancelled because the restaurants had supposedly been closed; sometimes the restaurants are actually still open, OR a driver will arrive at the restaurant and it will be closed. How is the app not aware of the hours of the locations that they service?? And how come it often lets me add menu items toy cart and then tell me AFTER that the place is closed. They also don‚Äôt allow you to tip afterwards, which to me is completely unacceptable. Nothing but bad experiences. 0/5.

Also absolutely ridiculous to charge huge fees on top of the items already being priced higher on the app. My most recent order that would normally be a 15$ meal if you pick it up yourself costed me 40$ through the app.

title: Deleting the app
review: I was a regular and multiple times a day user and it just happens too often that the wrong food shows up and they don‚Äôt do anything but refund you for the missing item and that doesn‚Äôt really help you when you were counting on the meal and somebody is sitting there without their food. If these services can‚Äôt put some short quality control in place to make sure that you actually get the food you order then it‚Äôs never gonna work long-term I‚Äôm done.

title: Love doordash‚Ä¶sometimes
review: Doordash can actually be sooo convinent. Whenever you don‚Äôt have any transportation and you‚Äôre really craving something, you can get it with a click of a button. The only complaint I have is the fees. You are charged with delivery, tax, and tips. If you say, ‚Äú you don‚Äôt have to pay the tips tho‚Äù you most definitely do. Whenever I lesson my tip, my food comes completely messed up. The higher the tip the better quality food I receive. I‚Äôd also like to add that whenever you do a smaller tip, people tend to decline your order. So yeah, love and hate relationship!!!

title: DoorDash is a terrible app to order from.
review: DoorDash does not give your money back after one mess up of you reporting it. I have had to deal with my order messed up miserably and not get my money back? And I had to deal with this TWICE, first some of my food was missing. Second, they got my order messed up and put black olives NOTE: I can allergic to black olives. I sent a report for both of these issues before and neither got dealt with and they said they couldn‚Äôt do a thing about it. I have not received my money back what so ever and I thought maybe I‚Äôll try DoorDash again and they fixed their poor communication and annoying policy, WRONG. Do not order or get this app if you intend on getting scammed out your money and poor customer service.

title: Never received product and won‚Äôt issue a refund
review: Unfortunately I won‚Äôt be using this service anymore. It was convenient but the risk of paying for a service that is not provided is not ok. I ordered a meal and the driver dropped it at an address that doesn‚Äôt exist yet put it on a porch of a house. Sent me the picture and I had to go looking for it. Never found it. I contacted customer support to simply ask for a refund or a reorder and they denied me both. Told me I would be getting a refund and a confirmation would be sent in 24 hours. After 48 nothing. I reached out about my refund to which I was told due to THEIR policy they do not refund orders not received. I don‚Äôt feel this is right and I won‚Äôt be using them anymore and I caution others of this policy.

title: Honestly its pretty bad
review: Ive been using door dash for over a year now, and have not placed a single order that didnt have any problems.  There were multiple times where they could not find a dasher and my order was set back about a half hour- an hour.  Also, the cancellation to credits only works if you have the dash pass, so I did end up lossing over $40 on an order because of that.  The delivery time is always way off, and the items in the order are almost always wrong.  Not to mention they leave out and up charge everything on menus.  Im overall very disappointed knowing that grub hub and uber eats are about 10x more accurate and overall much better.

title: They literally stole my money.
review:
I use doordash almost every other day and have been a loyal customer from quite sometime. 

But unfortunately, my recent experience has been abysmal. May be they don‚Äôt care Saphire preferred subscribers as much as the normal dashpass subscribers as I see a change in their behavior since I moved to this new subscription. 

I ordered food the other day, the dasher arrived half an hour later than originally estimated doordash time and then he tried to hand over food which was clearly not mine. He informed me that the food vendor hasn‚Äôt provided any receipt as well. I rejected the food saying that it‚Äôs not the food I ordered and immediately contacted the support. That took a wild turn where I started getting bizzare replies like we will get back to you in 24 hours. They literally left me hungry and had to get food elsewhere. 

Later I got a strange email saying ‚Äúexceeded recent compensations‚Äù. I personally never asked me to compensate for anything before. The worst thing is there was absolutely no investigation as what happened to my order. In any case, I didn‚Äôt get my food and I lost my money. I‚Äôm gutted.

title: beware no food arrived but no refund
review:
I never leave reviews on apps. I switched to door dash because i was having issues with uber eats and thought i‚Äôd give it a try. i have had a few recent issue with my orders‚Äîlike items not arriving that i reported. No issue arose. then a meal completely didn‚Äôt show up ~60$ paid and i reported it and they stated they can‚Äôt refund because they don‚Äôt have to ‚Äúit‚Äôs stated in the fine print‚Äù. Because i had reported ‚Äútoo many issues recently‚Äù (not to any fault of my own) they will not issue a refund. 

basically theft for no service . im shocked. ordering with no guarantees of food but definitely guarantee of spending monday. despite the set backs i had with uber eats they always made sure they addressed issues that arose.

title: Expensive and Souless
review:
A double edge sword.  Can be very convenient but it orders are not correct no attempt is made to resolve the issue besides an automated credit.  Confusing when dealing with issues, do you you deal with dd automatic forms or call the restaurant.  

Significantly more expensive than calling in an order.   Prices are increased + fees.  Ultimately I deleted my account due to the lack of issue resolution as many drivers leave food outside or missing items.  There is a particularly large issue where most restaurants don‚Äôt list there condiments so even if you call and request them they will often not arrive with your meal.

title: Never goes as planned
review:
Something always goes wrong with every order. Often it takes 2x as long as the original estimate to get the food. Other times drivers will leave food at the completely wrong location. Most recently the driver texted me to say the restaurant never got the order and I have to cancel and retry.

From the users perspective it‚Äôs pretty clear: here‚Äôs my order, here‚Äôs the money, please bring it to my location. On the backend, it‚Äôs an absolute disaster of restaurants and drivers getting paid way too little to put any effort in, and the result is something goes wrong.

Order directly from the restaurant when you can. Pick it up yourself when you can. Use doordash as a last result and keep your expectations low.

title: Horrible Customer Support
review:
I‚Äôve used Door Dash for years in college, but recently it seems every order I have is missing at least one item. This might not be an issue for people who have endless time, because that‚Äôs what you need to get through their gauntlet of employees all telling you the same few lines of how sorry they are. Honestly, I‚Äôve discovered it‚Äôs best to just accept whatever automated deal they offer because that‚Äôs all their going to give even after a 2 hour text conversation. 

Not to mention they did NOTHING when I was verbally harassed by one of their drivers. I‚Äôm sure he‚Äôs still out driving and threatening even more customers. 

If you have this app, uninstall it. If you‚Äôre considering getting it, don‚Äôt.

title: HORRIBLE experience !!
review: The app is only good for delivering food and the food at most times isn‚Äôt even worth it which has nothing to do with the app itself but this app is so money hungry and greedy that If you do have a mistake with your order or your DoorDasher is unavailable to complete it u can only get a refund in tips and not the full price. Also I just accidentally spent $96 on a yearly subscription that I now have to use because I cannot contact them to get a refund or switch it to the monthly subscription like I wanted it . I honestly hate this app at this point and have had many many issues with it I do not recommend it to anyone anymore and I can‚Äôt wait for my subscription to be up so I never have to use it again!

title: Terrible performance issues
review:
I‚Äôve reported this issue multiple times with no response besides your half-baked outsourced customer support that can barely understand the issue because of their English skills. Convenience stores do not load. Any convenience store whether it‚Äôs Walgreen‚Äôs, 7-11, DashMart, doesn‚Äôt matter. The screen will freeze up, go white, load stuff in at a painfully slow rate, then crash. It‚Äôs not my phone because everything works just fine even while the app is frozen. I‚Äôve tried every piece of advice from both DoorDash and third parties online. 

After reading through recent reviews, I‚Äôm not the only one dealing with this. Figure it out bros.

title: Horrible Customer Service
review: I made an order for breakfast over 30 minutes before the menu would change. Got confirmation right away from the restaurant. It took another 20 minutes to be notified that they didn‚Äôt have a dasher in the area. Probably something you should have before you allow someone to put in the order. Another 40 minutes go by and I get informed that they can‚Äôt process my order at all because breakfast time was over. All I got from the customer service was that my order was cancelled. There needs to be some other reimbursement than just giving the payment back and there needs to be some way for you to ensure there‚Äôs a dasher before someone can put in an order.

title: Variety of Great Coupons!
review: I don‚Äôt ever write reviews but I feel compelled to with doordash. I‚Äôm also not one to order out often, since it allows more room for restaurants to mess up your order‚Ä¶. but how can you not when doordash offers a variety of good deals? Whenever I see a promotion, I jump on it. I‚Äôve paid as little as $2 for a meal that usually costs $25! Sometimes they have 75% off coupons, a steal. Anyways, it‚Äôs worth the download, and worth the time writing this review. Now back to eating my Poke‚Ä¶

title: Cold Food
review:
Update: Just ordered a meal for our family. When it got here, a third of the order was missing. Used the chat function in the app and the response was essentially ‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt care that you‚Äôre family is still hungry. Here‚Äôs a few bucks worth of refund. Better luck next time.‚Äù  Joke is on them. There‚Äôs not going to be a next time. 

The app works fine. The service is the issue. DoorDash let‚Äôs it‚Äôs drivers take on multiple deliveries at once, so it‚Äôs not uncommon for your food to ride around in the driver‚Äôs vehicle for 20-30 minutes. By the time it arrives, it‚Äôs lukewarm at best. Also, you need to make it to where the customer can tip the driver AFTER delivery. Tipping beforehand based on the hope that your food will arrive is NOT gratuity.

title: Horrible experience!
review: If I could give them zero stars I would! I placed a big order today through the restaurant online delivery service and when I received my food and opened my containers the delivery driver put it upon himself to eat my food and leave the scraps in the containers and still delivered it to me and took my tips. I contacted the restaurant first and then contacted door dash and the door dash customer service department said that he would put a ticket in with the restaurant to refund my money which right there I have an issue with because it wasn‚Äôt the restaurant‚Äôs fault that door dash delivery guy DeRon W. Of Indianapolis Indiana decided to eat my food and he said well we will put it in for him to never deliver to your address again HE SHOULDNT EVEN BE DELIVERING TO ANYONES ADDRESS

title: Inconsistent & Misleading
review:
The double dash (adding on to an order from an additional vendor) NEVER works. 
Also I have entered my ID into the app and verified that is correct multiple times. Still every single alcohol order ends up taking the delivery person ages to enter and half the time the app crashes on them halfway through and they have to start over. 
So basically I end up paying twice the delivery fees and watch a complete stranger take every bit of information from my ID which is already loaded into the app every time an order involves alcohol. 
To add to the frustration, the two times I reported mistakes in my order, not a single thing was done to correct or refund.

title: Good restaurant options, terrible interface
review: Every time I use Doordash on my laptop there is a 30 second lag between click and the action going through. Sometimes I click add an item and it doesn't work. I have Dash credits but wanted to use my credit card to pay for a meal and the app / website would not let me. Overall horrible interface design. Not to mention they not only charge extra fees, but also raise the price you see on the menu from the actual price the restaurant charges. All things considered, you pay like $8-10 more on each order because of Doordash. The only reason I keep coming back is for the good restaurant selection.

title: I love DoorDash but..
review: Soo I love the convenience of DoorDash but man.. do they have some problems. The app it‚Äôs self is seamless and well built, but everything else is awful. From the dashers themselves, the inflated priced on items (even if you purchase their ‚Äòdash pass‚Äô), the inaccurate map- to them not holding their Dasher‚Äôs accountable for marking orders ‚Äúwaiting for order‚Äù where then half way across the city or doing multiple deliveries when they‚Äôve marked as your ordering being close by. It‚Äôs infuriating. Orders always show up cold, and half heartedly delivered. It‚Äôs difficult to support a business that doesn‚Äôt hold their employees accountable. I‚Äôll enjoy UberEats for this reason and use DoorDash when I have too.

title: No refund for this???
review: If I could just load the pictures of how horrible my order arrived I would. The driver had my order in her car for 30-40 minutes prior. We had a hot sub, two hotdogs and two milkshakes. The hot food was absolutely cold and fell apart, soggy bread, etc. our milkshakes were so warm that it melted the whipped topping and definitely wasn‚Äôt a milkshake anymore. DoorDash is refusing to refund even after sending them pictures of my order. After several attempts I finally reported them to the BBB. I am also going to dispute the charges with my bank. As per law if a customer does not receive the product as it should be. A full refund will be issued. I will fight this until I get my money back. I have everything I need to win this.
